THINKING MORE SPECIFICALLY ABOUT THE CONSERVATIVE PARTY, WE PROPOSE QUESTIONS ON HOW ITS LEADERS TRIED TO EQUATE THE ELEMENTS OF THAT CRISIS, AND ON HOW THEY FORMULATED POLICIES TO FACE IT IN ORDER TO PRESERVE (OR NOT) THE MONARCHIC REGIME, AND TO WHAT EXTENT THEIR POLITICAL ACTIONS CONTRIBUTED TO THE DYNAMICS OF THE CRISIS OF THE EMPIRE AND TO ITS OUTCOME WITHOUT ANY RESISTANCE. IN ORDER TO ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS, WE PURSUED, PRIMARILY THROUGH PERSONAL FILES, THE TRAJECTORIES OF TWO PROMINENT CONSERVATIVE LEADERS: JOÃO MAURÍCIO WANDERLEY, THE BARÃO DE COTEGIPE (“BARON OF COTEGIPE”), AND ANTÔNIO DA SILVA PRADO, THE CONSELHEIRO PRADO (“COUNSELOR PRADO”). WE HAVE FAVORED, IN THIS ANALYSIS, THE PERIOD OF GREATEST POLITICAL BOILING OF THE CRISIS, IN WHICH THE CONSERVATIVE LEADERS ACTED DIRECTLY FROM THE CABINET IN AUGUST 20TH 1985, CHAIRED BY THE BARÃO DE COTEGIPE. IN THOSE YEARS, THE CONSERVATIVE GROUPS WERE PRESSURED BY THE RESURGENCE OF THE ABOLITIONIST MOVEMENT, BY THE EXPANSION OF THE REPUBLICAN MOVEMENT AND BY THE GROWING OPPOSITION BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT AND MILITARY GROUPS, AND FOR THESE REASONS THE CONSERVATIVE LEADERS HAD TO SOLVE POLITICALLY SUCH ISSUES IN A CONTEXT OF HEGEMONIC CRISIS OF THAT SLAVE SOCIETY WHICH HAD BEEN ESTABLISHED SINCE 1871 WITH THE APPROVAL OF THE LAW THAT GUARANTEED THE RELEASE OF THE SLAVES WHO WERE BORN FROM THAT MOMENT AND ON, PUTTING THE END OF SLAVERY ON THE HORIZON.

nm_producao: O PENTA FICOU PARA DEPOIS DIMENSÕES CULTURAIS, IDENTITÁRIAS E MIDIÁTICAS BRASILEIRAS NA COPA DO MUNDO DE 1998
ds_abstract: FROM THE STUDY OF THE MEDIA NEWS EXPERIENCED IN THE 1998 WORLD CUP NEW, WE AIM TO INVESTIGATE HOW THE ACTORS WHO BUILD THIS SPORTING EVENT REVEAL A NETWORK OF DISPUTES AND SIMILARITIES THAT GOES BEYOND THE SPORTS ITSELF. THUS, THE SPECTACLE IS ESTABLISHED AS A PLACE OF CULTURAL, POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC INTERRELATIONSHIPS, BESIDES IDENTITY AND SYMBOLIC CLASH. THROUGH THE PATH OF THE BRAZILIAN TEAM BEFORE AND DURING THE WORLD CUP, WE CAN SEE THAT BRAZILIAN IDENTITIES HAVE BEEN ERECTED IN MULTIPLE PERSPECTIVES BY THE DIFFERENT SOCIAL ACTORS PUTS IN THE PRESS SPEECH. ON THE OTHER HAND, WITH THE LOSS OF THE FINAL AGAINST FRANCE, THERE WAS A PROCESS OF REBUILDING THE BRAZILIAN IDENTITY ACCORDING TO THE LOGIC OF HYPERTRIBUNALIZATION, DECIDING THAT THE NATIONAL HERO WAS NOT GUILT, CULTURALLY SEEN AS THE INCARNATION OF THE AUTHORITARIAN MESSIANIC CHARACTERISTICS OF THE LEADERSHIP OF BRAZIL. AT THE SAME TIME, NIKE WAS BLAMED FOR OUR TROUBLES AND DEFEATS, BECAUSE IT WAS AN AGENT OF THE FOREIGN ECONOMIC POWER, METAPHORICALLY EMBODIES THE IMPERIALIST INTERFERENCE IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE NATION’S SYMBOLS AND VALUES.

nm_producao: PERFORMANCES DO TEMPO: O FÊNOMENO DA ACELERAÇÃO NA CONTEMPORANEIDADE A PARTIR DE UMA LEITURA SOBRE O MOVIMENTO SLOW
ds_abstract: THE AIM OF THIS RESEARCH IS TO UNDERSTAND THE PHENOMENON OF ACCELERATION IN WESTERN SOCIETIES OF LATE MODERNITY. TO THIS END, THE SLOW MOVEMENT WAS SELECTED AS THE OBJECT OF STUDY - MAINLY THE SLOW FOOD SLOPE - WHOSE OFFICIAL DISCOURSE AIMS TO PROPAGATE SLOWER LIFESTYLES, AS IT STRONGLY CRITICIZES THE CURRENT FASTLIFE MODEL. THE QUESTIONS THAT GUIDE THIS WORK ARE FUNDAMENTALLY THESE: HOW DOES THE SLOW MOVEMENT HELP BRING INTELLIGIBILITY TO DIFFERENT CONTEMPORARY TEMPORALITIES? HOW IS THIS MOVEMENT AID IN THE APPREHENSION OF THE TENSIONS THAT CONSTITUTE THE RELATIONS BETWEEN TIME AND POWER, ABOVE ALL, IN THE TEMPORALIZATIONS OF DAILY LIFE? IN A WESTERN SCENARIO INCREASINGLY STEEPED IN ACCELERATING ASSUMPTIONS, WHO, IN FACT, CAN SLOW DOWN? IN ORDER TO EXAMINE POSSIBLE ANSWERS TO THESE QUESTIONS, SOME CONCEPTS PROPOSED BY THEORY OF HISTORY WERE USED AS THEORETICAL AND METHODOLOGICAL REFERENCES, AS WELL AS ANALYSIS AND COMPARISON OF THE SELECTED DOCUMENTARY SOURCES. IN ADDITION TO THE MAIN OBJECTIVE, IT WAS TRIED TO UNDERSTAND HOW THE ARRIVAL OF SLOW TO BRAZIL ALLOWS A BETTER UNDERSTANDING ABOUT THE TEMPORAL EXPERIENCE IN THE COUNTRY DURING THE LAST YEARS. FINALLY, IT SHOULD BE POINTED OUT THAT THE MOVEMENT IS INTRINSICALLY DEPENDENT ON ACCELERATION FOR ITS OPERATION, SOMETHING THAT, WITH THE ARGUMENTS PRESENTED, IS MAINLY OBSERVED IN THE TRAJECTORY OF ITS PERFORMANCE IN THE BRAZILIAN TERRITORY.

nm_producao: QUEENSHIP E OS CERIMONIAIS REAIS EM ORDINES E CRÔNICAS: AS COROAÇÕES DE ELEANOR DE AQUITÂNIA E MARGUERITE DE FRANÇA (FRANÇA E INGLATERRA, SÉCULO XII).
ds_abstract: THIS WORK AIMS TO REFLECT ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF ROYAL CROWNING RITUALS WITHIN THE CONTEXT OF TWELFTH CENTURY KINGDOMS, ESPECIALLY FOR THE QUEEN, WHO, AFTER BEING INVESTED, HAD FUNCTIONS WITHIN THE KINGDOM, IDENTIFIED WITH THE CONCEPT OF QUEENSHIP. AT THE SAME TIME, THROUGH THE ANALYSIS OF THE SOURCES, THE MEDIEVAL CHRONICLES AND THE ORDINES (LITURGICAL TEXTS THAT SHOWED, IN PART, HOW THESE CEREMONIES WERE PROCESSED), WE TRY TO OBSERVE NOT ONLY THE STRUCTURE OF THESE CEREMONIES, BUT ALSO HOW THE VALUES LINKED TO FIGURE OF THE QUEEN, SUCH AS PIETY, INTERCESSION, ETC., APPEARED IN THESE ORDINES AND ENDED UP CREATING AN IDEA OF HOW A QUEEN SHOULD BEHAVE. FINALLY, THE EXAMPLES OF THE CORONATION OF TWO QUEENS, ELEANOR OF AQUITAINE AND MARGUERITE DE FRANCE, ARE OBSERVED IN THE CHRONICLERS' ACCOUNTS, REFLECTING NOT ONLY HOW THE CHARACTERS WERE PORTRAYED, BUT LINKING IT WITH THE EXERCISE OF QUEENSHIP OF THOSE TWO QUEENS. IT IS IMPORTANT TO REFLECT, AT THIS POINT, HOW NOT ALWAYS QUEENS, IN GENERAL, MET THE EXPECTATION OF A "MODEL QUEEN", AND HOW THEY PERFORMED THE POWER THAT WAS ATTRIBUTED TO THEM AT THE TIME OF THE CORONATION OF DIFFERENT FORMS.

nm_producao: “RELIGIÃO É UMA COISA, CULTURA É OUTRA”: HERANÇA BANTU E PENTECOSTALISMO NA CONSTRUÇÃO DA IDENTIDADE QUILOMBOLA NA COMUNIDADE NEGRA DA RASA (1988-2018)
ds_abstract: THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS THESIS IS TO ANALYZE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE QUILOMBOLA IDENTITY IN THE BLACK COMMUNITY OF RASA, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ARMAÇÃO DOS BÚZIOS, REGIÃO DOS LAGOS, RIO DE JANEIRO STATE, AT THE PRESENT TIME. CONSIDERING THE QUILOMBOLA NARRATIVES, I IDENTIFIED RUPTURES AND PERMANENCES OF THE CULTURE OF AFRICANS FROM BANTU ORIGIN WITHIN A QUILOMBOLA TERRITORY THAT FROM THE 1960S ASSUMED EVANGELICAL RELIGIOUS BELONGING BASED ON THE PENTECOSTALISM OF THE EVANGELICAL CHURCH ASSEMBLY OF GOD. NOTING THEIR PRACTICES, I HIGHLIGHT THE “BAPTISM OF DOLLS”, PRESENTED BY THE QUILOMBOLAS IN THE MOLD OF THE CATHOLIC SACRAMENT, RECALLING THE PLAYFUL PRACTICE PERFORMED IN THE PAST BY THE ELDERS OF TODAY, AS WELL AS THE JONGO, WHICH WENT FROM A PRACTICE INCOMPATIBLE WITH PENTECOSTAL RELIGIOSITY TO AN IMPORTANT IDENTITY ELEMENT OF THE IMMINENT GROUP OF RECONSTITUTION.

nm_producao: RETORNADOS, DESALOJADOS, DESLOCADOS: A CONSTRUÇÃO DA MEMÓRIA DO REGRESSO DE ANGOLA PARA PORTUGAL
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS ANALYZES THE CLASH BETWEEN THE PAST AND THE MEMORIES OF FORMER PORTUGUESE SETTLERS WHO MIGRATED FROM ANGOLA TO PORTUGAL SHORTLY AFTER THE CONQUEST OF INDEPENDENCE. THE HORIZON OF EXPERIENCES OF THESE SETTLERS IN THE LAST PHASE OF COLONIALISM IN ANGOLA WAS INVESTIGATED THROUGH THE ANALYSIS OF SPECIALIZED BIBLIOGRAPHY AND PERIODICALS. LIKEWISE, THE CONSTRUCTION OF HIS MEMORIES AT THE BEGINNING OF THE 21ST CENTURY, IN THE MIDST OF PROJECTS TO OBTAIN ANGOLAN NATIONALITY OR TO RECEIVE COMPENSATION FROM THE PORTUGUESE GOVERNMENT, WAS STUDIED THROUGH LITERATURE, FILM PRODUCTION, SOCIAL MEDIA PAGES AND ORAL TESTIMONIALS.
nm_discente: MARILDA DOS SANTOS MONTEIRO DAS FLORES

nm_producao: “SALIMOS A LA LUCHA...SIN DIOS Y SIN JEFE”. O PERIÓDICO LA VOZ DE LA MUJER COMO EXPERIÊNCIA FEMININA DO ANARQUISMO NA ARGENTINA. (1896-1897).
ds_abstract: THE DISSERTATION CONSISTS OF AN ANALYSIS OF THE NEWSPAPER LA VOZ DE LA MUJER THAT CIRCULATED IN BUENOS AIRES BETWEEN THE YEARS OF 1896 AND 1897, PROBLEMATIZING AND CONTEXTUALIZING LIBERTARIAN IDEAS ABOUT THE SOCIAL SITUATION OF WOMEN IN ARGENTINA IN THE LATE NINETEENTH CENTURY. IT AIMS TO CONTRIBUTE TO A READING OF ANARCHISM REGARDING GENDER RELATIONS AND WOMEN'S HISTORY, AS WELL AS DISCUSSING THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE CONCEPT OF EMANCIPATION FROM THE WRITINGS OF THE JOURNAL'S WRITERS. IN THE ACCOMPLISHMENT OF THE WORK WERE USED BASICALLY QUALITATIVE METHODS, TRYING TO HIGHLIGHT THE VOCABULARY PRESENT IN THE SOURCE, ANALYZING THE HISTORICAL DISCOURSES AND THE THEMES OF ANARCHISM. INSCRIBED IN THE FIELD OF SOCIAL HISTORY AS IT DISCUSSES A SOCIAL GROUP WITH PARTICULAR DIMENSIONS AND TRAITS AND ITS PROPOSAL OF REVOLUTIONARY CHANGE, THE WORK MAINTAINS INTERCONNECTION WITH THE THEMATIC FIELD OF THE HISTORY OF THE WOMEN BY THE REFLECTION THAT UNDERTAKES WITH RESPECT TO THE EXPERIENCE OF THE WOMEN AND THE PROCESS OF LIBERTARIAN STRUGGLE FOR FEMALE EMANCIPATION. THE STUDY CONCLUDES THAT THE PROPAGATION OF IDEAS WAS MORE EXTENSIVE IF WE CONSIDER THE SCOPE OF THE JOURNAL, BESIDES BEING ABLE TO AFFIRM THAT THE NEWSPAPER PLAYED THE ROLE OF DEFENDER OF FEMININE INTERESTS AND REPRESENTATIVE OF THE FEMALE VOICE. FROM THIS PERSPECTIVE, IT IS VERIFIED THAT THE JOURNAL AND ITS WRITERS HAD AN ANTI-STATIST, ANTI-CLERICAL AND ANTIPATRIARCHAL CHARACTER.

nm_producao: VENDE-SE, ALUGA-SE, NEGOCIA-SE: UMA ANÁLISE DOS ANÚNCIOS E AVISOS DA GAZETA DO RIO DE JANEIRO (1808-1821)
ds_abstract: IN SEPTEMBER 1808, FOUR MONTHS AFTER THE INAUGURATION OF THE ROYAL PRINTING, THE GAZETA DO RIO DE JANEIRO APPEARED, THE FIRST NEWSPAPER PRINTED ON BRAZILIAN SOIL. THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS DISSERTATION IS TO ANALYZE THE SECTION OF ANNOUNCEMENTS OF THIS PERIODICAL, THAT EVEN BEING USED BY THE CROWN TO DIVULGE GOVERNMENT ACTIONS, INITIATED A NEW FORM OF ADVERTISING AND ADVERTISING IN THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO. AND, POINTING OUT MANY SIMILARITIES WITH THE NEWSPAPER GAZETA DE LISBOA, THEREFORE, PRESENTING NO ORIGINALITY, EVEN SO, THE POPULATION OF RIO DE JANEIRO STARTED TO HAVE IN AVISOS DA GAZETA A STRONG ALLY FOR THEIR COMMERCIAL OR OTHER TRANSACTIONS. THE SECTION STUDIED WAS AN IMPORTANT TOOL FOR THE CITY'S BUSINESS. IT WAS ANNOUNCED ON SALE AND RENT OF REAL ESTATE, LOST AND FOUND, SERVICES, SALE OF SLAVES, SEARCH FOR ESCAPED SLAVES, GENERAL ANNOUNCEMENTS, ETC. IN CONTRAST, THE NEWSPAPER'S READERS FOUND WHAT THEY WERE LOOKING FOR AND NEEDED IN THIS SECTION, WHICH WAS ON THE LAST PAGE OF THE NEWSPAPER. ITS IMPORTANCE IS MANIFESTED IN THE FACT THAT OTHER PERIODICALS THAT APPEARED AT THE SAME TIME ALSO FOLLOWED THE GAZETA REGARDING THE ORGANIZATION AND CONTENT OF ITS SECTION OF NOTICES. THE IMPORTANCE OF THE SECTION FOR THE BUSINESS OF THE CITY CAN ALSO BE PERCEIVED THROUGH THE INCREASE OF THE ADS PUBLISHED IN THE GAZETA, THROUGHOUT THE YEARS OF CIRCULATION OF THE NEWSPAPER, SINCE THE NUMBER OF CLAIMS ONLY DECLINED IN THE PENULTIMATE AND LAST YEAR OF ITS PUBLICATION.

nm_producao: VESTIR-SE NEGRA: ROUPAS E ADORNOS DE MULHERES NEGRAS EM FOTOGRAFIAS DA SEGUNDA METADE DO SÉCULO XIX – RIO DE JANEIRO E SALVADOR
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION AIMS TO ANALYZE THE COMPOSITION OF GARMENTS AND ADORNMENTS OF BLACK WOMEN IN THE SECOND HALF OF THE NINETEENTH CENTURY, IN RIO DE JANEIRO AND BAHIA. OUR GOAL IS TO INVESTIGATE GARMENTS PRESENTED IN THE PHOTOGRAPHS THAT ARE PART OF OUR DOCUMENTATION. THE SERIES WAS MADE WITH 104 IMAGES FROM THE 19TH CENTURY, WHICH WE ANALYZED USING THE SEMIOTIC METHOD. THEREBY, USING OUR SERIES WE MAPPED PORTRAITS AND LANDSCAPES WHERE WE HAVE CLOTHES AND ADORNMENTS THAT ARE USED BY BLACK WOMEN. THROUGH THE ANALYSES OF THOSE IMAGES WE REALIZED THAT THERE WOULD BE A BASIC TWO-PIECE MODEL THAT HAD SOME VARIATIONS SUCH AS, JEWELRY AND CLOTHES WITH DIFFERENT TEXTURES, VOLUMES AND MAKING THAT WERE ASSOCIATED WITH THE IMAGE OF BLACK FEMALE BODIES. OUR HYPOTHESIS IS THAT THIS MODEL OF DRESSING CONSTITUTED WHAT WE CALL “DRESSING-BLACK”. FROM OUR ANALYZE THESE BLACK WOMEN HAD THEIR OWN WAY TO COMPOSE THE CLOTHES THAT WERE AVAILABLE FOR THEM AND WOULD SINGULARIZE THEM FROM OTHER HISTORICAL CHARACTERS OF THE CONTEXT THEY WERE INSERTED. THEREFORE, THE “DRESSING-BLACK” IS WAS ASSOCIATED NOT ONLY WITH THEIR ADORNMENTS, BUT ALSO WITH THE SOCIAL PRACTICES THAT THEY BUILD.

nm_producao: A BELEZA VAI À GUERRA: IMERSÃO NAS MEMÓRIAS DAS MULHERES DA PRIMEIRA TURMA DAS POLICIAIS MILITARES FEMININAS DO DÉCIMO BATALHÃO DE MONTES CLAROS/MG
ds_abstract: THE RETURN TO DEMOCRACY IN BRAZIL WAS MARKED BY CHANGES IN THE PERSPECTIVES OF GO VERNMENT INSTITUTIONS. IN THE MEANTIME, MILITARY INSTITUTIONS WOULD HAVE REPERCUSSIONS FOR THESE SOCIAL CHANGES AND WOULD BE IN LINE WITH THE COUNTRY'S NEW MOMENTUM AND, CONSEQUENTLY, THE EXPANSION OF RIGHTS AND THEIR PREROGATIVES. PUTTING WOMEN IN THE RAN KS OF MILITARY INSTITUTIONS WAS IN KEEPING WITH THE TIME AND EVENTS OUTSIDE THE BARRACKS, IN LINE WITH THE YEARNINGS OF BRAZILIAN SOCIETY IN THE 1980S, AS WELL AS HELPING TO BUILD A HUMANITARIAN SELF IMAGE IN THE DICTATORIAL CONTEXT. WOMEN'S PARTICIPATION IN POLICE INSTITUTIONS HAS ALWAYS PROVOKED CONVENIENT AND IMPORTANT DISCUSSIONS, ALTHOUGH HISTORIOGRAPHY HAS AN UNIMPRESSIVE NUMBER OF PAPERS ON THESE WOMEN. FIFTY FIVE FEMALE SOLDIERS IN MONTES CLAROS / MG, MORE PRECISELY IN THE TENTH BATTALION OF THE MIL ITARY POLICE, BEGAN ON DECEMBER 1 OF THAT YEAR THE TRAINING COURSE OF THE FIRST CLASS OF FEMALE MILITARY POLICE OFFICERS (PFEM) IN THE NORTH OF MINAS GERAIS. THE GROUP THAT COMPLETED, IN 2016, THIRTY YEARS, HAD ITS LAST REMAINING UNTIL THE YEAR 2015, WHEN SOME CHOSE TO RETIRE WITH ALL THE ADVANTAGES OF REACHING THE FULL CYCLE OF EFFECTIVE SERVICE. THROUGH THE ORAL HISTORY METHODOLOGY, THE RESEARCH PROJECT WAS SUBMITTED AND APPROVED BY THE ETHICS AND RESEARCH COMMITTEE OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF MONTES CLARO S MG, ON 06/28/2017, WE SOUGHT TO INTERVIEW FIFTEEN WOMEN AND THREE MEN, THREE OF THEM DID NOT RETIRE / RETIRE AT THE INSTITUTION. THUS, FOR THIS RESEARCH, IT WAS NECESSARY TO ADDRESS IN THIS AREA A QUESTION THAT DEEPLY PERMEATES THE HISTORY OF FEMALE LABO R: THE OCCUPATION OF PUBLIC SPACES BETWEEN MEN AND WOMEN. HOW AND WHAT DEFINED HOW EACH OF THE SEXES OCCUPY AND EXCEL IN THIS OR THAT SPACE? HOW TO EXPLAIN AN EXPLANATORY DIMENSION TO THE UNDERSTANDING OF THIS REALITY? WE SOUGHT TO UNDERSTAND THE FACTS AND HOW EACH REACTED TO THESE, HAVING THEM CONTACT WITH MILITARISM IN THE FAMILY OR ENTERED THAT UNIVERSE WITHOUT REALLY KNOWING WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE TO BELONG TO AN INSTITUTION WITH REGULATION OF THE ARMED FORCES AND THAT HAS IN ITS PILLARS HIERARCHY AND DI SCIPLINE. AFTER THE REPERCUSSION OF THE RESEARCH, THE LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY OF MINAS GERAIS PROPOSED A VOTE OF CONGRATULATIONS AND THE CITY COUNCIL OF MONTES CLAROS A MEETING TO PAY HOMAGE TO THE FIRST CLASS OF FEMALE POLICE OFFICERS IN THE TENTH BATTALION.

nm_producao: EM BUSCA DA AMÉRICA: SEM DESTINO E AS REPRESENTAÇÕES DA CONTRACULTURA NO CINEMA
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH INVESTIGATES HOW THE COUNTERCULTURE OF THE 1960 SUPPORTED THE RENEWAL PROCESS OF THE REPRESENTATIONS ABOUT THE AMERICAN WAY OF LIFE IN THE CINEMA THROUGH THE FILMS OF THE CALLED NEW HOLLYWOOD (1967-1980). THERE WERE IN THESE FILMS NEW REPRESENTATIONS OF AMERICA, AND THOSE WERE AGAINST THE IDEALIZED MODEL OF THE "AMERICAN DREAM", SO ADVERTISED BY THE CLASSIC CINEMA. THE FILM EASY RIDER (1969), BY PETER FONDA AND DENNIS HOPPER, WAS CHOSEN AS A SOURCE. IT IS A LATE 1960 CINEMA MILESTONE, THAT INNOVATED AESTHETICALLY AND BROUGHT THE DISCOURSE OF CONTESTATION AND REFUSAL TO THE CAPITALIST INDUSTRIAL ORDER INTO THE INDUSTRY ITSELF. IN PRODUCING A COUNTER NARRATIVE BASED ON A WHOLE NEW WAY OF MAKING FILMS, FILMS SUCH AS EASY RIDER QUESTIONED THE REPRESENTATIONS OF AMERICA, THAT HAD LONG PERMEATED THE IMAGINARY ABOUT THE COUNTRY. THE FILM ALSO BROUGHT NEW IMAGES THAT ILLUSTRATED THE COUNTRY’S GREAT DIVERSITY, THE WAYS OF LIFE THAT SURVIVED ON THE FRINGES OF SOCIETY AND THE WAR VIOLENCE. CONSEQUENTLY SPACES WERE OPENED TO YOUNGER DIRECTORS TO PRODUCE THEIR OWN FILMS, BESIDES EMPOWERING THE DISCOURSES OF YOUTH THAT PURSUED BUILDING THEIR OWN IDENTITY.

nm_producao: A MEDICINA COMO ESTRATÉGIA BIOPOLÍTICA: PERSPECTIVAS DE UMA ANÁLISE HISTÓRICO-GENEALÓGICA DA EMERGÊNCIA DE UMA MEDICINA SOCIAL NO BRASIL
ds_abstract: STARTING FROM A DISCUSSION ABOUT THE ARCHAEOGENEALOGICAL HISTORICAL INVESTIGATION, IT IS ANALYZED, FIRST AND FOREMOST, THE WAY POWER IS PROBLEMATIZED BY MICHEL FOUCAULT IN THE ELABORATION OF HIS NOTIONS OF SOVEREIGN POWER, DISCIPLINARY POWER AND BIOPOWER, AND, SECOND, ARTICULATED TO THESE CAPITAL NOTIONS, THE PRODUCTION OF THE SOCIAL MEDICINE AS TECHNOLOGY OF THE BIOPOLITICAL RATIONALITY, WHICH IS ALSO DEBATED BY A INTERLOCUTION BETWEEN FOUCAULT AND OTHER THINKERS, SOME BEING GIORGIO AGAMBEN, JUDITH BUTLER AND ROBERTO ESPOSITO. A BRIEF GENEALOGY OF MEDICINE IN BRAZIL WAS RECONSTITUTED, EVER SINCE THE COLONIALISM UNTIL THE END OF THE 19TH CENTURY, BY SECONDARY SOURCES, IN ORDER TO DETERMINE THE CONDITIONS OF POSSIBILITY AND THE EMERGING POINT OF A SOCIAL MEDICINE IN BRAZIL. THE ANALYSIS REVEALED THE FRENCH PHILOSOPHER’S REFLECTIONS ABOUT BIOPOWER, BIOPOLITICS AND SOCIAL MEDICINE, HIS GENEALOGY OF DIVERSE GOVERNMENTAL RATIONALITIES AND THE CONCEPT OF MEDICAL POLICE ARE ALL VALUABLE TOOLS FOR THE COMPREHENSION OF THE PROCESS OF MEDICALIZATION THAT HAPPENED IN BRAZIL.

nm_producao: A VOZ QUE QUER SER OUVIDA E PRECISA SER ESCRITA: MEMÓRIAS AFETIVAS DE MULHERES NEGRAS “SOZINHAS” MORADORAS DA CIDADE DE SÃO FRANCISCO MG (1979-2010)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION ANALYZED THE LIFE HISTORIES OF BLACK WOMEN BY THEMSELVES, FROM THE CITY OF SÃO FRANCISCO-MG (1979-2010), IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND THE AFFECTIVE EXPERIENCES AND OPPRESSIONS THEY EXPERIENCED IN RELATION TO THEIR RACE, GENDER, CLASS, SEXUALITY OR AGE / GENERATION. THIS STUDY IS BASED ON INTERSECTIONALITY, WHICH MAKES IT POSSIBLE TO THINK BLACK WOMEN THROUGH THE MULTIPLE SOCIAL MARKERS OF THE INTERCONNECTED DIFFERENCE. THROUGH THE TESTIMONIES OF EIGHT BLACK WOMEN, FOUR OF THEM IN THE AGE GROUP BETWEEN 30 AND 49 YEARS, HEADS OF FAMILIES AND WITH CHILDREN. AND THE OTHER FOUR IN THEIR 50S AND 85S, WHO HAD NO CHILDREN, REMAINED IN FULL CELIBACY AND DID NOT COMPLETE PRIMARY SCHOOL. WE FIND THAT ALTHOUGH THEY ARE OF DIFFERENT AGE / GENERATION, THEY PRESENT SOME SIMILARITIES IN THEIR EXPERIENCES AS A WOMAN, BLACK, POOR AND ALONE, ALL OF WHOM HAVE EXPERIENCED RACISM, WHETHER IN THE FAMILY ENVIRONMENT, AT SCHOOL, AT WORK OR IN THEIR AFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS. THE FEELING OF LONELINESS EXPERIENCED BY THEM GOES FAR BEYOND HAVING A COMPANY, APPEARS IN THE NARRATIVES AS SYNONYMOUS WITH BEING ALONE. THEY ARE BLACK WOMEN WHO STILL LIVE WITH MANY PAINS AND SUFFERINGS, BUT CONTINUE TO RESIST THROUGH THEIR WOUNDS.

nm_producao: BRASIL ENTRE TRINCHEIRAS: EDUARDO TADDEO, O CORRESPONDENTE FAVELADO DE UMA GUERRA NÃO DECLARADA (2000-2012)
ds_abstract: BRAZIL, IN THE FIRST DECADE OF THE 21ST CENTURY, PRESENTED EXORBITANT FIGURES ON HOMICIDES, EVEN BEING SUPERIOR TO COUNTRIES WITH WARLIKE CONFLICTS. NEVERTHELESS, THESE SAME NUMBERS DO NOT REACH THE SOCIETY HOMOGENEOUSLY, THEY ARE DIRECTED TO SPECIFIC GROUPS OF THE BRAZILIAN POPULATION, BEING: YOUNG, BLACK, POOR AND INHABITANTS OF THE PERIPHERY. IN THIS SENSE, THIS RESEARCH HAD AS OBJECTIVE TO WORK THE URBAN VIOLENCE ISSUE IN THE PERSPECTIVE OF A FAVELADO, CALLED CARLOS EDUARDO TADDEO AND HIS THESIS OF AN UNDECLARED WAR. THE TIME CUT CHOSEN FOR THE PRODUCTION OF THIS WORK IS FROM 2000 TO 2012, A TIME IN WHICH RAPPER'S CAREER IS CONSOLIDATED AND THE PUBLICATION OF HIS BOOK IN 2012, ALSO BECAUSE IT IS A PERIOD OF RELATIVE POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC STABILITY, BUT EVEN SO WITH HIGH DEGREE OF HOMICIDE IN BRAZILIAN TERRITORY.

nm_producao: COOPERAÇÃO E CONFRONTO: UM ESTUDO SOBRE A CULTURA POLÍTICA TRABALHISTA EM MONTES CLAROS/MG (1945-1964)
ds_abstract: THE RESEARCH PROPOSED TO KNOW THE SOCIAL, LABOR AND CULTURAL RELATIONS OF THE WORKERS OF MONTES CLAROS IN THE COURSE OF THE DEMOCRATIC PERIOD (1945-1964). WE WERE INTERESTED IN IDENTIFYING AND PROBLEMATIZING THE VALUES SHARED BY THEM, THE FORMS OF ORGANIZATION AND THE ACTIONS MOBILIZED TRYING TO PARTICIPATE IN POLITICAL LIFE AND ENSURE THEIR RIGHTS, AS OCCURRED AT SIGNIFICANT MOMENTS SUCH AS THE COMMEMORATIONS RELATED TO LABOR DAY, THE ORGANIZATION OF PETITIONS, THE FIGHT AGAINST INFLATION AND THE MONOPOLY OF THE MEAT, THE ENGLISH WEEK MOVEMENT AND THE MUNICIPAL ELECTIONS OF 1962. WE USE AS SOURCES THE WRITTEN PRESS, MINUTES OF THE CIRCLE OF CHRISTIAN WORKERS OF MONTES CLAROS AND THE CORRESPONDENCE SENT AND RECEIVED BY THE CITY COUNCIL DURING THE PERIOD STUDIED. THE DIVERSITY OF SOURCES MADE IT POSSIBLE TO NOTE DIFFERENT DISCOURSES REGARDING THE WORKER AND HIS RIGHTS AND TO ESTABLISH COUNTERPOINTS BETWEEN POLITICAL-PARTISAN POSITIONS AND DIFFERENT INTERESTS.

nm_producao: DA POLÍTICA SE FEZ LITERATURA: ASPECTOS DA SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE 1972 E 1973 ATRAVÉS DAS CRÔNICAS DE JOSÉ SARAMAGO EM “AS OPINIÕES QUE O DL TEVE”
ds_abstract: JOSÉ SARAMAGO, ESCRITOR PORTUGUÉS GALARDONADO CON EL PREMIO NOBEL DE LITERATURA, EN UNA CONSTRUCCIÓN LITERARIA HÍBRIDA DE LITERATO Y PERIODISTA, PUBLICÓ, DURANTE EL FINAL DEL PERÍODO DE ESTADO NOVO, TEXTOS DEL GÉNERO DE LA CRÓNICA QUE DESTACAN LA VOZ DE AQUELLOS, SOFOCADOS POR UNA DICTADURA DE CASI HACE UN SIGLO, BUSCA DESPERTAR EN SU LECTOR UNA INQUIETUD SOBRE LA PROBLEMÁTICA SITUACIÓN DE PORTUGAL. EN UN ESCRITO COMPROMETIDO, CONSTRUIDO BAJO EL RÉGIMEN DE OPRESIÓN Y CENSURA, PRESENTÓ Y CRITICÓ LAS PERSPECTIVAS DEL CONTEXTO VIVIDO A TRAVÉS DE UN LENGUAJE CUBIERTO DE IRONÍAS, UN RECURSO ESENCIAL PARA INCORPORAR EL DISCURSO DEL OTRO (EL GOBIERNO), CUESTIONARLO Y REVELARLO AL PÚBLICO. LECTOR LOS EUFEMISMOS DISIMULADORES DE LA REALIDAD. ASÍ, EN UNA INCURSIÓN EN LAS CRÓNICAS DE SARAMAGO, UNO ENCUENTRA POLOS ANTAGÓNICOS: LA DICTADURA DE SARAMAGO X; IRONÍA CONTRA EUFEMISMO; PORTUGAL X GOBIERNO MARCELISTA. EN UNA RELACIÓN CLARA ENTRE EL CONTEXTO HISTÓRICO Y LA LITERATURA, LA ESCRITURA SARAMAGUIANA DESENMASCARA EL OSTRACISMO DEL GOBIERNO Y DEPLORA LA FALTA DE POLITIZACIÓN DEL PUEBLO PORTUGUÉS. EN ESTA ÁREA, AL ABRIR EL CAMPO DE LA NUEVA HISTORIA CULTURAL A LA LITERATURA, ESTA INVESTIGACIÓN TIENE COMO OBJETIVO GENERAL ANALIZAR ASPECTOS POLÍTICOS DEL FIN DEL ESTADO NOVO, ESPECÍFICAMENTE DE 1972 Y 1973, A TRAVÉS DE LAS CRÓNICAS DEL ESCRITOR JOSÉ SARAMAGO PUBLICADO. EN EL LIBRO "LAS OPINIONES QUE DL TENÍA" (1990). PARA ELLO, UTILIZÓ UN MARCO TEÓRICO BASADO EN CHARTIER (1990), BORGES (2002) Y PESAVENTO (2003), ENTRE OTROS. ES DE DESTACAR QUE EL PRESENTE TRABAJO SE BASÓ EN DOCE CRÓNICAS CUYO ANÁLISIS REVERBERA LA PRIMERA INTERVENCIÓN CLARAMENTE POLÍTICA DE SARAMAGO EN PÚBLICO. EN TÉRMINOS GENERALES, ESTÁ CLARO QUE SARAMAGO CONCIBIÓ LA LITERATURA COMO UN ESPACIO GOBERNADO POR LA IMAGINACIÓN, SIN DESCUIDAR EL CONTEXTO SOCIAL-HISTÓRICO-CULTURAL Y ECONÓMICO EN EL QUE VIVÍA EN LA CONSTANTE ESCRITURA DE TEXTOS.

nm_producao: DO BACHARELISMO AO ATIVISMO JUDICIAL: CONTINUIDADES E RUPTURAS APÓS A ASSEMBLEIA NACIONAL CONSTITUINTE DE 1987/1988
ds_abstract: BRAZIL IS A COUNTRY WHOSE FORMATION HAS ACQUIRED ITS OWN CONTOURS, BEING ITS TRAJECTORY PECULIAR IN THE CONCERT OF THE NATIONS, WHICH, HOWEVER, DOES NOT IMPLY IN AVERSION TO EXOGENY. IN THIS SENSE, THE PRESENCE OF BACHELORHOOD THROUGHOUT OUR FORMATION AS A NATION-STATE IS CONSENSUAL, AND JURISTS WERE IMPORTANT FIGURES, OFTEN PROTAGONISTS, IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF OUR POLITICAL INSTITUTIONS. WITH THE ADVENT OF THE REVOLUTION OF 1930, THE BRAZILIAN STATE ENTERED INTO A PROCESS OF MODERNIZATION, DE-STRUCTURING THE OLIGARCHIC PACT THAT, ON ONE HAND, SUPPORTED THE PHENOMENA OF CORONELISM AND BACHELORHOOD, AND, ON THE OTHER HAND, WAS ALSO BASED ON THEMSELVES, ON A FEEDBACK DYNAMIC. HOWEVER, THE COLLAPSE OF THE AFOREMENTIONED POLITICAL SYSTEM DID NOT NECESSARILY CAUSE THE DEBACLE OF THE POLITICAL CULTURE THAT WAS SUBJACENT TO IT, SINCE THE IMAGINARY GENERATED BY IT, DEPENDING ON THE HISTORICAL-POLITICAL CONJUNCTURE, IS OFTEN RE-HEATED AND POPULATE THE COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS. THIS WAS THE CASE DURING THE 1987/88 CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY, WHICH WAS LEADED BY JURISTS WHO WERE GUIDED BY LEGAL CULTURE, WITH THE AIM OF ESTABLISHING A CONSTITUTIONAL STATE OF DEMOCRATIC LAW, THE CONSEQUENCE OF WHICH WAS, UNDER VARIOUS PRETEXTS, TO WIDEN THE BORDERS OF THE JUDICIARY IN THE INTERIOR OF THE BRAZILIAN POLITICAL FIELD. KEYWORDS: POWER; BACHELORHOOD; POLITICAL CULTURE; CONSTITUENT; JUDICIAL ACTIVISM.
nm_discente: YURY VIEIRA TUPYNAMBA DE LELIS MENDES

nm_producao: ELAS FIZERAM HISTÓRIA E A NOTÍCIA: A ENTRADA DE MULHERES EM RÁDIO E TV EM MONTES CLAROS (1979-1997)
ds_abstract: THE RESEARCH FOCUSES ON THE WOMEN'S ENTRY INTO THE PRESS IN MONTES CLAROS ON RADIO AND TV, TAKING INTO CONSIDERATION THAT THE ZYD-7, RADIO SOCIEDADE, ESTABLISHED IN THE 1940S, WAS THE ONLY STATION THAT EXISTED IN MONTES CLAROS IN THE TEMPORAL OF THIS WORK AND AT THE SAME TIME, A TELEVISION STATION WAS INAUGURATED, TV MONTES CLAROS. THIS MEANS GIVING HISTORICAL VISIBILITY TO THE FEMALE OCCUPATION IN THE JOURNALISTIC WORK MARKET. TAKING INTO ACCOUNT THE ROLE OF THE PRESS, IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT THESE WOMEN OCCUPIED PRIVILEGED PLACES OF SPEECH, WHERE IMPORTANT POWER PLAYS WERE GIVEN AND WHERE HISTORICALLY ONLY MALE NAMES STAND OUT. THEREFORE, THE OBJECTIVE WAS TO ANALYZE THE GENDER RELATIONS AND INEQUALITIES ESTABLISHED, AS WELL AS THE POWER RELATIONS, WITH THE PIONEERISM OF THE JOURNALISTS: VANDA GONÇALVES, ROSÂNGELA SILVEIRA, MARINA QUEIROZ AND LÍGIA ROCHA TUPY. THE CHOSEN THEME ALLOWED US TO OBSERVE THE MECHANISMS FOR THE EMERGENCE OF NEW SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS, WITH THEIR PRODUCTIONS OF NEW SENSES IN THE MONTES CLAROS OF THE 1980S. FOR THIS, THE RESEARCH LISTENED TO THESE FOUR WOMEN THROUGH THE ORAL HISTORY OF LIFE METHODOLOGY TO UNDERSTAND WHICH PATHS WERE COVERED IN ORDER FOR THEM TO ACHIEVE DIFFERENT ROLES IN WRITING, AS THEY HAVE ALL BEEN VERY SUCCESSFUL IN THEIR CAREERS. THE CHOSEN METHODOLOGY PRIVILEGES THE INTERVIEWER'S EXPERIENCE, AS WELL AS THE PERCEPTION OF THE RESEARCH SUBJECTS, TAKING INTO ACCOUNT THE SUBJECTIVITY OF EACH ONE, THE DISCOURSE ANALYSIS WAS NECESSARY SO THAT A NAIVE RELATIONSHIP WITH THE TESTIMONIES WAS NOT ESTABLISHED. AFTER ALL, MEMORY PRIVILEGES WHAT ONE WANTS TO EMPHASIZE AND WHEN STIMULATED, IT RE-SIGNIFIES THE PAST. METHODOLOGIES THAT COMPLEMENT EACH OTHER WELL, SINCE THE AD LEADS IN QUESTION THAT A DISCOURSE WILL BE EMBEDDED IN A HISTORICAL CONTEXT. THE CONCEPT OF GENDER AS A RELEVANT CATEGORY FOR THE HISTORIOGRAPHICAL ANALYSIS WAS ESSENTIAL IN THIS RESEARCH, SINCE IT AIDED IN THE PROBLEMATIZATION OF THE SOCIAL AND LABOR RELATIONS OF THESE WOMEN. FROM THIS POINT OF VIEW, IT WAS POSSIBLE TO VERIFY THAT GENDER RELATIONS DEFINED, HIERARCHIZED, AND CONSTRUCTED SEXUAL ROLES, BUT THAT IN THE POWER GAMES ESTABLISHED WITH THE JOURNALISTS' UNPRECEDENTED RESISTANCE, RESISTANCE MANIFESTED ITSELF AND THEREFORE THEY OCCUPIED IMPORTANT SPACES, BROKE PARADIGMS AND OPENED WAYS THAT OTHER WOMEN COULD ALSO PRACTICE THIS PROFESSION. A TREND IN MANY SECTORS IN THE 1980S.

nm_producao: MÍDIA E IMAGINÁRIO POLÍTICO EM TORNO DOS PROTESTOS DE RUA E O PROJETO MEMÓRIA GLOBO (1984-2013)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION AIMS TO ANALYZE THE TRANSFORMATIONS OF THE MEDIA DUE TO THE STREET PROTESTS POLITICAL IMAGINARY. THE TRADITIONAL MEDIA HAD MUCH INFLUENCE ON THE PROTESTS OF REDEMOCRATIZATION. IT MANAGED TO MANIPULATE, SOMETIMES TO REDUCE THE INTENSITY OF THE PROTESTS AS IN THE “DIRETAS JÁ,” OR TO INFLUENCE THE PEOPLE TO GO TO THE STREETS, AS IN THE MOVEMENT “CARAS PINTADAS.” THE MINISERIES “ANOS REBELDES” SPREAD WELL THE IDEAS FOR THE PROTESTERS TO TAKE TO THE STREETS IN 1992. ONE OF THE QUESTIONS OF THIS RESEARCH IS TO UNDERSTAND WHY THE PROJECT “MEMÓRIA GLOBO” NEGLECTED THIS PROTEST BECAUSE IN THE HISTORICAL TIME THE GLOBO TELEVISION NETWORK INFLUENCED THE YOUTH WITH THE MINISERIES. MEMÓRIA GLOBO WAS A PROJECT CREATED TO COMPLY WITH THE MARKETING CORE IDEAS OF THE COMPANY, THAT IS, A CREATION OF A NEW IDENTITY FOR ITSELF. THE HISTORICAL TIME OF THE PROJECT IS SUMMARIZED FROM 1999 TO 2004. DURING THIS PERIOD, THE BROADCAST NETWORK INTENDED TO MAKE A HISTORICAL/JOURNALISTIC REVIEW OF THE “WOUND” OF THE GLOBO ORGANIZATIONS, WHICH WAS REDEMOCRATIZATION. FINALLY, THIS TRAJECTORY TRACED FROM TRADITIONAL MEDIA AIMED TO UNDERSTAND THE TRANSFORMATIONS THAT OCCURRED IN THE MANIFESTATIONS OF JUNE 2013 IN BRAZIL THAT HAD THE METHODOLOGICAL CHANGE OF THE FORMATION OF THE POLITICAL IMAGINARY WITH THE ALTERNATIVE MEDIA AND ITS TECHNOLOGICAL INNOVATIONS.

nm_producao: “NÓS VIVIA NO TEMPO DO CATIVÊRO”: VIVÊNCIAS E TRAJETÓRIAS DE TRABALHADORES RURAIS BRASILMINENSES (1970-1990)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT DISSERTATION INTENDS TO DISCUSS HOW THE ECONOMIC ORGANIZATION AND DISORGANIZATION STRATEGIES BASED ON AGRICULTURAL ACTIVITY TOOK PLACE IN BRASÍLIA DE MINAS, WHOSE SOCIAL RELATIONS AND PRACTICES WERE GRADUALLY CHANGED IN THE LATE 1980S AND EARLY 1990S. IN THIS WAY, IT WAS POSSIBLE TO FIND FORMER RURAL WORKERS WHO, THROUGH THEIR DAILY NARRATIVES, BROUGHT US A PERSPECTIVE OF WORK ON RURAL PROPERTIES IN THE MUNICIPALITY WHERE SOCIAL RELATIONS DIVERGED WIDELY FROM WHAT THE 1963 RURAL WORKER STATUTE ADVOCATED. N THIS SENSE, FOLLOWING THE NARRATIVES OF THESE RURAL WORKERS IN THEIR DAILY WORK AND EXPERIENCES AMONG THEIR PEERS, EMPHASIZING THE TRANSFORMATIONS AND PERMANENCES SUFFERED BY THESE POPULATIONS DURING THE 1970S, 1980S AND 1990S HAS BECOME SOMETHING VALUABLE FOR UNDERSTANDING THE STRUCTURING OF THE CITY BRASÍLIA DE MINAS IN SUCH. AT THIS TIME, PERIPHERAL NEIGHBORHOODS WERE BEING RANDOMLY FORMED BY MIGRANTS FROM RURAL AREAS OF THE MUNICIPALITY, BRINGING IN THEIR LUGGAGE A MAKE AND A LIFE THAT GAVE THESE LOCALITIES PECULIAR CHARACTERISTICS, CONFRONTING THE WAY OF LIFE OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE CENTRAL PARTS OF THE CITY. THUS, GIVING VOICE TO THOSE HISTORICAL SUBJECTS BECAME OF PARAMOUNT IMPORTANCE TO UNDERSTAND THEIR STRUGGLES AND SURVIVAL STRATEGIES IN THE FACE OF THE SITUATIONS FOUND IN THEIR CONDITION AS WORKERS AND FORMER RURAL WORKERS AND LATER, MIGRANTS LIVING ON STREET SÃO FRANCISCO, NEIGHBORHOODS ALTO CLARO AND SANTA CRUZ, AKA ANDU.

nm_producao: POMPA E REQUINTE: MEMÓRIA VISUAL DO CANDOMBLÉ E DA UMBANDA EM MONTES CLAROS
ds_abstract: THIS WORK AIMS TO IDENTIFY THE VISUAL REPRESENTATIONS OF CANDOMBLÉ AND UMBANDA IN THE CITY OF MONTES CLAROS IN THE 1960S. FOR THIS, WE USE IMAGERY MATERIALS PRESENT IN ILLUSTRATED MAGAZINES, PERIODICALS AND IN FAMILY ALBUMS TO UNDERSTAND DISCOURSES AND VISIONS PRODUCED ON THESE RELIGIONS. WE HIGHLIGHT HOW EXTERNAL AND INTERNAL REPRESENTATIONS AND THEIR PROCESS OF TRANSFORMATION WERE MANIFESTED THAT PLACED THESE RELIGIONS AS PART OF FOLKLORIC MANIFESTATIONS ALONGSIDE CHRISTIAN GROUPS IN THE CITY. IN THIS WAY, THESE IDEAS WERE APPROPRIATED BY THE CITY'S ELITES TO THE PROCESS OF MODERNIZATION AND REGIONALIZATION THAT WAS IN FORCE AT THE TIME.

nm_producao: UM PATO ATORMENTADO E COLORIDO E UMA FAMÍLIA SOMBRIA E SUBMISSA NO III REICH: A PRODUÇÃO CULTURAL DE WALT DISNEY CONTRA O NAZISMO
ds_abstract: CINEMA IN THE UNITED STATES HAD ITS MOMENTS OF DISPUTE BETWEEN THOSE WHO WANTED TO DOMINATE THE CINEMATOGRAPHIC ART. HE GRADUALLY SHOWED HIMSELF AS AN EXTREMELY CAPTIVATING MEDIUM OF ENTERTAINMENT, CAPABLE OF GENERATING PROFIT. THIS WAS THE GREAT FEATURE OF UNITED STATES CINEMA, WHICH BECAME AN INDUSTRY, WHOSE LARGE-SCALE PRODUCTION, WITH ACCURATE TECHNIQUE, WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR PROVIDING THE LARGEST FILM CENTER IN THE WORLD: HOLLYWOOD. CINEMATOGRAPHIC PRODUCTIONS BEGAN TO USE THE CULTURAL ASPECTS OF THE UNITED STATES AND SPREAD THE WAY OF LIFE OF THE COUNTRY THROUGH THEIR FILMS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD. DURING WORLD WAR II THE FILMS WERE USED AS SUPPORT BECAUSE THEY HAD THE FUNCTION OF INFORMING THE POPULATION, OF CONVINCING THE NATION OF THE NEED TO SUPPORT THE STRUGGLE AND TO PROVIDE A FORM OF ENTERTAINMENT FOR THE CITIZENS. INSERTED IN THIS CONTEXT, THE ANIMATION CINEMA ALSO CONTRIBUTED WITH SEVERAL PRODUCTIONS BETWEEN LONG AND SHORT FILMS. AMONG THESE STUDIOS IT IS POSSIBLE TO HIGHLIGHT THE WORKS OF WALT DISNEY. THE DISNEY STUDIOS WERE RESPONSIBLE FOR PROVIDING THE LEVERAGE OF ANIMATED FILMS BECAUSE OF THEIR CREATIVITY. THESE FILMS, BOTH ANIMATED AND CONVENTIONAL, SOUGHT TO EXALT THE PATRIOTISM OF THE NATION AND VILIFY ENEMIES, AS WELL AS TO CONVINCE THE CITIZENS WHO WERE NOT ON THE FRONT TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE WAR EFFORT. IT WAS THROUGH THE FILMIC AND HISTORIOGRAPHIC ANALYSIS THAT THIS RESEARCH HIGHLIGHTED THE CHARACTERISTICS PRESENTED IN TWO ANIMATIONS MADE BY THE WALT DISNEY STUDIOS: DER FUEHRER'S FACE (1943) AND EDUCATION FOR DEATH: THE MAKING OF THE NAZI (1943). IT WAS POSSIBLE TO BRING THE REPRESENTATIONS OF THE ENEMY THAT ARE PRESENT IN THESE SOURCES. IN THIS WAY, THIS RESEARCH SEEKS TO HIGHLIGHT THE REPRESENTATIONS OF NAZI GERMANY BY THE WALT DISNEY STUDIOS, SHOWING HOW THE GERMAN ENEMY WAS REPRESENTED AND ITS MAIN CHARACTERISTICS.

nm_producao: UNDERGROUND DO METAL BELO-HORIZONTINO: SEPULTURA ENTRE REPRESENTAÇÕES E JOGOS DE PODER (1991-1996)
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS PRESENTS IS AN EXAMINATION ABOUT REPRESENTATIONS CREATED BY BRAZILIAN THRASH METAL BAND SEPULTURA IN HIS RECORDS ARISE, CHAOS A.D. AND ROOTS, WHOSE HISTORICAL PERIOD BEGAN IN 1991 UNTIL 1996. THIS SURVEY ALSO ANALYSES POWER RELATIONS INSIDE OF UNDERGROUND SCENE OF BELO HORIZONTE TO UNDERSTAND ON SPACES OF POWER, CULTURAL PRACTICES AND RELATIONSHIP AMONG ITS MEMBERS. THUS, TO GET RESULTS FOR THIS STUDY IT WAS NECESSARY TO USE INTERDISCIPLINARY STUDIES LIKE A THEORICAL-METHODOLOGICAL ORIENTATION AND BECAUSE IT WAS A WAY USED TO OVERCOME SOME BRAZILIAN HISTORIOGRAPHY PROBLEMS ON HEAVY METAL. THIS THESIS IS REASONED IN ETHNOGRAPHIC RESEARCH, SPECIALIZED BIBLIOGRAPHY, NEWSPAPERS, DOCUMENTARIES AND BRAZILIAN HEAVY METAL FANS¿ OPINION IN THEIR WEBSITES. IT IS SHOWN THAT URBAN POPULAR MUSIC LIKE SEPULTURA SONGS WERE BASED ON CULTURAL HYBRIDISM, WHERE THE MEDIA HAS BEEN A ONE OF BIGGEST RESPONSIBLE TO MIX CULTURAL ELEMENTS IN THE LAST DECADES. IN THIS SENSE, IT¿S POSSIBLE TO SPEAK THAT THERE ARE MEDIATED CULTURE WHICH ACTS PEOPLE¿S DAILY LIVES, SUCH AS IN THEIR CONCEPTIONS, CULTURAL PRACTICE, RELATIONSHIPS, POLITICAL OPINION AND WAYS OF DEALING WITH CULTURAL PRODUCTS. THEREFORE, SEPULTURA SONGS IN SYMBOLIC AND DISCURSIVE TERMS HAVE SHOWN A LOT OF ELEMENTS THAT BUILD MEANINGS WHICH HAVE POLITICAL CONNOTATIONS.

nm_producao: A COMUNIDADE QUILOMBOLA CORREDOR-MG: UMA IDENTIDADE EM CONSTRUÇÃO (1988-2019)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH AIMS TO ANALYZE THE TRAJECTORY OF THE QUILOMBOLA DO CORREDOR COMMUNITY, LOCATED IN SÃO FRANCISCO / MINAS GERAIS, HISTORICIZING THE PROCESS OF LEGAL RECOGNITION AND DAILY PRACTICES OF QUILOMBOLAS, RITUALS, CELEBRATIONS, RELIGIOUS TRADITIONS AND RELATIONS WITH THE WORK ON THE LAND, AS WELL AS THE PUBLIC POLICIES THAT THE COMMUNITY WAS ABLE TO ACCESS AFTER CERTIFICATION IN 2017, AND, ALSO, THE CONFLICTS AND CHALLENGES FACED BY THE SUBJECTS IN THIS RECOGNITION PROCESS. WE USED BIBLIOGRAPHIC RESEARCH TO UNDERSTAND SOME MEANINGS OF QUILOMBO IN BRAZILIAN HISTORIOGRAPHY AND TO DISCUSS THE CONSTRUCTION OF QUILOMBOLA IDENTITY IN THE PLACE. THE DISSERTATION PRESENTED HERE DIALOGUES WITH THE CONCEPT OF QUILOMBO/ QUILOMBOLA CONTEMPLATED IN DECREE 4887/2003. THROUGH ORAL HISTORY, WITH THE APPLICATION OF INTERVIEWS, WE UNDERSTAND HOW AND FROM WHICH INFLUENCES THE QUILOMBOLA IDENTITY WAS BUILT AND WHICH ELEMENTS OF MEMORY WERE USED AS MARKERS OF THAT IDENTITY. WE EMPHASIZE THAT THE RESEARCH MAY CONTRIBUTE TO THE UNDERSTANDING OF THE QUILOMBOLA CATEGORY THAT EMERGED AS A SUBJECT OF RIGHTS IN THE 1988 CONSTITUTION AND CURRENTLY MATERIALIZES IN SEVERAL QUILOMBOLA COMMUNITIES SPREAD THROUGHOUT BRAZIL, IN A CONSTANT STRUGGLE FOR IDENTITY RECOGNITION.

nm_producao: A ORGANIZAÇÃO POLÍTICA DOS MORADORES DO BAIRRO SANTOS REIS (MONTES CLAROS/MG): PODER, TRABALHO, IDENTIDADES E DESENVOLVIMENTO URBANO (1965-1989)
ds_abstract: THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS WORK IS TO ANALYZE THE ORGANIZATION OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE SANTOS REIS NEIGHBORHOOD IN THE POLICY OF MONTES CLAROS / MG BETWEEN 1965 AND 1989. IT WAS NOTICED THAT, THROUGH THE ANALYSIS OF THE MINUTES OF THE ASSOCIAÇÃO DOS AMIGOS DO BAIRRO SANTOS REIS, OF THE REQUIREMENTS OF COUNCILORS OF THE MONTES CLAROS CITY COUNCIL AND ALSO THROUGH INTERVIEWS, WHICH THE LOCAL INHABITANTS ACQUIRED AWARENESS AND POLITICAL ORGANIZATION TO FIGHT FOR THE URBAN IMPROVEMENTS OF THEIR REGION. THUS, THE STRUGGLES OF THE RESIDENTS WERE FUNDAMENTAL IN THE CONQUEST OF THEIR RIGHTS.

nm_producao: A TEOLOGIA DA CONFISSÃO POSITIVA DO PASTOR ESTADUNIDENSE KENNETH HAGIN E AS RELEITURAS DO MISSIONÁRIO R.R. SOARES NO BRASIL: A CONSTRUÇÃO DE UMA IDENTIDADE RELIGIOSA HÍBRIDA (1980-2010)
ds_abstract: AROUND THE 1960S AND 1970S, ONE OF THE MOST WIDESPREAD THEOLOGIES IN THE WORLD TODAY EMERGED IN THE UNITED STATES, THE SO-CALLED THEOLOGY OF POSITIVE CONFESSION. AS THE AMERICAN PASTOR KENNETH HAGIN WAS ITS CREATOR AND ONE OF ITS MAIN PROMOTERS, THIS RELIGIOUS DISCOURSE REACHED ALL THE UNITED STATES AND SEVERAL PARTS OF THE WORLD, ALSO REACHING BRAZIL. ON BRAZILIAN SOIL, THE POSITIVE CONFESSION ARRIVED IN THE 1980S, WITH MISSIONARY ROMILDO RIBEIRO SOARES (R.R. SOARES) AS ITS MAIN REPRESENTATIVE, BEING WIDELY ACCEPTED BY A LARGE NUMBER OF EVANGELICALS AND NON-EVANGELICALS, AT THE SAME TIME THAT IT WAS STRONGLY CRITICIZED BY TRADITIONAL PASTORS AND THEOLOGIANS. IN THIS SENSE, THIS WORK HAS THE GENERAL OBJECTIVE OF UNDERSTANDING HOW THE AMERICAN RELIGIOUS IDENTITY EXPRESSED IN KENNETH HAGIN'S THEOLOGICAL WORKS, WAS APPROPRIATED AND RE-SIGNIFIED BY MISSIONARY ROMILDO RIBEIRO SOARES IN BRAZIL. AS A DOCUMENTARY CORPUS FOR ANALYSIS, WE USED THE WORKS WRITTEN BY PASTORS KENNETH HAGIN AND R.R. SOARES PUBLISHED IN THE COUNTRY THROUGH GRAÇA EDITORIAL, WITH A TIME FRAME BETWEEN THE YEARS 1980 AND 2010. IN ADDITION, WE CARRIED OUT EXTENSIVE BIBLIOGRAPHIC RESEARCH ON THE SUBJECT IN BOTH AMERICAN AND BRAZILIAN AUTHORS AND USED THE REFLECTIONS OF SOCIOLOGIST STUART HALL AND THE HISTORIAN ROGER CHARTIER ON THE “IDENTITY DYNAMICS IN THE MODERN WORLD” AND THE "HISTORY OF READING".
nm_discente: MARLON ANDREY NUNES DA SIL VA

nm_producao: “AVANTE PORTEIRINHENSES PELA GLÓRIA DE DEUS!”: ESPAÇO DE SOCIABILIDADE E RELIGIOSIDADE NA PORTEIRINHA DOS ANOS 1938 A 1959
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH AIMS TO ANALYZE THE EXISTING RELATIONS BETWEEN THE CHURCH AND THE SOCIETY OF PORTEIRINHA, LOCATED IN THE EXTREME NORTH OF MINAS-GERAIS, FROM ITS EMANCIPATION, IN 1938, AFTER ALMOST FORTY YEARS OF THE ADVENT OF THE REPUBLIC AND THE ESTABLISHMENT OF SECULARISM IN THE COUNTRY. BASED ON A CRITICAL ANALYSIS OF HISTORICAL DOCUMENTS PRODUCED MAINLY BY THE CATHOLIC CHURCH, AS WELL AS THE METHODOLOGICAL-THEORETICAL USE, WITH A VIEW, ABOVE ALL, TO THE ANALYSIS OF THE SPEECHES OF THE MAIN SOCIAL AGENTS OF THAT PERIOD, WE SOUGHT TO INVESTIGATE THE HISTORICAL URBAN AND SOCIAL SPACE, TO UNDERSTAND HOW THE CHURCH, THROUGH THE SO-CALLED CATHOLIC ROMANIZATION PROCESS, HAS TAKEN ROOT IN THE MOST VARIED SPHERES OF THAT SOCIABILITY SPACE, ESPECIALLY IN RELIGION, FAMILY, POLITICS, INFLUENCING THE CITY'S CIVILIZING PROCESS. THE HYPOTHESIS THAT WE BELIEVE TO BE VIABLE TO ANSWER OUR QUESTIONS IS THAT, WITH THE LOSS OF SYMBOLIC POWER, THE RESULT OF THE SECULARIZATION OF SOCIETY, THE RESULT OF THE EMANCIPATION OF THE REPUBLIC AND THE END OF THE PATRONAGE, THE CHURCH, THROUGH ITS ECCLESIASTICAL REPRESENTATIVE, PARISH PRIEST JULIÃO ARROYO GALLO, ARTICULATES WITH THE LOCAL POWER TO CIVILIZE THE CONDUCT AND BEHAVIOR OF INDIVIDUALS, AS PART OF A HEGEMONIC DISPOSITION OF POWER. FROM THESE SYMBOLIC EXCHANGES, THE CHURCH MAINTAINED ITS FAITHFUL, AND AS A CONSEQUENCE, THE RULING POWER, HAD SOCIAL CONTROL AT ITS DISPOSAL, CONVERGING, FINALLY, IN REACHING THE ASPIRATIONS OF ORDER OF THE POLITICAL AND RELIGIOUS FIELDS, INTENDED BY THE GOVERNMENT GETÚLIO VARGAS AND THE BRAZILIAN BISHOPRIC, THROUGH THE LEADERSHIP OF THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IN BRAZIL.

nm_producao: CAETANISMO E BRAZILIANISMO: UM ESTUDO SOBRE A POLÍTICA DE SÃO FRANCISCO/MG (1924-1977)
ds_abstract: THIS WORK AIMS TO STUDY THE HISTORY OF SÃO FRANCISCO / MG FROM THE EMERGENCE AND PERFORMANCE OF TWO POLITICAL GROUPS, CALLED CAETANISMO AND BRAZILIANISMO, IN THE PERIOD FROM 1924 TO 1977. IT IS A HISTORICAL STUDY THAT FOLLOWED QUALITATIVE THEORETICAL-METHODOLOGICAL PRACTICES, AND THAT WAS GUIDED BY THE CONTRIBUTIONS OF AUTHORS OF THE NEW POLITICAL HISTORY WHOSE SUBSIDIES WERE PERTINENT TO DISCUSS THE SPHERE OF THE POWER IN THE CITY. THE DOCUMENTARY CORPUS FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS RESEARCH CONSISTED OF SOURCES SUCH AS OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS, MEMORY BOOKS, MINUTES OF THE CITY COUNCIL, LEGAL PROCEEDINGS, LOCAL PRESS AND ORAL SOURCES. DATA ANALYSIS WAS PERFORMED IN A CRITICAL AND PROBLEMATIC WAY. THE PREVAILING POLITICAL MEMORY IN SAN FRANCISCO INDICATES A SCENARIO OF INTENSE CONFLICTS BETWEEN CAETANISM AND BRAZILIANISM, CULMINATING IN HOSTILITY BETWEEN THE PATRIARCHS OF THE GROUPS: OSCAR CAETANO GOMES AND BRASILIANO BRAZ, A FACT THAT WAS PROPERLY REJECTED BY OUR REFLECTIONS. THE RESULTS OF THE RESEARCH REVEAL THAT BRAZILIANISM ORIGINATES FROM CAETANISM, WITH A SUBSEQUENT SPLIT. IT WAS NOTICED WITH THE INVESTIGATION THAT THE GROUPS CONSIDERED RIVALS AND ANTAGONISTS SHARE THE SAME INTERESTS AND DOMINANT SPEECHES OF POLITICAL POWER. ON THIS WAY, THE GROUPS OPERATE WITH OVERBEARING AND PATRONAGE SYSTEMS AND TRIGGER SYMBOLIC VALUES TO MAINTAIN POWER AND ENHANCE POLARIZATION IN THE CITY. THE ANALYSIS OF THE SOURCES INDICATES A CORRESPONDING DISAGREEMENT BETWEEN HISTORY AND POLITICAL MEMORY IN THE CITY, ESPECIALLY THE ONE BUILT AND DISSEMINATED BY THE BRAZILIANISTS.
nm_discente: FABIOLA AGUIAR SANTOS NUNES E SOARES

nm_producao: CASSIANO RICARDO E JORGE AMADO: PROJETOS IDENTITÁRIOS NA LITERATURA E NA IMPRENSA 1940-1943
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH, WHOSE NATURE IS ORIENTED TO STUDY OF PROJECTS AIMED AT NATIONAL IDENTITY AND POLITICAL PROCESSES, INTENDS TO SPECIFICALLY DISCUSS THE POLITICAL MILITANCY AND THE POLITICAL PROCESSES, INTENDS TO SPECIFICALLY DISCUSS THE POLITICAL MILITANCY AND THE NATION’S LITERARY PROJECTS: CASSIANO RICARDO AND JORGE AMADO IN THE SPACES OF LITERATURE AND THE PRESS DURING THE ESTADO NOVO. IT IS SUMMARILY NECESSARY FOR THIS DISSERTATION TO THINK AND PROBLEMATIZE THE PATHS CHOSEN AND FOLLOWED BY THE AUTHORS AND THE SPACES IN WHICH THEY BUILT THEIR NATION PROJECTS. THE AUTHORS’ LITERATURE IS NOT ONLY FOUND ON THE PAGES WRITTEN BY THEM, THEY CREATE MEANING FOR INVESTIGATION OF HISTORY AS WE THINK UNITED TO THE LIFE AND SOCIAL CONFLICTS OF THE TIME OF THE WRITER. THE NEWSPAPER A MANHÃ, FROM RIO DE JANEIRO, CONTRIBUTED BY CASSIANO RICARDO AND THE NEWSPAPER O IMPARCIAL DA BAHIA, IN WHICH JORGE AMADO WROTE, WERE FRUITFUL SOURCES FOR THE RESEARCH, IN ADDITION TO THE NOVEL O CAVALEIRO DA ESPERANÇA, BY JORGE AMADO AND THE BOOK OF POEMS, MARTIM CERERÊ, BY CASSIANO RICARDO. THUS, HAVING THE YEARS 1940 TO 1943AS A TIME FRAME, WE QUESTION HOW THE POLITICAL PRACTICES OF THE AFOREMENTIONED AUTHORS INFLUENCED LITERARY CREATIONS IN A WAY THAT LED TO FORMULATIONS OF DIFFERENT IDEAS OF NATION. THUS, THE PRIMARY OBJECTIVE WAS TO ANALYZE THE LITERARY PRACTICES OF THESE AUTHORS WHO EXPERIENCED THE ESTADO NOVO, SEEKING TO UNDERSTAND THE VARIOUS RELATIONSHIPS ESTABLISHED BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT AND/OR POLITICAL PARTIES AND THE INTELLECTUALS OF THE TIME AND THE EXTENT TO WHICH THE DICTATORSHIP OF THE ESTADO NOVO INFLUENCED THESE PERCEPTIONS AND IN LITERARY CREATIONS THEMSELVES. THUS, WE ANALYZED THE SOURCES OF THE PRESS AND LITERATURE TOGETHER, OBSERVING THE POSSIBLE DIALOGUES BETWEEN THEM, AS WELL AS THE INTERACTIONS BETWEEN LITERATURE AND HISTORY, THINKING IN NEW ASPECTS ABOUT THE DICTATORSHIP OF THE ESTADO NOVO.

nm_producao: ENTRE HYDE E JEKYLL: EM BUSCA DO BURGUÊS VITORIANO ATRAVÉS DAS REPRESENTAÇÕES DE ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK ANALYZES THE REPRESENTATIONS CONTAINED IN THE LITERARY WORK STRANGE CASE OF DR. JEKYLL AND MR. HYDE, A TITLE TRANSLATED AND ADAPTED FOR THE BRAZILIAN PUBLIC AS O MÉDICO E O MONSTRO, WRITTEN BY THE SCOTTISH AUTHOR ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON AND PUBLISHED IN 1886. IN STEVENSON'S FICTIONAL REPRESENTATION, WHEN NARRATING THE WELL-KNOWN STORY OF THE DOCTOR WHO SUCCEEDS, USING A POTION, PROJECTING A CONCENTRATE OF PURE EVIL, WE CAN FIND SEVERAL ELEMENTS THAT HELP US TO UNDERSTAND HOW BOURGEOIS MEN FROM THE VICTORIAN ERA ACTED, THOUGHT AND FELT. INITIALLY, AN ANALYSIS OF THE WORK WAS CARRIED OUT IN RELATION TO THE LITERATURE PRODUCED IN THE VICTORIAN PERIOD AND THE CONSEQUENCES OF ITS FRAMING IN A GENRE CLOSE TO THE FANTASTIC. WE CHOSE TO HIGHLIGHT CERTAIN THEMES THAT REFLECT THE TRACES FOUND IN STEVENSON'S PROSE, SUCH AS AGGRESSIVENESS, SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNOLOGICAL DEVELOPMENT OF THE PERIOD AND THE VICTORIAN MORAL, SINCE THESE ARE THEMES THAT ARE REPEATED IN THE FICTIONAL REPRESENTATION OF THE SCOTTISH AUTHOR.

nm_producao: ENTRE O “INIMIGO”, O “JUSTICEIRO”, O “HERÓI” E O “CIDADÃO DE BEM”: O CRIME-ESPETÁCULO E AS REPRESENTAÇÕES CRIMINAIS NA TELA DA TV (2010-2019)
ds_abstract: THIS ESSAY HAS ANALYZED HOW THE VIOLENCE MEDIA COVERAGE, USED BY TELEVISION PROGRAMMING AS AN INSTRUMENT, REACHES THE PROCESS OF EXPLOITING CRIMINAL REPRESENTATIONS, TRANSFORMING THE PHENOMENON OF CRIMINALITY INTO A MEDIA SPECTACLE. THE OBJECTIVE HAS BEEN THE COMPREHENSION OF THE SET OF MEANINGS OPERATED BY THE NARRATIVE CONFIGURATIONS OF TELEVISION PRODUCTS, WHICH BRINGS THE VIOLENCE AS TO REALITY ON THE TV SCREEN AND PROJECTING THE IMPRESSIONS THAT SOCIETY MAKES ABOUT INDIVIDUALS INVOLVED IN THIS CONTEXT AND THEIR POSITION THEY OCCUPY IN THE CRIMINALITY DYNAMICS. AS A CULTURAL PRODUCT CAPABLE OF DEVELOPING MEANINGS AND GIVING MEANING TO SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS, THE RESEARCH PROBLEM INCLUDES THE REACH OF TV IN THE DISSEMINATION AND RATIFICATION OF THESE REPRESENTATIONS AND QUESTIONS HOW, THROUGH THE ARTICULATION OF THE MEDIA SHOW, SOCIAL ACTORS ARE POSITIONED THROUGH CRIMINAL REPRESENTATIONS IN ORDER TO REACH THE CATEGORIES OF HERO, VIGILANTE, VILLAIN AND VICTIM. THE RESEARCH IS JUSTIFIED BY THE INTEREST IN ANALYZING ASPECTS OF LEGAL-CRIMINAL DOGMATICS FROM THE PERSPECTIVE OF INTERDISCIPLINARITY, THROUGH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE MEDIATIZATION OF VIOLENCE REFLECTS PERSPECTIVES THAT ARE LINKED TO SPEECHES AND PERCEPTIONS OF THE LAW. THE RESEARCH OBJECT WAS THE MEDIA PRODUCTION MADE BY CRIMINAL REALITY PROGRAMS WITH A FOCUS ON POLICE DAILY LIFE. THE SOURCE OF THE RESEARCH WAS THE OPERAÇÃO DE RISCO (2010-2019) AND POLÍCIA 24 HORAS (2010-2019), ATTRACTIONS OF THE POLICE GENRE, THAT WE UNDERSTAND, AS REPRESENTATIVE OF THE AESTHETICS OF DOCUMENTARY REALITY AND INFORMATIVE ENTERTAINMENT.SELECTED BY THEMATIC AND SAMPLING CRITERIA, THE DOCUMENTATION ANALYZED BRINGS AS THEORETICAL AND METHODOLOGICAL PERSPECTIVE THE BASES OF THE NEW CULTURAL HISTORY AND THE PRESENT TIME HISTORY, FOCUSING ON THE RELATIONSHIP OF HISTORY WITH OTHER AREAS OF KNOWLEDGE THROUGH THE THEORY OF SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS AND ASPECTS OF SOCIAL COMMUNICATION AND THE LAW. IN THIS SENSE, RESULTING IN AN ANALYSIS OF HOW VIOLENCE REACHES SYMBOLIC ASPECTS AGAINST CRIME, THE RESEARCH DEMONSTRATE HOW THE PROGRAMS EMPHASIZE THE SOCIAL REPRESENTATION OF THE PUBLIC SECURITY OFFICERS WORK AND, ALSO THROUGH THE MEANINGS FOUND IN THE SPEECHES THROUGHOUT THE POLICE NARRATIVE AND ARE CONNECTED WITH CRIMINOLOGICAL SPEECHES. THEREFORE IT’S POSSIBLE TO REALIZE HOW THE MEDIA REPRESENTS THE FACTS AND SUBJECTS PLACED IN THE UNIVERSE OF CRIMINALITY IT HAS SHOWN THE SOCIAL PRACTICES THAT REVEAL THE WAY IN WHICH THE MESSAGES IN THE PROGRAMS ARE OWNED BY THE VIEWERS AND WHICH USES AND INTERPRETATIONS ARE MOBILIZED IN THE RECEPTION PROCESS, ALLOWING THE MEDIATIZATION OF CRIMINALITY TO HAVE MEANING AND TO PROVIDE MEANINGS TO SPEECHES ABOUT VIOLENCE.

nm_producao: FAMÍLIA E RELIGIÃO EM TORNO DO PLC 122/2006: DEBATES DA PROPOSTA DA CRIMINALIZAÇÃO DA HOMOFOBIA NO CENÁRIO POLÍTICO-CULTURAL BRASILEIRO (2001-2014)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH AIMS TO INVESTIGATE THE MOTIVATIONS THAT CAUSED BILL N. 122/2006, WHICH AIMED TO CRIMINALIZE HOMOPHOBIA, WAS DEFINITIVELY FILED. PLC 122/2006, FORMERLY PL 5003/2001, HAS BEEN IN THE NATIONAL CONGRESS FOR APPROXIMATELY 13 YEARS WITHOUT BEING VOTED ON. THE BILL WAS VOTED ON IN THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, BUT WAS FILED IN THE FEDERAL SENATE, BEING ATTACHED TO THE REFORM BILL OF THE NEW PENAL CODE AND SUBSEQUENTLY FILED. IN THIS SENSE, SEEKING TO UNDERSTAND THESE MOTIVATIONS WE PERFORM A DISCOURSE ANALYSIS AS A METHODOLOGICAL OPTION FOR THE STUDY OF OUR DOCUMENTATION WHICH IS THE PLC ITSELF 122/2006. FOR THIS ANALYSIS, WE SELECTED AND SEPARATED THE SPEECHES OF DEPUTIES AND SENATORS DELIVERED IN THE NATIONAL CONGRESS MADE AVAILABLE BY TACHYGRAPHIC NOTES BY CONGRESS AND INVOLVING PLC 122/2006 IN THEMATIC CATEGORIES. THE PREDOMINANT DISCOURSES WERE IDENTIFIED AND SELECTED IN THE THEMES: IN DEFENSE OF THE FAMILY AND RELIGION. IN OTHER CASES, WE USED DEMONSTRATIONS, LETTERS SENT TO CONGRESS, AND NEWS SITE THAT INVOLVE THE PROCESSING OF THE PROJECT AND THAT PROVED ESSENTIAL ALONG WITH THE ANALYSIS OF THE PLC 122/2006 PROCEDURE. OUR THEORETICAL CONTRIBUTION IS BASED ON POLITICAL CULTURES, SO THAT WE CAN UNDERSTAND IN GENERAL NOT ONLY THE FIELD OF THE POLITICIAN, BUT ALSO THE ARTICULATIONS OF PARLIAMENTARIANS IN THE PUBLIC SPACE. THUS, UNDERSTANDING THE POWER RELATIONS AND DISPUTES OF THE POLITICAL SCENARIO AROUND PLC 122/2006 IS PART OF THIS STUDY THAT AIMS TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE DISCUSSION ABOUT THE SYMBOLIC DISPUTES OF POWER IN THE FIELD OF SOCIAL HISTORY.

nm_producao: FERROVIÁRIAS: IDENTIDADE E REPRESENTAÇÃO SOCIAIS DAS MULHERES NA EXTINTA REDE FERROVIÁRIA FEDERAL (1975 – 1985)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK SEEKS TO ANALYZE THE HISTORICALLY CONSTRUCTED SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS OF WHAT IT WAS TO BE A “RAILWAY WOMAN” FOR THE WORKERS OF THE EXTINCT FEDERAL RAILWAY NETWORK, AT THE BELO HORIZONTE BRANCH IN THE NORTH OF MINAS GERAIS. IT IS INTENDED TO REFLECT THE SILENCE IN THE OFFICIAL SOURCES OF THE HISTORY OF RAILWAY WOMEN WHO ENTERED THE STATIONS AND SOUGHT SPACE IN AN ESSENTIALLY MASCULINE PLACE, WHICH OFTEN REINFORCED PREJUDICE AND DISMISSED THE POSSIBILITY OF LOOKING AT THESE WORKERS AS DISTINCT HISTORICAL SUBJECTS. OBSERVING VISUAL RECORDS OF THE RAILWAY, WHEN IT WAS BUILT TO CONNECT BELO HORIZONTE TO THE NORTH OF THE STATE, THERE IS AN ABSENCE OF REPRESENTATION OF WOMEN WORKERS. IN SEVERAL COMMEMORATIVE PHOTO BOOKS ON THE HISTORY OF THE RAILROAD, ONE CAN SEE THE ABSENCE OF THESE WOMEN, WHETHER THOSE WHO ARRIVED AT THE BEGINNING WITH THE RAILS TO WORK PRECARIOUSLY OR EVEN THOSE WHO ENTERED THE STATIONS LATER THROUGH PUBLIC TENDER. BUT IN THE LATE 1970S AND EARLY 1980S THE "RAILWAY WOMEN" BEGAN TO BE REPRESENTED IN THE NETWORK'S OFFICIAL COMMUNICATION VEHICLES. WITH THIS OBJECTIVE WE INTEND TO ANALYZE THE DISCOURSES RELATED TO THE IDENTITY THAT ONE WANTED TO BUILD ABOUT WHAT IT WAS TO BE A RAILWAY AND WHAT WAS THE EXPECTED BEHAVIOR OF THESE WOMEN. FOR THIS PURPOSE, THE SOURCE OF THE RESEARCH WILL BE THE OFFICIAL NEWSPAPERS “SR2 NOTÍCIAS”, FROM 1980 AND ALSO EDITIONS OF THE NEWSPAPER “EXPRESSO”, FROM THE SOCIAL SECURITY RAILWAY FOUNDATION, FROM 1981 TO 1983. THE OBJECTIVE IS, THEREFORE, TO ANALYZE THE VISUAL REPRESENTATIONS. AND DISCURSIVE AND ITS EFFECTS AS PRACTICE OF MEANING, CONSTRUCTION OF IDENTITY AND / OR EXCLUSION OF THOSE WHO DID NOT FOLLOW THE NORMS ASSIGNED TO RAILWAY WOMEN. THEREFORE, WE SEEK TO KNOW WHICH MODELS OF IDENTIFICATION AND DIFFERENTIATION THESE WOMEN SHOULD FOLLOW TO BE SOCIALLY ACCEPTED IN THAT ENVIRONMENT, WITHIN THE CONTEXT OF RAILWAY IDENTITY. IN THE COURSE OF THE WORK, TO ENRICH THE ANALYSIS, PHOTOS WILL ALSO BE USED IN FAMILY ALBUMS, AIMING TO IDENTIFY THE REPRESENTATIONS THAT WERE CREATED ABOUT RAILWAY WOMEN AND WHETHER THEY IMPUTED AN IDENTITY TO THESE WOMEN WITHIN THE RAILWAY CATEGORY.

nm_producao: MULHERES PASTORAS DA CONVENÇÃO BATISTA BRASILEIRA: DESOBEDIÊNCIA FEMININA FRENTE AO PATRIARCADO CRISTÃO NO PERÍODO DE 1990 A 2020
ds_abstract: THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS WORK WAS TO PROBLEMATIZE THE PERFORMANCE OF WOMEN IN THE PASTORSHIP, INSIDE THE BAPTISTE CHURCH OF THE BRAZILIAN BAPTISTE CONVENTION, FROM 1990 TO 2020, TO UNDERSTAND THE POWER GAMES ON THE PROCESS AND HOW SOME FEMALE MINISTERS OPERATE A DISPLACEMENT IN TRADITIONAL THEOLOGY, BY THE REINTERPRETATION OF BIBLICAL TEXT. THE INTEREST FOR THIS RESEARCH CAME FROM TAKING KNOWLEDGE OF A GREAT STIR INSIDE THE BAPTIST DENOMINATION, IN WHICH THE CENTER OF DISCUSSIONS WAS THE LEGITIMACY OF THE PRACTICE OF FEMALE PASTORSHIP. FROM THIS PREMISSE, IT HAS BEEN INVASTIGATED THE ROLE OF WOMEN INSIDE THE ORDER, THE INFLUENCES OF PATRIARCHY IN CHRISTIAN RELIGIONS AND HOW COLONIALITY WORKS IN WAYS TO REINFORCE THE STIGMAS OF GENDER AND FEMALE SUBMISSION. THE METHODOLOGY USED WAS QUALITATIVE RESEARCH BY INTERVIEWS SEMI-STRUCTURED WITH FIVE FEMALE MINISTERS FROM DIFERENTE CITIES: MONTES CLAROS- MG, ARAGUARI- MG, VITÓRIA-ES, CONCEIÇÃO DE MACABAÚ- RJ, MACEIÓ- AL. ALSO, THERE WAS ANALYSED EXCERTPTS FROM TEXTS PUBLISHED BY THE FEMALE MINISTERS, SUBJECTS OF THIS RESEARCH, IN THE LIGHT OF DISCOURSE ANALYSIS. THE MAIN GUIDING HYPOTHESIS OF THIS RESEARCH WAS WONDERING IF MANY OF THESE WOMEN HAVE BEEN PERPETUATING THE IDEA OF RECOMMENDED SUBMISSION IN CHURCH´S HISTORY OR, WHEN BEING ORDERED, THIS WOMEN CAN OCCUPY POWER PLACES TRADICIONALLY FORBIDDEN FOR THEM, SUPPORTED BY THE BIBLE ITSELF AND AT THE FEELING OF RUPTURE WITH THE COLONIZER PRACTICES, FROM THE CHRISTIAN PATRIARCHY, HAVING THE CONCEPT OF DECOLONIALITY. THE RESULTS POINT THAT: THE IDEAL OF SUBMISIVE WOMAN STILL PREDOMINANT INSIDE CHURCH; THAT THE OBSTACLES ON THE PROCESS OF ORDINATION OF THE FEMALE MINISTERS PERSIST BY THE POWER OF THE ORDER OF BRAZILIAN BAPTIST MINISTERS. INSIDE THE DENOMINATION, SOME EVEN ACCEPT THE ORDINATION, BUT ARE KEPT AS AUXILIARY, NOT AS MINISTERS/PRESIDENT BECAUSE THIS MEANS TO CONDUCT BEHAVIOR; THAT SOME FEMALE MINISTERS PROPOSE A NEW REVIEW OF THE BIBLE AND, BY DOING THIS, THEY SEARCH FOR A DISPLACEMENT, A RUPTURE FROM TRADITIONAL READING THAT REINFORCE THE COLONIALITY AND PATRIARCHALIZATION, CONSEQUENTLY, THE DOMINATION AND SUBMISSION OF WOMEN. IT IS ALSO POINTED THAT THERE IS, IN FACT, A COPING WITH EXCLUSION OF THE WOMEN, INSIDE THE BRAZILIAN BAPTISTE CONVENTION AND THE ACTION OF THE FEMALE MINISTERS ALREADY POINT OUT A NEW PATH, BECAUSE THEY HAVE STARTED TO SHAKE THE OLD STRUCTURES OF THE COLONIAL PATRIARCHY, STARRING A NEW THEOLOGICAL CELL, INDICATOR OF THE RETURN TO THE EARLY CHURCH OF JESUS OF NAZARETH.

nm_producao: NOVOS TRABALHOS, VELHAS RESPONSABILIDADES: NARRATIVAS DE MULHERES DA POLÍCIA CIVIL DE MONTES CLAROS/MG (1992-2019)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH AIMED TO UNDERSTAND THE HISTORICAL CONTEXT OF THE OPENING OF THE BRAZILIAN POLICE TO THE INSERTION OF WOMEN, AS WELL AS THE MAINTENANCE OF THE FEMALE PRESENCE IN THESE SPACES. AS IS WELL KNOWN, THERE ARE STILL FEW RELATED ACADEMIC PRODUCTIONS THAT INVESTIGATE THE CATEGORY OF POLICE WOMEN, ESPECIALLY WHEN THE INSTITUTION IS THE CIVIL POLICE, SINCE A LARGE PART OF THE SCIENTIFIC PRODUCTION ON THE SUBJECT HAS A GREATER FOCUS ON MILITARIZED INSTITUTIONS. FROM THIS, IT WAS JUSTIFIED TO INVESTIGATE AND ANALYZE THE PROCESSES CONCERNING THE INSERTION AND CONSTITUTION OF WOMEN IN CIVIL POLICE, SINCE WOMEN HAVE INCREASINGLY CONQUERED THEIR SPACE IN THE LABOR MARKET AND ESPECIALLY IN PROFESSIONS HISTORICALLY CONSTRUCTED AS ESSENTIALLY MALE, IN ORDER TO ADD TO THE ACADEMIC PRODUCTION ON THE SUBJECT. BEARING IN MIND THAT WOMEN ALREADY MAKE UP AN EXPRESSIVE NUMBER OF POLICE OFFICERS IN BRAZIL, BUT ARE NOT YET REPRESENTED IN IDEAL PROPORTIONS MAINLY IN THE HIGHEST POSITIONS IN THE HIERARCHY, THE OBJECTIVE WAS TO INVESTIGATE THE REASONS FOR THE INEQUALITIES PRESENT IN THE SCOPE OF THE WORK OF CIVIL POLICE. TOGETHER, THE OBJECTIVE WAS TO ANALYZE THE PHENOMENA THAT OCCUR IN WORK RELATIONS ORIGINATED BY THE INSTANCE OF POWER AND GENDER. TO ACHIEVE THE RESEARCH OBJECTIVES, THE ORAL LIFE HISTORY METHODOLOGY WAS USED IN ORDER TO TRANSFORM THE REPORTS INTO HISTORICAL SOURCES FOR ANALYSIS. THUS, INTERVIEWS WERE CONDU-CTED WITH TWELVE FEMALE POLICE OFFICERS WHO WORK OR HAVE WORKED IN THE CITY OF MONTES CLA-ROS/MG. THE TIME FRAME OF THE RESEARCH - WHICH MAKES UP ITS TITLE - WAS DETERMINED ACCORDING TO THE YEAR OF INSERTION OF THE OLDEST EMPLOYEE (1992) UNTIL THE YEAR OF THE INTERVIEWS (2019). IT WAS NOTICED THAT THE PRESENCE OF WOMEN IN THE POLICE HAS BEEN SHOWN TO BE A HISTORICAL MOVE-MENT THAT CAUSED AND STILL CAUSES CONSTANT CHANGES IN THE PUBLIC SECURITY SCENARIO IN BRAZIL. IN THIS WAY, THIS RESEARCH WAS AN EXERCISE OF INVESTIGATION AND REFLECTION REGARDING THE FIELD OF DISPUTES AROUND GENDER RELATIONS, PRESENT IN THE WHOLE SOCIETY AND WHICH ARE EXPERIENCED BY WOMEN AND WHICH WERE REPORTED BY THE CIVIL POLICE.

nm_producao: RAGE AGAINST THE MACHINE: FÚRIA CONTRA A MANIPULAÇÃO NOS EUA (1992-1999)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH PRESENTS THE ARTISTIC CONSTRUCTION OF THE NORTH AMERICAN BAND RAGE AGAINST THE MACHINE, EXPLORING THEIR GROUP LÍDER¿S HABITUS, THROUGH THEIR SOCIAL EXPERIENCE THAT INFLUENCED THE BAND¿S IDEOLOGICAL POSITIONS, THAT TAKE SHAPE IN THE THREE ORIGINAL ALBUMS DURING THE 1990¿S: RAGE AGAINST THE MACHINE, EVIL EMPIRE AND THE BATTLE FOR LOS ANGELES. PAST THIS FIRST MOMENT, SOUGHT TO BRING TO LIGHT THE CONTRADICTION PRESENT IN THE ANTI-CAPITALIST/ ANTI-SYSTEM DISCOURSE OF THE BAND, THAT EARNED A LOT OF MONEY DUE TO THE SUCCESS AND ALSO SIGNED A CONTRACT WITH A MAJOR RECORD COMPANY. CONSECUTIVELY, WE ANALYSED THE IMAGES ON THE COVERS AND SELECTED SONGS FROM THE THREE ALBUMS MENTIONED ABOVE TO UNDERSTAND THE REPRESENTATION OF FURY AND MANIPULATION IN THE PRODUCTION OF THE BAND. TO BUILD THIS STUDY, WE RELY ON THE SPECIALISED AND INTERDISCIPLINARY BIBLIOGRAPHY, THAT ALLOWED TO UNDERSTAND OUR GOAL UNDER DIFFERENT PERSPECTIVES, FOR EXAMPLE, THE ARTISTIC FIELD ASSOCIATED TO THE FINANCIAL FIELD, THE MUSIC AND IT¿S OWN LANGUAGE AND HOW IT IS CULTURALLY HYBRID, AS WELL AS THE INTRICATE TEXT, INSERTIONS IN THIS CASE THE SONGS AND THE ALBUMS, AS THE CONTEXT THE IT WAS PRODUCED.

nm_producao: REPRESENTAÇÕES DE UMA IDENTIDADE CONTEMPORÂNEA JAPONESA EM A VIAGEM DE CHIHIRI (HAYAO MIYAZAKI, 2001)
ds_abstract: THIS PAPER AIMS TO ANALYZE THE REPRESENTATIONS OF A CONTEMPORARY JAPANESE IDENTITY THAT THE SPIRITED AWAY DIRECTOR HAYAO MIYAZAKI BUILDS IN HIS MOVIE. SPIRITED AWAY IS THE MOST SUCCESSFUL FEATURE FILM OF THE STUDIO GHIBLI, CO-FOUNDED BY MIYAZAKI AND THE MOST INTERNATIONALLY RECOGNIZED JAPANESE ANIMATION STUDIO. THESE REPRESENTATIONS OCCUR MAINLY FROM THE WAY THE DIRECTOR BUILDS THE FANTASTIC WORLD WHERE THE STORY TAKES PLACE, IN THE RELATIONSHIP OF THIS “OTHER-WORLD” THAT SEEMS TO SEEK TO ARTICULATE JAPAN'S SHINTO TRADITION WITH CONTEMPORARY JAPAN. FOR OUR TASK, WE WILL ANALYZE BOTH THE INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL ASPECTS OF THE MOVIE. FIRST, WE WILL TRY TO UNDERSTAND THE SPIRITED AWAY NARRATIVE AND CHARACTERS, FROM THE USES THAT THE FILM MAKES OF MYTHOLOGICAL STRUCTURES, USING THE “HERO’S JOURNEY” CONCEPT DEVELOPED BY JOSEPH CAMPBELL, ESPECIALLY CHRISTOPHER VOGLER'S READING OF THIS MODEL OF ANALYSIS TRANSPOSED FOR CINEMATOGRAPHIC LANGUAGE, IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND HOW IN THE USE OF THESE STRUCTURES, DIRECTOR HAYAO MIYAZAKI ARTICULATES ELEMENTS OF JAPANESE TRADITION WITH MODERN JAPANESE ELEMENTS AND WESTERN ELEMENTS. FROM THIS POINT, WE WILL DEAL WITH THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE FILM WITH THE REALITY THAT PRODUCED IT, THE HISTORIOGRAPHY AND, MAINLY, WITH ITS AUTHOR. FINALLY, WE WILL EXAMINE THE ROLE OF THE ANIME IN CONTEMPORARY JAPANESE CULTURE, WHAT KIND OF JAPAN THE ANIME REPRESENTS AND HOW JAPAN USES THESE REPRESENTATIONS. TO ACCOUNT FOR THE JAPANESE SPECIFICITIES IN THIS PROCESS OF CULTURAL HYBRIDISM, WE WILL MAINLY USE THE WORK OF THE JAPANESE SOCIOLOGIST KOICHI IWABUCHI AND HIS CONCEPT OF STRATEGIC HYBRIDISM, WHICH STUDIES THE WAY JAPAN APPROPRIATES FOREIGN CULTURES IN A PLANNED AND STRATEGIC WAY, UNLIKE CULTURAL HYBRIDITY THOUGHT FROM THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE WESTERN POWERS WITH THEIR COLONIES. ON THE CONTRARY, SINCE JAPAN ITSELF HAS A HISTORY OF REGIONAL IMPERIALISM, OUR HYPOTHESIS IS THAT SPIRITED AWAY SERVES, TO SOME EXTENT, JAPANESE POST-WORLD WAR II SOFT POWER: A FRIENDLY, PEACEFUL AND, AND AS CHARACTERISTIC OF MIYAZAKI’S WORK, CONCERNED WITH THE ENVIRONMENT.

nm_producao: ¿T¿¿¿O¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿: ESTUDO SOBRE AS HISTÓRIAS DE HERÓDOTO E SUA CRÍTICA AO IMPÉRIO ATENIENSE
ds_abstract: HERODOTUS FROM HALICARNASSUS WAS TRADITIONALLY CONSIDERED SYMPATHETIC TO ATHENS IN HIS OWN TIME. THIS INTERPRETATION USED A CONSTRUCTED IMAGE OF THE PERSONAL FIGURE OF THE HISTORIAN: HE WOULD BE A LITERATE MAN, CULTURED, OF A CULTURED FAMILY AND THESE CHARACTERISTICS WOULD HAVE MADE HIM NECESSARILY ALIGNED TO ATHENS AND CONTRARY TO THE TYRANNIES. THESE INTERPRETATION WAS CRITICIZED THROUGH THE LAST DECADES BUT JUST VERY FEW OF THEM CONSIDERED THE FUNDAMENTAL ELEMENT WHICH IS THE CONDITION OF FOREIGNER THAT HERODOTUS WOULD BEAR IN ATHENIAN PLACES. IN THIS DISSERTATION I EXPLORE THE HISTORIES OF HERODOTUS THROUGH THE MEANINGS NETWORK BUILT IN THE WORK IN RELATING HELLENIC AND BARBARIAN PAST WITH THE PRESENT LIVED BY HERODOTUS AND THE HELLAS, PARTICULARLY THE CENTRALIZING AND AUTHORITARIAN ATHENIAN HEGEMONY. THUS I EXPLORE THE RHETORIC THAT LIES IN THE MANY PARTS OF THE HISTORIES, SHOWING HOW DOES HERODOTUS USES THE ACT OF TELL THE PAST TO EMULATE CONTEMPORARY POLITICAL CONDITIONS AND THUS URGE A DEBATE THROUGH AUDIENCE.

nm_producao: A CONFORMAÇÃO DA IDENTIDADE POLÍTICA DOS REGRESSISTAS PELAS PÁGINAS DO O CRONISTA E O BRASIL (1836-1841)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK PROPOSES AN ANALYSIS OF THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE POLITICAL IDENTITY OF THE REGRESSIVE GROUP, FUTURE CONSERVATIVES, FROM THE PERIODICALS O CRONISTA AND O BRASIL, DURING THE YEARS OF 1836 TO 1841. THE POLITICAL IDENTITY OF THIS GROUP HAD BEEN DEFINED IN THE POLITICAL CLASH THAT TOOK PLACE IN THE PARLIAMENT AND THE PRESS ABOUT SOME ISSUES IN SPECIFIC CIRCUMSTANCES, SUCH AS THE SLAVE TRADE, THE REGENCY OF DIOGO FEIJÓ AND THE ADULTHOOD. BOTH REGRESSISTS AND PROGRESSIVES USED THE PRINTED WORD NOT ONLY TO SPREAD THEIR IDEAS AND IDEALS BUT ALSO TO INTERVENE IN THE POLITICAL GAME. FROM THESE INTERVENTIONS, THEY STARTED CONSTRUCTING UNIQUE POLITICAL VOCABULARIES, WHICH BEGAN TO DISTINGUISH MORE CLEARLY THESE GROUPS. THE PRESS WAS A CENTRAL DEVICE IN THE PROCESS OF BUILDING THE “PARTIES” THAT AIMED TO DIRECTLY INTERFERE IN THE POLITICAL GAME FOR THE VICTORY OF THEIR PROJECTS AND GOALS.

nm_producao: A CONSTRUÇÃO DO CARNAVAL DAS GRANDES SOCIEDADES CARNAVALESCAS A PARTIR DA IMPRENSA DO SÉCULO XIX
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION PROPOSES TO STUDY THE CRITICISM BUILT AGAINST THE ENTRUDO FROM THE MIDDLE OF THE 19TH CENTURY IN RIO DE JANEIRO, DUE TO THE APPROACH OF THE ELITE TO THE FRENCH IDEALS OF MODERNITY, CIVILIZATION AND PROGRESS. CONSIDERING THE GREAT INVOLVEMENT OF LITERATURES IN THE IMPERIAL PRESS, THE OBJECTIVE IS TO DISCUSS THE DISCOURSE BUILT ON THE IDEALIZED CARNIVAL REPRESENTED BY THE GREAT CARNIVAL SOCIETIES. KNOWING THAT THE FIELD OF CULTURE IS TOO HETEROGENEOUS AND CONFLICTED, WE PRESENT RIO DE JANEIRO AS A BACKDROP, PROPOSING TO TALK ABOUT THE CARIOCA REVELRY, SHOWING SOCIETY NOT AS A MERE SPECTATOR, BUT AS AN EFFECTIVE PARTICIPANT OF THE PARTY, EVEN SUFFERING REPRESSION THROUGH CODES OF POSTURES OR POLICE ACTION. THUS, WE SEEK TO INVESTIGATE THE FORMS OF SOCIABILITY AND CULTURAL EXCHANGES PRESENT IN THE 19TH CENTURY CARIOCA CARNIVAL, REPORTED THROUGH THE PRESS.

nm_producao: A COR DA DEVOÇÃO: ENTRE ESPAÇOS E IDENTIDADES NA IRMANDADE DE NOSSA SENHORA DO ROSÁRIO E SÃO BENEDITO DOS HOMENS PRETOS NO RIO DE JANEIRO DO SÉCULO XVIII
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS EXPLORED THE FRATERNITY OF NOSSA SENHORA DO ROSÁRIO E SÃO BENEDITO DOS HOMENS PRETOS FROM THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO IN THE EIGHTEENTH CENTURY, TRYING TO UNDERSTAND ITS PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES, ESPECIALLY DURING THE TIME WHEN THE FRATERNITY'S CHURCH WAS TAKEN BY THE CABIDO DA SÉ FROM THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO BETWEEN 1733 AND 1808. THEREFORE, THIS STUDY WILL ANALYZE THE CONFLICTS BETWEEN THE CABIDO DA SÉ AND THE FRATERNITY OF ROSÁRIO FOR THE SPACE, AUTONOMY AND THE DEVOTIONAL PRACTICES DONE IN THE CHURCH. FOR THIS REASON WE SEEK TO UNDERSTAND THE ORIGIN OF DEVOTION TO NOSSA SENHORA DO ROSÁRIO, THE FRATERNITY ITSELF AND ALSO THE LOOKING FOR RELATE THE DEVOTIONAL CHARACTERISTICS OF THE BROTHERS OF ROSÁRIO. SO WE CONSIDERED THE DIFFERENT SYMBOLS AND RITES OF THE MEMBERS OF FRATERNITY OF NOSSA SENHORA DO ROSÁRIO, CONSIDERING THE IMPORTANCE AND THE MEANING OF THIS FRATERNITY. THUS WE UNDERSTOOD THE SINGULARITIES, THE DIFFERENCES AND IDENTITY CHARACTERISTICS REFORMULATED BY THE FRATERNITY OF NOSSA SENHORA DO RORÁRIO E SÃO BENEDITO DOS HOMENS PRETOS THROUGHOUT THE EIGHTEENTH CENTURY

nm_producao: “A LIGA ELEITORAL CATÓLICA É PARTIDO POLÍTICO?”: A LEC E AS ELEIÇÕES NO CEARÁ (1933-1934).
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS PRESENTS AN ANALYSIS OF THE ACTION OF THE CATHOLIC ELECTORAL LEAGUE IN CEARÁ IN THE 1933 AND 1934 ELECTIONS. THE LEC WAS AN ORGANIZATION CREATED BY CARDINAL SEBASTIÃO LEME AND ALCEU AMOROSO LIMA, WHOSE FUNCTION WAS TO ENLIST AND MOBILIZE THE CATHOLIC VOTE. HOWEVER, IN CEARÁ THE LEAGUE BECAME A POLITICAL PARTY AND DISPUTED THE ELECTIONS AGAINST THE SOCIAL DEMOCRATIC PARTY, ORGANIZED BY TÁVORA, REPRESENTATIVES OF THE 1930 REVOLUTION IN THE STATE. WE USED AS DOCUMENTATION THE CORRESPONDENCE EXCHANGED BETWEEN THE POLITICIANS OF THE LEC AND THE PSD, FOUND IN CPDOC-FGV, IN THE COLLECTION OF THE ALCEU AMOROSO LIMA CULTURAL CENTER AND IN THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES. WE ANALYZE FROM THE PERSPECTIVE OF POLITICAL HISTORY AND THE HISTORY OF ELITES HOW THE LEAGUE BECAME PARTY, SHOWING THE POLITICAL FORCES THAT ACTED IN THE LEC AND HOW THE TWO CAMPAIGNS IN THE STATE DEVELOPED, WHICH MADE POSSIBLE THE ELECTION VICTORY OF THE CATHOLIC PARTY AND THE DECLINE OF THE TÁVORA

nm_producao: A MORTE COMO NEGÓCIO: OS MERCADORES FÚNEBRES NO INTERIOR FLUMINENSE (PIRAÍ, SÉCULO XIX)
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS ANALYZES A THEME THAT IS STILL VERY LITTLE STUDIED IN THE FIELD OF THE SOCIAL HISTORY OF DEATH, RELATED TO THE FUNERAL BUSINESS. BY FOCUSING ON DEATH MERCHANTS, THE CIRCULATION AND CONSUMPTION OF MORTUARY OBJECTS, IT SEEKS TO RELATE CATHOLIC CONCEPTIONS AND ATTITUDES TOWARDS DEATH AND THE FUNCTIONING OF COMMERCIAL HOUSES AND THEIR FUNERAL OBJECTS, IN THE INTERIOR OF RIO DE JANEIRO, ESPECIALLY IN THE VILLAGE OF SANTANA DO PIRAÍ IN THE 19TH CENTURY. IT SEEKS TO DEMONSTRATE THAT THE RELATIONS BETWEEN CONSUMPTION AND SALE OF FUNERAL OBJECTS HAVE BUILT COMPLEX COMMERCIAL NETWORKS BETWEEN RIO DE JANEIRO WHOLESALE MERCHANTS AND PIRAÍ RETAILERS. BECAUSE THE TRADE IS QUITE WIDE, CONTAINING A HUGE RANGE OF SPECIALISTS FOCUSED ON THE SALE OF FUNERAL GOODS AND SERVICES, THE RESEARCH PRIORITIZES FUNERAL OWNERS, UNDERSTOOD AS INDIVIDUALS WHO BOUGHT OR RENTED OBJECTS FOR THE DECORATION OF THE HOUSE AND THE CHURCH FOR THE PERFORMANCE OF FUNERARY CEREMONIES. THE MAIN SOURCES OF THE RESEARCH WERE INVENTORIES, PARISH INSPECTORS' REPORTS AND PROVINCIAL REPORTS, FROM WHICH THE FUNERAL OWNERS AND THEIR COMMERCIAL PRACTICES WERE IDENTIFIED, THROUGH WHICH THE COMMERCIAL SIDE BEHIND CATHOLIC FUNERAL CUSTOMS IN THE 1800S WAS UNVEILED RELIGIOUS AND SOTERIOLOGICAL SENSE.

nm_producao: ABREM-SE AS CORTINAS: O TEATRO E A POLÍTICA NACIONALISTA DO GOVERNO DE GETÚLIO VARGAS (1937-1945)
ds_abstract: THE MAIN OBJECTIVE OF THIS RESEARCH WORK IS TO INVESTIGATE THE ROLE OF THE PERFORMING ARTS IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE NATIONALIST PROJECT OF PRESIDENT GETÚLIO VARGAS (1930-1945), WITH SPECIAL EMPHASIS ON THE CREATION OF THE NATIONAL THEATER SERVICE (NTS) IN 1937. FOR THIS PURPOSE, WE ELECTED TO ANALYZE THE MANAGEMENT OF THE PLAYWRIGHT ABADIE FARIA ROSA AT THE HEAD OF THE NTS FROM 1937 TO 1945, AND THE LIST OF SOCIAL AGENTS WHO PARTICIPATED IN THIS HISTORIC MOMENT. ANOTHER IMPORTANT ISSUE WAS THE INVESTIGATION OF THE CRITERIA FOR THE CHOICE OF THEATER COMPANIES THAT WOULD BE FINANCED BY THE AGENCY IN ITS FIRST PUBLIC NOTICE IN 1939. IN THIS PROCESS, EMPHASIS WILL BE GIVEN TO THE REALIZATION OF TOURS BY THEATER COMPANIES FINANCED BY NTS DURING THE YEARS 1939- 1945 AND THE ASSEMBLY OF PIECES WITH A HISTORICAL BIAS. BOTH ACTIONS WERE AIMED AT BUILDING A PROJECT DESIGNED TO CREATE NATIONAL INTEGRATION. THEREFORE, WE INTEND TO PRESENT A GENEALOGY OF THE CONNECTION BETWEEN THEATRICAL PRODUCTION AND ITS MODES OF FINANCING IN BRAZIL, SEEKING THE ORIGINS OF THE MULTIFACETED RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE THEATRICAL SCENE AND SUBSIDIES, INCLUDING ATTEMPTS TO IMPLEMENT INNUMERABLE LAWS, FROM THE 19TH CENTURY UP TO ITS STATE SYSTEMATIZATION, WITH THE NTS. THUS, WE USE THE REFLECTION PROPOSED BY ANTÔNIO GRAMSCI TO UNDERSTAND THE TRIAD: BRAZILIAN STATE, PUBLIC POLICIES AND CENSORSHIP. FOR THIS, WE WILL TAKE THE CONCEPTUAL PAIR OF COERCION AND CONSENSUS PROPOSED BY THE ITALIAN PHILOSOPHER AND THE CONCEPT OF IMAGINED COMMUNITY, FORMULATED BY THE HISTORIAN BENEDICT ANDERSON. SETTING IN FROM THIS APPROACH, WE CAN THINK, IN A COMPARATIVE WAY, THE PERFORMANCE OF THE VARGUISTA STATE IN THE PROMOTION AND CONTROL OF THE THEATER AS PART OF THE PROCESS OF (RE) CONSTRUCTION OF A BRAZILIAN NATIONAL COMMUNITY.

nm_producao: AS DUAS FACES DE DOM QUIXOTE: UMA ANÁLISE COMPARATIVA DA REPRESENTAÇÃO DA CAVALARIA NAS OBRAS DE MONTALVO E CERVANTES (SÉCULOS XVI-XVII)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION IS THE RESULT OF A RESEARCH ON THE AMBIVALENCE OF THE REPRESENTATION OF CHIVALRY IN DON QUIXOTE (1605-1615). IN IT, I RESOLVED TO STAND AGAINST WHAT I CALLED A “MONOVOCAL READING” OF MIGUEL DE CERVANTES' TEXT. FOR A LONG TIME, LITERARY CRITICISM INSISTED ON ITS UNIQUE CHARACTER IN THE HISTORY OF LITERATURE, CONSEQUENTLY DETACHING IT FROM ITS ORIGINAL CONTEXT, WITHOUT WHICH IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO GRASP ITS HISTORICAL MEANING. IN DOING SO, AN INTERPRETATION WAS MADE POSSIBLE IN WHICH DON QUIXOTE WAS READ SOLELY AS AN EXECUTIONER OF THE CHIVALRY, BY COMICALLY INVERTING THE MAIN ASPECTS OF CHIVALRIC LITERATURE, ESPECIALLY THE LIBROS DE CABALLERÍAS, A SUCCESSFUL GENRE IN THE IBERIAN PENINSULA AT THE TIME. THUS, THE WORK WAS CONSIDERED TO INAUGURATE A NEW ERA – HENCE THE TITLE OF "FIRST MODERN NOVEL" – AND, BY DERIVATION, A DENIAL OF THE MIDDLE AGES. THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS WORK IS TO REATTACH DON QUIXOTE'S HISTORICAL TIES WITH THIS GENRE, SHOWING HOW ITS CHARACTERISTICS WERE APPROPRIATED BY CERVANTES. I WILL DO THIS BY A COMPARATIVE ANALYSIS WITH THE PARADIGMATIC ROMANCE OF CHIVALRY AMADÍS DE GAULA (1508), BY GARCI RODRÍGUEZ DE MONTALVO, FOCUSING ON THE FIGURE OF CHIVALRY, BUT IN PARTICULAR ON TWO OF ITS IDEOLOGICAL ASPECTS: WARRIOR VALUE AND COURTEOUS LOVE. MY HYPOTHESIS IS THAT THIS REPRESENTATION HAPPENED IN AN AMBIVALENT WAY, WHICH MEANS IT WOULD BE POSSIBLE TO VERIFY THE COEXISTENCE OF TWO DISCOURSES ABOUT CHIVALRY, IN THE NARRATIVE. BEING ABLE TO PERCEIVE MEDIEVAL ELEMENTS OF REPRESENTATION THERE, WE WOULD BE ALLOWED TO QUESTION DON QUIXOTE'S CURRENT INTERPRETATION AND, CONSEQUENTLY, ITS STANDING BEFORE MIDDLE AGES.

nm_producao: AS TELAS E NAS MENTES: WALT DISNEY E ORSON WELLES COMO EMISSÁRIOS DA BOA VIZINHANÇA NO BRASIL
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK ANALYZES THE TRIPS THAT WALT DISNEY AND ORSON WELLES MADE TO BRAZIL IN ORDER TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE GOOD NEIGHBOR POLICY AND COLLECT MATERIAL FOR THEIR FILMS RELATED TO THE COUNTRY. THE DETAILS PRESENT IN THESE VISITS, THEIR CONNECTIONS WITH THE FOREIGN POLICY OF THE PERIOD, WITH THE HOLLYWOOD FILM INDUSTRY AND WITH BRAZILIAN DOMESTIC POLITICS WILL BE DISCUSSED. FROM THE INVESTIGATION OF THE EXPEDITIONS OF BOTH FILMMAKERS, IT IS EXPECTED TO SHOW WHICH ELEMENTS MOBILIZED BY THEM HELPED IN THE PROPAGATION OF THE IDEAL OF CLOSER TIES BETWEEN BRAZIL AND THE USA AND WHICH DID NOT CONTRIBUTE TO THIS OBJECTIVE. WE WILL ALSO BE ABLE TO DISCUSS THE ELEMENTS THAT WERE DECISIVE FOR THE SUCCESS OF THE DISNEY INITIATIVE IN COMPARISON TO THE ACTIONS OF WELLES. IN THIS WAY, IT BECOMES POSSIBLE TO OBSERVE HOW THE INITIATIVES ARTICULATED WITH THE AMERICAN FOREIGN CULTURAL POLICY WORKED, IN PARTICULAR THOSE RELATED TO CINEMA, AND WHICH STRATEGIES WERE SUCCESSFUL IN THAT SENSE.

nm_producao: AUDAZES PIONEIROS: TERRAS, ESCRAVOS E FORTUNAS EM PIRAÍ, 1810-1888.
ds_abstract: THE THESIS ANALYZES 625 INVENTORIES FROM “ARQUIVO MUNICIPAL DE PIRAÍ” (MUNICIPAL ARCHIVE FROM PIRAÍ) BETWEEN THE YEARS 1810 AND 1888 IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND THE HISTORICAL PROCESSES THAT LED TO THE HUGE GROWTH OF COFFEE PLANTATIONS IN THE PARAÍBA RIVER VALLEY REGION AND, SUBSEQUENTLY, PLACED BRAZIL AS THE WORLD TOP COFFEE PRODUCER IN THE MID NINETEENTH CENTURY. THE SLAVERY SYSTEM THAT PROVIDED MANPOWER, THE MANY TIMES ILLEGAL LAND OCCUPATIONS AND THE GIGANTIC PLANTATIONS POSSESSED BY SLAVEHOLDERS WHO OWNED HUNDREDS OF SOULS UNDER THEIR WHIP YOKE WERE SCRUTINIZED ON THE WIDE SOURCES OF DATA THAT INVENTORIES PROVIDE, EXAMINING THEIR CONSTITUTIVE ELEMENTS, PERUSING THEIR EVOLUTION THROUGH THE DECADES AND RELATING THEM WITH DATA FROM CONGENER LOCALITIES. THE PIONEER CHARACTERISTICS OF PIRAÍ AS ONE OF THE STARTING POINTS OF COFFEE PRODUCTION ON THE VALLEY IS INVESTIGATED TO UNDERSTAND THE REGIONAL CONTEXT AND ITS POLITICAL PROTAGONISM IN THE EARLY STAGES OF RUBIACEOUS PRODUCTION IN BRAZIL. THE BROAD TIME SPAN ENCOMPASSING ALMOST THE WHOLE NINETEENTH CENTURY ALLOWED US TO OUTLINE BOTH CHARACTERS AND SOCIOECONOMIC MECHANISMS THAT CONSTITUTED THE SLAVEOWNER, COFFEE-PLANTATION PARAÍBA RIVER VALLEY.

nm_producao: CINEMA, SOCIEDADE E POLÍTICA NA REPÚBLICA DE WEIMAR: UM ESTUDO DOS FILMES DE FRITZ LANG SOBRE DR. MABUSE (1922-1933)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION WORKS ON THE REPRESENTATION OF EVIL DURING THE WEIMAR REPUBLIC. IT IS THE STUDY OF A SERIES OF FILMS ABOUT THE CHARACTER DR. MABUSE. THE FIRST TWO FILMS WERE SHOT IN 1922 (“DR. MABUSE- THE GAMBLER”), THE THIRD WAS SHOT IN 1933 (“THE TESTAMENT OF DR. MABUSE”). I ANALYZE THESE FILMS, TRYING TO UNDERSTAND THE DIFFERENCES BETWEEN DR. MABUSE'S REPRESENTATIONS (SEEN AS THE PERSONIFICATION OF EVIL). IN ADDITION, THE RESEARCH WORKS ON THE POLITICAL AND SOCIAL CONTEXT OF GERMANY DURING THE WEIMAR REPUBLIC, CINEMA AND THE EXPRESSIONIST MOVEMENT, AND OTHER WORKS BY FRITZ LANG (FOCUSING ON THE REPRESENTATION OF EVIL SEEN IN THE FILMS)
nm_discente: CORA DE MIRANDA TORRES DE MELLO

nm_producao: DEBATES POLÍTICOS DOS TRANSPORTES FERROVIÁRIOS NO ESCRAVISMO NO VALE DO PARAÍBA, 1826-1843
ds_abstract: STARTING FROM ANTÔNIO GRAMSCI'S THEORETICAL AND METHODOLOGICAL FRAMEWORK, WE NARRATE AND ANALYZE THE FIRST POLITICAL DEBATES ON THE RAILROAD MODAL AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO LINK THE MIDDLE PARAÍBA VALLEY IN ITS EXPANSION PHASE OF THE COFFEE-SLAVE CULTURE AND THE COURT AND BUSINESS SQUARE OF RIO DE JANEIRO.
nm_orientador: PEDRO EDUARDO MESQUITA DE MONTEIRO MARINHO

nm_producao: DEMOGRAFIA HISTÓRICA DO RIO DE JANEIRO NA SEGUNDA ESCRAVIDÃO.
ds_abstract: THIS TEXT ADVOCATES THE NECESSITY OF INCORPORATING INTO HISTORIOGRAPHIC PRACTICE CERTAIN DEMOGRAPHIC TECHNIQUES WHICH ENABLE OBTAINING MORE PRECISE, MORE DETAILED AND MORE EXTENSIVE INFORMATION FROM CENSUS SOURCES OF THE SLAVERY PERIOD, NOTORIOUSLY INACCURATE AND INCOMPLETE. WE APPLY THE PROPOSED METHODOLOGY TO THE CASE OF RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL, A REGION FOR WHICH SOURCES ARE FOUND IN LESSER QUANTITY AND QUALITY THAN THOSE AVAILABLE FOR SÃO PAULO, PARANÁ AND MINAS GERAIS. THE METHODS ADVANCED ALLOW THE CONSTRUCTION OF SERIES WITH HOMOGENEOUS UNITS AND EXHAUSTIVE GEOGRAPHIC COVERAGE. THE EXISTENCE OF AGE DISTRIBUTIONS BY ANNUAL AGE, IN THE CENSUS OF 1872, HAS PERMITTED US TO ESTIMATE NATALITY, MORTALITY AND MIGRATION, PHENOMENA FOR WHICH THERE ARE NO SPECIFIC SOURCES WITH CENSUAL AMPLITUDE. WE PRESENT THE EVOLUTION OF THE FLUMINENSE POPULATION IN ITS SIZE AND COMPOSITION, UNTIL 1872, DISCUSSING THE TRANSATLANTIC AND THE INTERNAL SLAVE TRADES, DIRECTED TO AND ORIGINATING FROM RIO DE JANEIRO, ASSESSING THEIR FLOWS FROM ESTIMATES OF THE EXISTING CAPTIVE POPULATION. WE CLOSE THIS PERSPECTIVE ON THE DEMOGRAPHIC EVOLUTION OF THE POPULATION OF RIO DE JANEIRO CAPTAINCY AND PROVINCE WITH THE PRESENTATION OF “TYPICAL DEMOGRAPHIC STRUCTURES” IN 1872 AND WITH THE PROPOSAL OF A SET OF DEMOGRAPHIC REGIMES/SYSTEMS CONSISTENT WITH THE INTERPRETATION OF BRAZILIAN SLAVERY IN THE NINETEENTH CENTURY WITHIN THE CONTEXT OF THE ‘SECOND SLAVERY’.

nm_producao: DOS ENGENHOS À USINA: PATRIMÔNIO E CULTURA MATERIAL CANAVIEIRA DO CARIRI CEARENSE (ANOS 1930-1970)
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS PRESENTS THE MATERIAL SUGARCANE CULTURE OF CARIRI FROM CEARÁ, PRODUCED BETWEEN THE 1930S AND 1970S, AS A POSSIBLE SOURCE FOR A HISTORIOGRAPHICAL APPROACH TO THE TECHNOLOGICAL TRANSITION OF ARTISANAL MILLS TO AGRO-INDUSTRY. WE PROPOSE AN UNDERSTANDING OF CHAPADA DO ARARIPE AS A CULTURAL LANDSCAPE BECAUSE IT HOUSES BOTH MATERIAL TRACES AND POPULAR EXPRESSIONS THAT REFER TO TRADITIONAL KNOWLEDGE AND THE DAILY LIFE OF CANE FIELDS. WHEN ANALYZING THE RUINS AND THE REMNANTS OF MACHINERY, WE APPROACH THE ARCHAEOLOGICAL AND MUSEOLOGICAL FIELD IN SEARCH OF AN UNDERSTANDING OF THIS COMPLEX MOSAIC AS AN INDUSTRIAL CULTURAL HERITAGE.

nm_producao: ENGENHARIA, CULTURA, PODER E POLÍTICA NA BAHIA (1896 – 1937)
ds_abstract: THE AIM OF THE PRESENT STUDY IS TO EVALUATE THE PROCESS OF TURNING INSTITUTIONAL THE ESCOLA POLITÉCNICA DA BAHIA— EPBA —. THIS RESEARCH FOCUSES ON ANALYSING AND DISCUSSING THE REASONS WHY THE POLYTECHNIC SCHOOL OF BAHIA WAS CREATED, AS WELL AS ITS COURSE DURING ITS FIRST FORTY YEARS OF EXISTENCE. IT IS ABOUT AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TRAINING ENGINEERS, FOUNDED AND MAINTAINED BY AN AGENCY — IPBA — COMPOSED BY AGENTS ATTACHED TO THE CIVIL AND POLITICAL SOCIETY. THIS SHEDS LIGHT ON THE STRATEGIES OF THE RISING URBAN MIDDLE CLASS IN ORDER TO REACH REPRESENTATIVITY, AND, THEREFORE, AIMING TO INSERT ITS “WORLDVIEW” PROJECTS THROUGHOUT SOCIETY. THUS, THE AUTHOR TRIES TO REVEAL PART OF THE “GAME” SCENARIO IN BAHIA, HIGHLIGHTING THE WHOLE PROCESS OF THE HEGEMONY CRISIS OCCURRED DURING THE TRANSITION TO THE REPUBLICAN REGIME. THE AUTHOR INDICATES THE MAIN AGENCIES AND AGENTS IN THESE CONFRONTATIONS. THIS RESEARCH ALSO INCLUDES AN ANALYSIS OF THE ENTIRE PROCESS OF EPBA FOUNDATION AND ITS EARLY DECADES. THUS, THE AUTHOR SHOWS EPBA CONSOLIDATION AS A “PRIVATE HEGEMONY” APPARATUS BY THE STUDY OF ITS REPRESENTATIVES DURING THIS PROCESS.
nm_orientador: PEDRO EDUARDO MESQUITA DE MONTEIRO MARINHO

nm_producao: ENLACES E NÓS: AS TESTEMUNHAS DE CASAMENTO COMO MEIO DE INTERAÇÃO, VÍNCULO E SOCIABILIDADE - FREGUESIA DA CANDELÁRIA (C.1750 – C.1850)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK INVESTIGATES THE ROLE PLAYED BY THE WEDDING WITNESSES IN THE SOCIABILITY PROCESS EXPERIENCED BY THE BRIDE AND GROOM PRESENT IN THE MARRIAGE RECORDS OF THE PARISH OF CANDELÁRIA (RIO DE JANEIRO), BETWEEN THE YEARS 1750 AND 1866. FOR THAT, WE USE AS A BASE ALL THE MARRIAGE RECORDS REFERRING TO THIS PARISH IN THIS PERIOD, DEPOSITED IN THE ARCHIVE OF THE METROPOLITAN CURIA OF RIO DE JANEIRO. THEN, HAVING THIS INFORMATION AND THE NAMES OF THE MOST RECURRING WITNESSES, WE CROSS-REFER THAT INFORMATION WITH OTHER ECCLESIASTICAL AND NOTARY RECORDS PROVIDED BY THE MOST VARIED SOURCES OF INFORMATION, IN ORDER TO BETTER DELINEATE THE IDENTITY OF THESE CHARACTERS, THEIR LIFE TRAJECTORIES AND THE NETWORKS OF RELATIONSHIPS IN WHICH THEY WERE INSERTED. HAVING IDENTIFIED THE PRESTIGIOUS PROFILE OF THE MAJORITY OF THESE WITNESSES AND THEIR TIES TO THE BROTHERHOOD OF THE BLESSED SACRAMENT OF CANDELÁRIA, WE APPROACHED THE ROLE OF MEDIATORS THAT THESE CHARACTERS FULFILLED, SERVING AS A VEHICLE FOR THE INSERTION OF THE BRIDE AND GROOM WHO SUMMONED THEM NOT ONLY TO A RELIGIOUS COMMUNITY, BUT ALSO TO A SOCIAL NETWORK IN WHICH BONDS WERE CREATED OR STRENGTHENED.

nm_producao: ENTRE PRETÉRITOS E DEMANDAS DO PRESENTE: NARRATIVAS INDÍGENAS NA WEB
ds_abstract: THE FOLLOWING THESIS ANALYZES A TRAJECTORY OF THE APPROPRIATION OF THE MEANS OF COMMUNICATION BY BRAZILIAN INDIANS THROUGHOUT THE 20TH CENTURY AND OF DIGITAL MEDIA IN THE 21ST CENTURY, USED AS A POLITICAL STRATEGY TO GIVE VISIBILITY AND STRENGTHENING TO A PROJECT OF POLITICAL AND SOCIAL EMANCIPATION, EXPRESSED MAINLY IN TERRITORIAL CLAIMS AND IDENTITY AND ETHNIC (RE) CONSTRUCTIONS.
