WITH THIS OBJECTIVE IN MIND, I BEGIN THE ANALYSIS USING BRAZILIAN LAW AS A RESEARCH SOURCE WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE SPI, STRUCTURING STATE PROTECTION AS A WAY OF INTEGRATING THE INDIGENOUS WITH THE BRAZILIAN NATIONAL STATE, CONFRONTING THIS LEGISLATION WITH THE ETHNOGRAPHIC IMAGES AND MOVIES PRODUCED BY THE SPI. IN THE SECOND MOVEMENT OF THE RESEARCH, I PRESENT NEW FORMS OF INTERETHNIC ASSOCIATIONS THAT HAD THEIR ORIGIN IN THE 1970S AND EXTENDED TO THE 1980S, STARTING A MOVEMENT OF LEGAL BREAKING OF TUTELAGE, CONSOLIDATED IN THE CONSTITUTIONAL TEXT IN 1988, ASSOCIATED WITH A DISCOURSE OF INDIGENOUS PROTAGONISM. IN THIS PART, THE MAIN SOURCES USED WERE THE RADIO PROGRAM BROADCAST BY RÁDIO USP AND ENTITLED “PROGRAMA DE ÍNDIO” AND THE EDUCATIONAL SERIES PRODUCED BY THE NGO VÍDEO NA ALDEIAS, ENTITLED “INDIOS DO BRASIL”. IN THE LAST PART, I APPROACHE THE USE OF DIGITAL MEDIA FROM 21ST CENTURY BY INDIGENOUS PEOPLE OF DIFFERENT ETHNICITIES AND REGIONS, STARTING WITH AN APPROACH ON PUBLIC POLICIES FOR DIGITAL INCLUSION, FOLLOWED BY THE INITIATIVES OF THE ELECTRONIC MAGAZINE ÍNDIOS ONLINE AND WEBRÁDIO YANDÊ. CONTEMPORARY INDIGENOUS ASSOCIATIVISM IS ANALYZED FROM THE UNPRECEDENTED EDITION OF THE 2020 TERRA LIVRE CAMP IN VIRTUAL FORMAT. CROSSING DIFFERENT FRONTS, THE RESEARCH SHOWED THAT INDIGENOUS INITIATIVES TO CIRCULATE THEIR OWN ETHNIC AND INTERETHNIC NARRATIVES, INITIATED IN THE 1970S / 1980S AND WHICH FOUNDED RIGHTS CONQUESTS AND POLITICAL EMANCIPATION AT THE CONSTITUTIONAL LEVEL, GAINS POWER IN CONTEMPORARY DIGITAL MEDIA, USED IN A VARIETY OF WAYS, GIVING VISIBILITY TO NEW ACTORS, IN NEW CONTEXTS, UNDER NEW AND OLD DEMANDS AND ALSO SUPPORTING THE STRUGGLE FOR RIGHTS, AS A DEMONSTRATION THAT SOCIAL EMANCIPATION AND CONSTITUTIONAL GUARANTEES ARE SOCIALLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION.

nm_producao: ENTRE SERTÕES E DESIERTOS: VIAJANTES BRASILEIROS E ARGENTINOS NA FRONTEIRA (1882-1905)
ds_abstract: ESTA INVESTIGACIÓN CONSISTE EN UNA PROPUESTA DE ANÁLISIS DE LOS INFORMES REALIZADOS POR VIAJEROS BRASILEÑOS Y ARGENTINOS QUE RECORRIERON LA FRONTERA ENTRE LOS DOS PAÍSES, ENTRE CORRIENTE, MISIONES Y EL SUR DE BRASIL, Y PUBLICARON TEXTOS SOBRE LA REGIÓN ENTRE 1882 Y 1905. PARA ANALIZAR ESTE ESPACIO DISPUTADO POR LAS DOS NACIONES, CONSIDERANDO LOS DIFERENTES MOVIMIENTOS Y FLUJOS DE POBLACIONES DE LOS MÁS VARIADOS ORÍGENES, AMPLIAMOS LA IDEA DE CONCEBIR LA FRONTERA SOLO COMO UNA LÍNEA DE DEMARCACIÓN. EN EL MISMO SENTIDO, NO ERA UN TERRITORIO CONSOLIDADO, SINO UN ESPACIO INDEFINIDO QUE LOS BRASILEÑOS IDEALIZARON COMO UN SERTÃO Y LOS ARGENTINOS COMO UN DESIERTO A SER OCUPADO. EN ESE MOMENTO, LA FRONTERA QUE LOS POLÍTICOS DE RÍO DE JANEIRO Y BUENOS AIRES DEBÍAN DEMARCAR TENÍA POCO SENTIDO PARA LA MAYORÍA DE LAS POBLACIONES QUE VIVÍAN ALLÍ. POR LO TANTO, ADEMÁS DE LAS MIRADAS DE LOS PROPIOS VIAJEROS BRASILEÑOS Y ARGENTINOS SOBRE EL ESPACIO DISPUTADO POR SUS RESPECTIVOS ESTADOS NACIONALES, TAMBIÉN ES MOTIVO DE ANÁLISIS LA PERSPECTIVA QUE ESTOS FORASTEROS EXPRESARON SOBRE ESTA POBLACIÓN COMPUESTA POR MESTIZOS, GAUCHOS, SERTANEJOS E INDÍGENAS. LO QUE TERMINÓ CONFORMANDO UN ASPECTO ORIGINAL, DENTRO DE UNA PROPUESTA AMERICANISTA QUE DIFERÍA DE LOS INFORMES EUROPEOS SOBRE AMÉRICA. ESTA VEZ, FUERON LOS AMERICANOS MIRANDO SUS DESCONOCIDAS EXTENSIONES INTERIORES.

nm_producao: GÊNERO E DISCURSO LEGISLATIVO: SEXUALIDADE, CASAMENTO E BARREGANIA NAS ORDENAÇÕES AFONSINAS (PORTUGAL NOS SÉCULOS XIV E XV)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK AIM TO APPROACH THE GENDER RELATIONSHIP DURING PORTUGUESE EARLY MIDDLE AGES FROM ORDENAÇÕES AFONSINAS. THE LEGISLATIVE BODY IS MOSTLY TREATED IN ITS DISCURSIVE FORM, REINFORCING ITS CONSTRUCTIVE CHARACTER, IN ORDER TO ESTABLISH ITS INFLUENCE IN DIVIDING LINE BETWEEN MALE AND FEMALE SOCIAL STANDING. THE ANALYSIS USES GENDER AS HISTORIC ANALYTICAL RANK, BY JOAN SCOTT, AND THE FOUCAULTIANS PROPOSITIONS OF POWER AND DISCOURSE. THEREFORE THE LEGISLATIVE TITLES ARE CONSIDERED, IN ORDER TO OBSERVE TO WHAT EXTEND THE FORMULATED RULES TO SOCIETY PROPOSE PUNISHMENT FOR DEVIANT BEHAVIOR, AND IF THIS DEVIATIONS AND PUNISHMENTS HAVE ESTABLISHED OR REAFFIRMED GENDER DISTINCTION ACCORDING TO THE PERSON WHOM WAS INTENDED.
nm_discente: AMANDA FRANCA DE OLIVEIRA DE SIQUEIRA

nm_producao: GUARDAR PARA TODOS A MEMÓRIA DE MUITOS: PROJETOS E POLÍTICAS PARA A PRESERVAÇÃO DA MEMÓRIA DAS ARTES CÊNICAS NO BRASIL
ds_abstract: THE THESIS PROPOSES AN HISTORICAL ANALYSIS OF THE MAKING OF THE DOCUMENTARY HERITAGE UNDER CUSTODY BY THE CENTRO DE DOCUMENTAÇÃO E PESQUISA DA FUNDAÇÃO NACIONAL DE ARTES (CEDOC / FUNARTE). THIS COLLECTION PASSED THROUGH DIFFERENT CULTURAL INSTITUTIONS OF THE BRAZILIAN FEDERAL PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION, BETWEEN THE 1950S AND 1980S, BEING THE RESULT OF THEIR ACTIONS IN THE PRESERVATION OF THE THE MEMORY OF THE THEATER AND OF THE PERFORMING ARTS. IN THE COURSE OF THIS TRAJECTORY, SOME EPISODES ARE HIGHLIGHTED, DUE TO THEIR EFFECTS ON THE CONSTRUCTION OF A PLACE OF MEMORY FOR THE BRAZILIAN SCENE, SUCH AS THE CREATION OF THE MUSEU DO SERVIÇO NACIONAL DE TEATRO (SNT), IN 1958; THE ACQUISITION OF THE ARCHIVE OF THE THEATER CRITIC BRÍCIO DE ABREU, IN 1972; THE LAUNCH OF THE PROJETO MEMÓRIA DO TEATRO AND THE CAMPANHA DE DOAÇÃO, IN 1976; AND THE CREATION OF THE CENTRO DE ESTUDOS NACIONAL EM ARTES CÊNCIAS (CENACEN), IN 1982. FIRST, THE THESIS MAPS THE DEBATES IN THE BRAZILIAN PRESS ABOUT THE NEED FOR A MUSEUM FOR THE THEATER IN RIO DE JANEIRO, AS WELL AS INVESTIGATES DIFFERENT PROJECTS OF THE BRAZILIAN ARTS MEMORY, ESPECIALLY THE INITIATIVES OF BRÍCIO DE ABREU AND HIS TWO EDITIONS OF THE INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION OF THEATER, HELD IN 1947 AND 1948. THE EXPERIENCE OF THE MUSEUM OF THEATERS, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPAL THEATER OF RIO DE JANEIRO, BETWEEN THE 1950S AND 1970S, IS RELEVANT, IN THIS SENSE, FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF OUR HYPOTHESES ABOUT THE EXISTENCE OF A FAVORABLE AMBIENCE OF IDEAS TO THE PATRIMONIALIZATION OF THE BRAZILIAN THEATRICAL PAST, AND ON THE NEED TO ELABORATE PUBLIC POLICIES FOR THE SECTOR, CAPABLE OF GIVING CONTINUITY TO THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH MEMORY SPACES. IN ADDITION, OUR RESEARCH TRACES A BRIEF REFLECTION ON THE PROFESSIONAL PRACTICES APPLIED TO THE COLLECTION THAT WAS CREATED WITH THE ADVENT OF THE SNT MUSEUM AND DIVERSIFIED BY THE CAMPANHA DE DOAÇÃO, IN PARTICULAR THE PERSONAL FILES CAPTURED BY THIS ACTION. AT THE SAME TIME, WE SEEK TO SYSTEMATIZE A PART OF THE RECENT HISTORY OF FEDERAL INSTITUTIONS DEDICATED TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE PERFORMING ARTS IN THE COUNTRY, AS IT PROVED TO BE FUNDAMENTAL FOR OUR UNDERSTANDING OF THE REORIENTATION OF THE ADVANCES IN THE FIELD OF MEMORY AND DOCUMENTATION. THUS, IN THIS WORK, WE HIGHLIGHT THE DEBATES, PROJECTS AND EXPERIENCES THAT GAVE RISE TO CULTURAL POLICIES THAT FOCUSED ON PRESERVING THE MEMORY OF THEATER AND THE PERFORMING ARTS IN BRAZIL, MOBILIZING, FOR DECADES, A VERY VARIED NUMBER OF HISTORICAL SUBJECTS.

nm_producao: HISTÓRIA DAS MULHERES NO BRASIL: A CONFIGURAÇÃO DO CAMPO POR MEIO DA TRAJETÓRIA DE RACHEL SOIHET (1970-2010).
ds_abstract: THE WOMEN’S HISTORIOGRAPHY ANALYSES ARE A FIELD IN GROWTH IN BRAZIL AND IT IS A FIELD THAT IS STILL IN TRANSFORMATION AND IT IS INCREASINGLY INSIDE THE HISTORY RESEARCHES IN BRAZIL. KNOWING THE IMPORTANCE TO UNDERSTAND HOW THIS FIELD WAS FORMED AND WAS SET, THIS WORK TRIES TO WRITE THIS HISTORY FROM THE LIFE COURSE OF ONE OF THE FIRST BRAZILIAN HISTORIAN TO THINK ABOUT THE FEMALE ISSUE AS A RESEARCH MATTER: RACHEL SOIHET. DUE TO HER LONG JOURNEY AS A RESEARCHER, BEING A HISTORIAN SINCE THE 1970’S AND PRODUCING UNTIL THE 2010’S, IT IS POSSIBLE TO NOTICE IN HER WORKS THE DIFFERENT PERIODS THAT WOMEN’S HISTORY RAN THROUGH. THE FIRST WORK ANALYZED HERE, HER MASTER’S THESIS ABOUT BERTHA LUTZ, PRESENTED INFLUENCES ONLY FROM SOCIOLOGY AND PHILOSOPHY, REVEALING THE INITIAL STATE OF WOMEN’S HISTORY IN THE PERIOD. THE INFLUENCE OF SOCIAL HISTORY, A FIELD THAT MADE THE EMERGENCY OF WOMEN’S HISTORY POSSIBLE, IS PERCEIVED IN HER DOCTORAL THESIS, WHERE SOIHET ANALYZES THE SITUATION OF POOR WOMEN IN RIO DE JANEIRO DURING THE FIRST REPUBLIC FROM CRIMINAL CASES. THE WOMEN’S HISTORY SETTING IS NOTICED IN WHAT THIS WORK CALLED THE SOIHET’S THIRD PHASE, BECAUSE OF HER THEORETICAL WORKS ABOUT THIS FIELD ALSO BECAUSE HER WORKS ABOUT FEMINISTS, FEMINISM MOVEMENT AND ANTI-FEMINISM. IT’S IN THIS MOMENT THAT RACHEL SOIHET REVISITS HER FIRST RESEARCH OBJECT, BERTHA LUTZ, SEEKING TO HISTORICIZE THE MOVEMENT THAT LUTZ WAS A LEADER. THE RECONSTRUCTION OF SOIHET’S INTELLECTUAL JOURNEY WAS WRITTEN ALONG WITH HER PRODUCTION CONTEXT, THAT IS, THE FEMINIST MOVEMENT AND HER INTELLECTUAL INFLUENCES. THIS RESEARCH, THEREFORE, ANALYSES RACHEL SOIHET’S PRODUCTIONS AND ACTING AS A WOMEN HISTORIAN OVER THIS DECADES IN PARALLEL WITH THE NARRATIVE OF WOMEN’S HISTORY AND FEMINIST MOVEMENT IN BRAZIL.

nm_producao: IMAGENS DA CULPA: FOTOGRAFIAS DE ESTELIONATÁRIOS NA GALERIA DOS CONDENADOS (1869 – 1876)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH INVESTIGATES, BY INTERTWINED SOURCES, THE CONSTRUCTION PROCESS OF THE FIRST PHOTOGRAPHY GALLERY PRODUCED BY AND FOR CRIMINALS IN BRAZIL, SPECIFICALLY AT CASA DE CORREÇÃO DA CORTE, FROM THE PUNISHMENT GUIDED BY THE LOGIC OF WORK. THE GALERIA DOS CONDENADOS, THE OUTCOME OF THE MENTIONED PRISON, CIRCUMSCRIBED TO THE TRANSNATIONAL DEMAND OF CRIMINAL PORTRAIT CREATION OF THE XIX CENTURY, SHOWED A VISUAL AESTHETIC AND A PATTERN PHOTOGRAPHY ALSO USED IN OTHER COUNTRIES WHICH RAISED PRECISE FORMS OF INDIVIDUALS IDENTIFICATION. BY DIALOGUING WITH THE PRESS THROUGH THE PRINCIPLE OF INTERTEXTUALITY, THE STUDY PURSUED THE HISTORY OF SWINDLERS, WHICH, BEING NARRATED BY JOURNALS, ENLIGHTENED THE TRANSGRESSING CHOICES OF THESE INDIVIDUALS BEFORE GOING TO PRISON. THE PHOTOGRAPHS ANALYSIS WAS BASED ON THE SEMIOTIC METHODOLOGY, RIGHTLY TO DEMONSTRATE THE COMPARATIVE ITEMS FROM THE PHOTOGRAPHY COLLECTION., AS WELL AS TO UNVEIL A CRIMINAL PROFILE WHICH HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SCIENTIFIC STUDIES BASED ON RACIAL AND EVOLUTIONIST THEORIES.

nm_producao: MESA INGLESA EM CASA BRASILEIRA: LOUÇA PARA O CHÁ NO RIO DE JANEIRO OITOCENTISTA (1800-1840)
ds_abstract: URBAN ARCHAEOLOGY IN THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO BETWEEN 2010 AND 2016, HAS LIVED A MOMENT OF PROFOUND GROWTH DRIVEN BY CULTURAL HERITAGE MANAGEMENT PROJECTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE CONTEXT OF 2014 WORLD CUP AND THE 2016 OLYMPICS PREPARATION. EXCAVATIONS CARRIED OUT IN HISTORICAL SITES IN RIO DE JANEIRO DATING FROM THE FIRST QUARTER OF THE 19TH CENTURY REVEAL AN ABUNDANCE OF POTTERY FRAGMENTS AND VESSELS, MAINLY ENGLISH, IN MANY SHAPES, FORMS AND FUNCTION. THE EXPRESSIVE AND RECURRENT INCIDENCE OF THESE THOUSANDS OF FRAGMENTS IS AN INVITATION TO REFLECT ON THE FUNCTIONALITY OF THESE ARTEFACTS IN THE 19TH CENTURY DOMESTIC DAILY LIFE, AS WELL AS THEIR SYMBOLIC AND CULTURAL ROLE. THE STUDY OF TEA DISHES FROM DOMESTIC GARBAGE DUMPS IN THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO DURING THE FIRST QUARTER OF THE 19TH CENTURY, LEADS US TO AN ANALYSIS OF THESE CHANGES IN CONSUMPTION PATTERNS, BEYOND THE EXPLANATION BASED EXCLUSIVELY ON THE ENGLISH COMMERCIAL EXPANSION PROJECT. THIS WORK IS INTENDED AS AN INVITATION TO OTHER HISTORIANS SO THAT THEY ARE ALSO ABLE TO WORK WITH THESE “INVISIBLE COLLECTIONS”, EVERYDAY OBJECTS OF ORDINARY PEOPLE – ARTEFACTS THAT ARE STILL WAITING FOR A RETURN TO ITS SOCIAL LIFE.

nm_producao: MINEIROS, ROCEIROS, TROPEIROS E CAPITALISTAS: TRAJETÓRIA E FORMAÇÃO DA FAMÍLIA TEIXEIRA LEITE EM UMA ECONOMIA DE TRANSIÇÃO (SÃO JOÃO DEL REI E VASSOURAS, SÉCULOS XVIII E XIX)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT RESEARCH DEALS WITH THE TRAJECTORY AND FORMATION OF THE TEIXEIRA LEITE FAMILY. TO THIS END, WE INITIALLY SOUGHT TO DEBATE THE ASPECTS THAT LED INDIVIDUALS FROM THIS AND OTHER MINING FAMILIES TO OCCUPY THE BORDER REGION ON THE BANKS OF THE PARAÍBA DO SUL RIVER VALLEY. IN THIS SENSE, WE SPOKE WITH HISTORIOGRAPHY TO CHARACTERIZE THE OCCUPATION MOVEMENT IN THIS REGION SINCE THE LATE 18TH CENTURY TO EARLY 19TH CENTURY. THEN, WE TRY TO ANALYZE THE FAMILY BRANCHES THAT ORIGINATED THE TEIXEIRA LEITE. THUS, WE COLLECTED AND ANALYZED NOTARY DOCUMENTS OF SOME MEMBERS OF THE LEITE RIBEIRO AND TEIXEIRA DE SOUZA FAMILIES, RESIDENTS OF THE VILLAGE OF SÃO JOÃO DEL REI. IN THIS ANALYSIS, WE NOTICED THE INSERTION OF THESE FAMILY GROUPS, INITIALLY, IN GOLD MINING AND, CLOSER TO THE END FROM THE 18TH CENTURY, INSERTED IN AGRICULTURAL AND COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES, A PATTERN THAT WE HIGHLIGHT AS SIMILAR TO THAT FOUND IN THE COMARCA REGION OF RIO DAS MORTES. AFTER CHARACTERIZING THE FAMILY GROUPS THAT GAVE RISE TO TEIXEIRA LEITE, WE BEGAN TO ANALYZE THE PRESENCE OF THIS LAST FAMILY IN THE VALEPARAIBANA REGION OF VASSOURAS. WE SEEK TO RELATE THE WORK OF TEIXEIRA LEITE IN THE OCCUPATION OF THE REGION WITH THE OPPORTUNITIES FOR THE OCCUPATION OF VALEPARAIBANAS LANDS AND THEIR INTEREST IN INVESTING IN COFFEE CULTURE. AT THIS POINT, IT WAS IMPORTANT TO RESTRICT THE ANALYSIS TO ONE OF THE MOST OUTSTANDING INDIVIDUALS IN THIS FAMILY BRANCH: FRANCISCO JOSÉ TEIXEIRA LEITE, WHO WOULD LATER RECEIVE THE TITLE OF BARON OF VASSOURAS. WE REALIZED THAT THE INVESTMENTS OF THE FUTURE BARON WERE CHARACTERIZED AS PART OF A PROJECT OF THE LORDSHIP-SLAVERY CLASS THAT INCLUDED CHANGES IN THE TERRITORY AND THAT REFLECTED HIS POSITION IN THAT SOCIETY. FINALLY, WE HIGHLIGHT THAT THE BARON OF VASSOURAS KNEW HOW TO PERCEIVE THE DIFFICULTIES OF COFFEE PRODUCTION IN THE SECOND HALF OF THE 19TH CENTURY, WHEN HE INVESTS HIS CAPITAL IN OTHER ECONOMIC ACTIVITIES, SUCH AS USURY.

nm_producao: NO CÁRCERE DIVINO. PURGATÓRIO, INDULGÊNCIAS E MISSAS PELAS ALMAS NO RIO DE JANEIRO SETECENTISTA
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS PROPOSES A REFLECTION ON THE BELIEF IN PURGATORY THROUGH ITS PRACTICES, SUCH AS THE USE OF INDULGENCES AND THE REQUEST FOR MASSES FOR THE SOULS BY THE CATHOLICS IN THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO IN THE EIGHTEENTH CENTURY. PROMOTED BY THE BELIEF IN PURGATORY, THESE ACTIONS SHED LIGHT ON THE VARIOUS STRATEGIES THAT EXISTED FOR SALVATION IN THE COLONIAL PERIOD. FOR THIS PURPOSE, TWO DOCUMENTARY SETS WERE ANALYZED: THE PAPAL BRIEFS AND THE WILLS. BRIEFS WERE REQUESTED FROM THE HOLY SEE FOR THE ACQUISITION OF INDULGENCES, TO BE OBTAINED BY PERFORMING CATHOLIC RITUALS. IN THE EIGHTEENTH CENTURY WILLS ANALYZED, THERE ARE SEVERAL REQUESTS FOR MASSES SEEKING FOR SELF SALVATION AND FOR OTHERS. THROUGH THIS MAIN DOCUMENTATION AND OTHER SOURCES, IT WAS SOUGHT TO OBSERVE HOW CATHOLICS OBSTINATED FOR PERSONAL SALVATION RESORTED TO INDULGENCES AND FUNERAL MASSES TO SHORTEN OR EXTINGUISH THE TIME OF PURGING, GIVEN THE FEAR INSTILLED BY THE CATHOLIC CHURCH ABOUT THE TERRIBLE PUNISHMENTS OF PURGATORY. THEREFORE, IT WAS POSSIBLE TO NOTICE SEVERAL STRATEGIES TAKEN BY THE FAITHFUL IN THE FACE OF AN UNCERTAIN AND FRIGHTENING POSTMORTEM.

nm_producao: NORMAS E PRÁTICAS DA INSTITUIÇÃO ALFANDEGÁRIA EM TEMPOS DE MUDANÇA: RIO DE JANEIRO E SALVADOR, 1700-1733
ds_abstract: THIS STUDY DEALS WITH THE RESTRUCTURING PROCESS OF SALVADOR CUSTOMS AND RIO DE JANEIRO'S CUSTOMS IN THE FIRST THREE DECADES OF THE 18TH CENTURY (1700-1733). THE ECONOMIC SITUATION GENERATED BY THE DISCOVERY OF THE GOLD MINES BROUGHT IMPORTANT CHANGES IN THE STRUCTURE AND DYNAMICS OF THE CUSTOMS THAT RESULTED IN THE GROWTH OF THE ACTIVITIES OF THAT INSTITUTION, IN THE ESTABLISHMENT OR REESTABLISHMENT OF THE RIGHT TO TITHE OF THE FARMS THAT ENTERED THE PORT, IN THE INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF OFFICERS AND CREATION OF NEW OFFICES AS WELL AS THE IMPROVEMENT AND CREATION OF NEW PROCEDURES. IN ADDITION TO THE COLLECTION AND COLLECTION OF TITHES, CUSTOMS WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR COLLECTING THE RIGHT OF ENTRY FOR SLAVES FROM COSTA DA MINA AND CAPE VERDE, THE TAX FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF THE BODYGUARDS (RIO DE JANEIRO) AND THE WET WORKERS' SUBSIDY (SALVADOR). IN THIS CONTEXT OF STRUCTURAL CHANGE OF THE INSTITUTION, AIMING TO ADAPT IT TO THE GROWING MOVEMENT OF FLEETS, BUSINESSMEN AND GOODS, CONFLICTS AND TENSIONS HAVE EMERGED INVOLVING GOVERNORS, CUSTOMS OFFICIALS, TRADERS AND CONTRACTORS OF ROYAL RIGHTS.

nm_producao: O RIO DE JANEIRO PELO BRASIL: A GRANDE REFORMA URBANA NOS JORNAIS DO PAÍS (1903-1906)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION ANALYZES HOW THE URBAN REFORMS THAT TOOK PLACE IN RIO DE JANEIRO AT THE BEGINNING OF THE 20TH CENTURY WERE PORTRAYED IN THE NEWSPAPERS OF OTHER BRAZILIAN STATES. JOURNALISTIC DISCOURSE ABOUT THE REMODELING OF THE FEDERAL CAPITAL MADE IT A REPRESENTATIVE SYMBOL OF THE COUNTRY. THIS RHETORIC BEGAN IN THE COLONIAL ERA WITH THE FORMATION OF RIO’S ‘CAPITALIDADE’ (AS THE COUNTRY’S MOST WELL-KNOWN CITY IF NOT ITS POLITICAL CAPITAL), REINFORCED WITH THE ARRIVAL OF THE COURT IN 1808. IN 1889, BRAZIL WITNESSED THE ADVENT OF THE REPUBLIC, WHICH ESTABLISHED A FEDERALIZED FORM OF GOVERNANCE. AFTER A TROUBLED AND UNSTABLE BEGINNING, THE REGIME WAS CONSOLIDATED ONLY AFTER THE CAMPOS SALES GOVERNMENT (1898-1902), WHICH ESTABLISHED THE POWER OF THE MAIN OLIGARCHIES ON THE NATIONAL POLITICAL SCENE. IT WAS HIS SUCCESSOR, RODRIGUES ALVES (1902-1906), WHO CONSOLIDATED THE REPUBLICAN REGIME ACROSS BRAZIL AS A WHOLE AND REINFORCED PLANS TO ATTRACT IMMIGRANTS AND FOREIGN CAPITAL TO THE COUNTRY. FOR THIS, A REMODELING OF THE FEDERAL CAPITAL, SEEN AS AN UNHEALTHY AND BACKWARD CITY, WOULD BE ESSENTIAL. THE RODRIGUES ALVES GOVERNMENT SPONSORED THE NECESSARY REFORMS, WHAT HISTORIAN ANDRÉ NUNES DE AZEVEDO CALLS THE ‘GRANDE REFORMA URBANA’. THE RHETORICAL PARTICIPATION OF THE PRESS IN COVERING THE ‘GREAT URBAN REFORM’ BOTH IN THE CAPITAL AND IN OTHER REGIONS OF BRAZIL WAS ESSENTIAL TO THE CONSTRUCTION WITHIN SOCIETY’S IMAGINARY OF THE COUNTRY HAVING ENTERED A NEW ERA OF PROSPERITY

nm_producao: OPERÁRIOS DO PATRIMÔNIO: PRÁTICAS E LUTAS NOS CANTEIROS DA MEMÓRIA (DIAMANTINA, MG – ANOS 1940-1960)
ds_abstract: THIS THESIS INVESTIGATES THE PLACE OF WORKERS IN THE MATERIAL AND SYMBOLIC CONSTRUCTION OF THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL AND ARTISTIC HERITAGE IN DIAMANTINA, MINAS GERAIS, BETWEEN THE 1940S AND 1960S. IN ORDER TO DISCUSS THE ROLE OF THESE AGENTS IN THIS PROCESS, I BRING TWO KEY CATEGORIES: HERITAGE CONSTRUCTION SITES AND HERITAGE WORKERS. STARTING FROM MICHEL DE CERTEAU'S (1998) NOTION OF PRACTICED PLACES, I ANALYZE THE PROCESS OF TRANSFORMING THE CONSERVATION AND RESTORATION SITES INTO HERITAGE CONSTRUCTION SITES, BASED ON THE DAILY PRACTICES OF THE WORKERS AND THEIR STRUGGLES INSIDE AND OUTSIDE THESE SPACES. IN THIS PERSPECTIVE, CONSTRUCTION SITES BECOME HERITAGE CONSTRUCTION SITES AS WORKERS OPERATE IN THESE SPACES, APPROPRIATE AND RESIGNIFY – AND SUBVERT – THE RESTORATION GUIDELINES AND, ALSO, BUILD NORMS BASED ON THEIR OWN PRACTICES. IT IS IN THIS DAILY AND UNINTERRUPTED PROCESS OF CONSTRUCTION OF THE HERITAGE CONSTRUCTION SITES THAT THE MOVEMENT OF SELF-CONSTRUCTION OF THE HERITAGE WORKERS TAKES PLACE. THE INTERSECTION WITH THE SOCIAL HISTORY OF WORK AND WITH THE STUDIES OF VISUAL CULTURE HIGHLIGHTS THE HIERARCHIES AND DISPUTES PRESENT IN HERITAGE PRESERVATION PRACTICES AND REINFORCES THE EXTENT TO WHICH THESE PRACTICES ARE AN INTEGRAL PART OF THE STRUCTURE OF THE SOCIAL WORLD.

nm_producao: OS PECADOS DOS HOMENS DE DEUS – UMA ANÁLISE DO TRATADO DE CONFISSOM E DO SACRAMENTAL, PORTUGAL SÉCULO XV.
ds_abstract: THE MAIN THEME OF THE DISSERTATION IN QUESTION IS THE SINS OF THE PORTUGUESE CLERGY, IDENTIFIED BY THE ANALYSIS OF TWO 15TH CENTURY CONFESSION MANUALS: THE SACRAMENTAL AND THE TRATADO DE CONFISSOM. AFTER THE LATERAN IV COUNCIL, EVERY CHRISTIAN IS OBLIGED TO CONFESS AT LEAST ONCE A YEAR, PRIVATELY AND TO HIS LOCAL PARISH PRIEST. THIS CHANGE IN THE SACRAMENT OF PENANCE HAS IMPLICATIONS FOR RELIGIOUS PRACTICE AT THAT TIME, FOR LAYPEOPLE AND CLERGY. IN THIS RESEARCH THE FOCUS IS ON THE CLERGY, WHO NOW ASSUME ANOTHER FUNCTION, ESSENTIAL FOR MEDIEVAL CHRISTIANITY, WHICH IS TO ADMINISTER DIVINE FORGIVENESS AND WHO ALSO SUBMITS TO THE LATERAN IV NORM, AS THE CONFESSOR ALSO CONFESSES. FROM THIS GROUP OF THE PORTUGUESE CHURCH, THEIR MORAL AND FORMATIVE WEAKNESSES WILL BE HIGHLIGHTED THROUGH THE STUDY OF THESE TWO MANUALS AND IN THE ANALYZED BIBLIOGRAPHY.

nm_producao: REDES FEMINISTAS ATRAVÉS DOS PERIÓDICOS MULHERIO E LA CACEROLA – BRASIL E URUGUAI (1981-1988)
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH DEVELOPS AN ANALYSIS ON FORMS OF ORGANIZATION AND CIRCULATION OF IDEAS, SPEECHES AND GROUP THEORIES BY FEMINIST WOMEN ORGANIZED IN RESEARCH CENTERS IN BRAZIL AND URUGUAY DURING THE DECADE OF THE 1980S. IT IS ASSUMED THAT THERE WAS AN EFFORT AMONG LATIN AMERICAN FEMINIST GROUPS TO ARTICULATE NETWORKS AROUND ACTIONS AND THEMES OF INTEREST. WITH OUR OBJECTIVE IN MIND, JOURNALS ORGANIZED AT THOSE RESEARCH CENTERS WERE ANALYZED AIMING AT GIVING VISIBILITY TO THE KNOWLEDGE PRODUCED INTERNALLY, THAT IS, MULHERIO (1981-1988), BRAZILIAN JOURNAL ORGANIZED BY THE FUNDAÇÃO CARLOS CHAGAS (FCC), SITUATED AT SÃO PAULO, AND LA CACEROLA (1984-1988), PROJECTED BY THE GRUPO DE ESTUDIOS SOBRE LA CONDICIÓN DE LA MUJER URUGUAYA (GRECMU) AND ESTABLISHED IN MONTEVIDEO. BY ANALYZING THE JOURNALS, IT IS PLAUSIBLE TO ASSUME THE EXISTENCE OF A NETWORK, ALTHOUGH NOT FORMAL, FOUNDED WITH A WIDER PURPOSE OF CREATING THEIR OWN FEMINISM, A LATIN AMERICAN ONE, WHICH WOULD BE ABLE TO APPRECIATE THEIR ISSUES ACCORDING TO THE SOCIAL, POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC CONTEXTS, LOCALLY. A NETWORK COMPOSED OF POINTS (FEMINISM), CONNECTED BY LINES (FEMINIST THEORIES, READINGS, OPPRESSIONS, PATRIARCHY, SEXUAL REPRESSION, INVISIBILITY) IN A PLANE (LATIN AMERICA, SPECIFICALLY THE SOUTHERN CONE, AND BRAZIL AND URUGUAY, IN THIS PARTICULAR CASE), INTERTWINING AT A POLITICAL AND SOCIAL CONTEXT THAT ALLOWED THESE INTERSECTIONS TO BE ESTABLISHED.

nm_producao: TURISMO, PATRIMÔNIO, MÍDIA E PASSADOS TRAUMÁTICOS: REPRESENTAÇÕES SOBRE A ESCRAVIDÃO NO VALE DO PARAÍBA FLUMINENSE (1960-2017)
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT RESEARCH CONSISTS OF A PROPOSAL TO ANALYZE THE NARRATIVES THAT ARE BUILT ON SLAVERY AND THE TRAJECTORY OF BLACKS IN BRAZIL, BASED ON THE EXPERIENCES OF THE SOCALLED “CULTURAL TOURISM” ORGANIZED IN THE SOUTHERN REGION OF RIO DE JANEIRO. TO THIS END, WE STRIVE TO UNDERSTAND PUBLIC HISTORY AS AN ESSENTIAL AREA OF ACTIVITY FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF DISCOURSES ON HISTORY FOR THE LAY PUBLIC AND TO OUTLINE THE TOURIST PROCESS OF THE PARAÍBA VALLEY IN RIO DE JANEIRO TO UNDERSTAND THE CHARACTERISTICS THAT SHAPE TOURISM IN THE REGION. THROUGH THE ANALYSIS OF REPORTS FROM WIDELY CIRCULATED NEWSPAPERS, AUDIOVISUAL PRODUCTIONS AND INTERVIEWS WITH SOCIAL ACTORS INVOLVED IN THE (DE) CONSTRUCTION, MAINTENANCE AND DISSEMINATION OF NARRATIVES ABOUT THE REGION AND AFRICAN SLAVERY, OUR AIM WAS TO PROBLEMATIZE THE PRESENCE OF DISCOURSES THAT NEGLECT SLAVE SYSTEM AS A CRIME AGAINST HUMANITY AND CORROBORATE THE MAINTENANCE OF STRUCTURAL RACISM THROUGH TOOLS OF ENTERTAINMENT AND LEISURE.
nm_discente: CAROLINE BARBARA FERREIRA CASTELO BRANCO REIS

nm_producao: “UM CLIMA DE AGITAÇÃO CRIADO POR ALUNOS ESQUERDISTAS”: VIGILÂNCIA, MILITÂNCIA POLÍTICA E LUTAS PELAS LIBERDADES DEMOCRÁTICAS NA UFPE (1973-1985).
ds_abstract: IN THIS PAPER WE ANALYZE THE IMPACTS OF THE CIVIL-MILITARY DICTATORSHIP ON THE FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF PERNAMBUCO (UFPE) BETWEEN 1973 AND 1985. THE INITIAL MILESTONE REFERS TO THE LAUNCH OF THE FIRST OPPOSING PLATE DURING THE ELECTIONS TO THE CENTRAL DIRECTORY OF STUDENTS (DCE/UFPE), AFTER A HISTORY OF DOMINATION OF THE BODY BY RIGHT-WING STUDENTS SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE REGIME. WHILE THE FINAL MILESTONE CONCERNS THE END OF THE DICTATORSHIP, GIVEN THE SYMBOLISM OF THE STRUGGLES FOR THE RETURN OF DEMOCRATIC FREEDOMS, IN WHICH PROFESSORS AND UNIVERSITY STUDENTS WERE RELEVANT IN THIS PROCESS. WE DEFEND THE THESIS THAT DURING THIS PERIOD SOCIAL SURVEILLANCE WAS THE MAIN INTERVENTION ON CAMPUS,ALTHOUGH THERE ARE OTHER REPRESSIVE PRACTICES COMMITTED BY SECURITY AND INFORMATION AGENTS IN COOPERATION WITH THE RECTORY AND ITS LEADERS, WHEN THEY ACHIEVED SOCIAL CONTROL DURING THE POLITICAL OPENING. THE SURVEILLANCE OF THE ACADEMIC COMMUNITY WAS CARRIED OUT IN VARIOUS WAYS AND BY DIFFERENT AGENTS, INCLUDING MILITARY AND CIVILIAN, BASED ON INFORMATION, UNDERSTOOD AS A DISCIPLINARY KNOWLEDGE-POWER WITH EFFECTS ON DAILY PRACTICES. THE INFORMATION WAS CALCULATED, ELABORATED, MANIPULATED AND AIMED AT SUBJECTS AND INSTITUTIONS TO FRAME THEM, INCRIMINATE THEM AND ELIMINATE THEM, WHEN SEEN AS ENEMIES OF THE STATE ORDER. HENCE THE CONSTRUCTION OF GENERIC DISCOURSES TO STEREOTYPE AND COMBAT THEM, SUCH AS: SUBVERSIVE, COMMUNIST AND LEFTIST; GENERATING REAL EFFECTS ON THE POPULATION. THUS, SURVEILLANCE AS REPRESSIVE PRACTICE GENERATED ON CAMPUS FEAR, SELF-CENSORSHIP, CHANGED DAILY RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN TEACHERS, STUDENTS AND EMPLOYEES AND MANAGED TO OBTAIN CLUES DURING THE INVESTIGATION AND SOCIAL ESPIONAGE BY THE MILITARY, ENABLING THE CREATION, SELECTION AND DISSEMINATION OF DISCOURSES TO IDENTIFY, PREVENT AND EXTIRRATE CONTESTATORY PRACTICES. THE MILITANTS' BODIES WERE INVESTED BY POLITICAL KNOWLEDGE-POWER, IN WHICH COERCIVE PRACTICES WERE STIMULI FOR RESISTANCE AND VICE VERSA. THEREFORE, WE ANALYZE THE HISTORY OF UFPE (1946-1974), SURVEILLANCE ON CAMPUS AS A FEDERAL INTERVENTION (1974-1979), THE GROWTH OF STUDENT OPPOSITION FROM THE ELECTIONS OF ITS MAIN REPRESENTATIVE BODIES (1973-1980) AND HOW THE STRUGGLES OF STUDENTS AND TEACHERS IN DEFENSE OF DEMOCRATIC FREEDOMS OCCURRED (1977-1985). WE PROBLEMATIZE HOW UFPE WAS CONSTITUTED AS A FIELD, BECAUSE IT DID NOT LIMIT THE PRODUCTION AND DISSEMINATION OF ACADEMIC KNOWLEDGE. IN THIS DYNAMIC SPACE AND RELATIVE AUTONOMY, UNIVERSITY LEADERS ENGAGED IN UNIVERSITY POLITICS AND TOGETHER WITH STUDENTS ENGAGED IN THE POLITICAL FIELD AS MILITANTS OR SYMPATHIZERS OF ORGANIZATIONS, PARTIES AND SOCIAL MOVEMENTS. THERE WERE PHYSICAL AND SYMBOLIC VIOLENCE, DISPUTES OVER KNOWLEDGE-POWER, SEARCHES FOR SOCIAL POSITIONS, HIERARCHIES, DECISION-MAKING, TENSIONS AND INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL POLITICAL CONFLICTS AMONG THE PARTICIPANTS, LIMITATIONS IN THE POSSIBILITIES OF MILITANCY, PUNISHMENTS, RESISTANCES AND SOCIAL EXCLUSIONS. THAT IS WHY WE CONSIDER UFPE AS A SOCIAL MICROCOSM TO ANALYZE THE IMPACTS OF THE DICTATORSHIP IN BRAZIL, TAKING INTO ACCOUNT ITS SPECIFICITIES. THE RESEARCH WAS CARRIED OUT FROM THE COLLECTION, SELECTION AND ANALYSIS OF A WIDE AND VARIED DOCUMENTARY SET FROM THE NATIONAL ARCHIVE, THE JORDÃO EMERENCIANO STATE PUBLIC ARCHIVE, THE DIGITAL LIBRARY'S DIGITAL LIBRARY AND THE PERSONAL ARCHIVE OF EDVAL NUNES DA SILVA CAJÁ.

nm_producao: “VAI BUSCAR NO MATO O QUE VOCÊ ENJEITOU!”: PRÁTICAS RELIGIOSAS E DEVOÇÕES NEGRAS NO VALE DO IGUAPE – RECÔNCAVO SUL DA BAHIA (C. 1920 – C. 1980)
ds_abstract: THE REGION OF RECÔNCAVO BAIANO IS A WELL-KNOWN REFERENCE TO BRAZILIAN HISTORIANS, AS IT HAS BEEN THE SCENE OF VARIOUS ECONOMIC AND CULTURAL EXPERIENCES, ESPECIALLY OF BLACK POPULATIONS WHO LANDED IN BRAZIL VIA THE AFRICAN DIASPORA, WITH PREDOMINANCE OF THE JEJES, NAGAGOS, ANGOLA AND MINE, RESPECTIVELY. THE CULTURAL CONFLUENCE MADE POSSIBLE THE EMERGENCE OF A TANGLE OF RELIGIOUS BELIEFS AND PRACTICES IMBRICATED IN THE DAILY LIVES OF INDIVIDUALS, ALSO RECREATED FROM THE CONTACT WITH THE CULTURAL AND RELIGIOUS ELEMENTS OF INDIGENOUS AND EUROPEANS. BY CONSIDERING THIS SCENARIO, THIS RESEARCH PROPOSED A REFLECTION ON THE RELIGIOUS DYNAMICS PRESENT IN THE VALE DO IGUAPE, WHICH WAS SYNTHESIZED, IN THE EARLY TWENTIETH CENTURY, ON THE BASIS OF DEVOTIONS TO SAINTS, ORISHAS AND CABOCLOS. IT IS SAID THAT IT WAS USUAL, AMONG THE SLAVES IN THE REGION IN QUESTION, TO DO RITUALS OF OFFERINGS TO SÃO ROQUE /OBALUAÊ IN TIMES OF ILLNESS. THIS IS THE NARRATIVE ENGENDERED BY COLLECTIVE MEMORY WHICH SHOWS THE RELIGIOUS RELEVANCE OF PLEASING THE SAINTS/ORISHAS. THE NEED TO SURVIVE, IN MATERIAL AND SPIRITUAL TERMS, ENABLED THE RECREATION AND RESIGNIFICATION OF BELIEFS IN DAILY LIFE. HAVING IN RELIGIOSITY THE NECESSARY BALANCE TO RECONFIGURE THEIR EXISTENCES IN THE FACE OF DAILY LACKS REPRESENTED A GREAT SURVIVAL STRATEGY FOR BLACK POPULATIONS, ESPECIALLY IN DEALING WITH MULTIPLE IDENTITY FORMATION. ACCORDINGLY, THIS THESIS AIMS TO UNDERSTAND THE DIMENSIONS OF THE RELIGIOUS PHENOMENON IN DAILY LIFE. FROM THE TESTIMONIES, IT WAS POSSIBLE TO IDENTIFY THE MAIN LEADERS OF THE DEVOTIONS TO SÃO ROQUE/OBALUAÊ TO WHICH IS ADDED FESTIVITIES, OBSERVING THE STRATEGIES THAT WAS TAKEN TO PRESERVE THE VERSIONS OF THOSE FESTIVITIES FOR DECADES. THEREFORE, THE USE OF ORAL SOURCES REPRESENTS THE MAIN METHODOLOGICAL TOOL OF THIS RESEARCH, BY WHICH INDIVIDUALS, BASED ON EXPERIENCES STORED IN MEMORY, SHARE THEIR OWN VERSIONS ON FACTS; THE HISTORIAN, AS WELL AS IN OTHER TYPES OF SOURCES, MUST EXPLORE THEM WITH CRITICISM.

nm_producao: VÍCIOS ARDENTES: LEIS E CONTRAVENÇÕES NAS MINAS DURANTE O GOVERNO DE D. PEDRO DE ALMEIDA (CA.1717-CA.1721)
ds_abstract: THIS STUDY AIMS TO IDENTIFY AND UNDERSTAND THE CONTEXT OF D. PEDRO DE ALMEIDA’S, THIRD COUNT OF ASSUMAR, IN THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE SÃO PAULO AND MINAS CAPTAINCY (1717-1721), EMPHASIZING THE LAW APPLICATION PROCEDURES AND ITS RELATIONSHIP WITH CONTRAVENING PRACTICES. IT’S COMPREHENSIBLE THAT SUCH PRACTICES WERE AN INHERENT RESULT OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE DYNAMICS ESTABLISHED IN ORDER TO CONTROL THAT FRONTIER REGION AND ITS RICHES, AND ALSO AS PART OF THE PERIOD’S OWN NORMATIVE UNIVERSE. THE EXPLORATION OF A VAST AND WEALTHY TERRITORY, ALLIED WITH THE COLONY’S CONSTANT SITUATION OF SCARCITY, DEMANDED FROM THIS GOVERNOR, WITH A MILITARY AND SCHOLARLY BACKGROUND, A PERSONAL AND INCISIVE WAY OF GOVERNING - WHEN NOT AN INFORMAL ONE - WHEN FACED AGAINST THE STRONG OPPOSITION MADE BY POWERFUL LOCAL INDIVIDUALS. IT’S OBSERVABLE THAT THE CONDITIONS OF GOVERNABILITY IN THE FIRST TWO DECADES OF THE XVIII CENTURY MINAS WERE EXTREMELY FRAGILE, A COMMON PHENOMENON IN REGIONS TOO DISTANT FROM THE ADMINISTRATIVE CENTERS AND INTENSIFIED BY THE CHAOTIC SOCIAL FORMATION OF THE MINING SOCIETY. MANY OF THOSE GROUPS AND INDIVIDUALS THAT WOULD EVENTUALLY BECOME THE MAIN OPPOSITION AGAINST D. PEDRO DE ALMEIDA’S GOVERNMENT - BE IT THROUGH RIOTS, CRIMES AND CONTRABAND - COULD ALSO BE THE ONES WHO WOULD BE BENEFITED BY THE VERY MECHANISMS UTILIZED BY THE CROWN TO “BUILD THE AMERICA”. THIS UNDERLINES THE DIALECTIC TRAIT OF THE PORTUGUESE EMPIRE AND THE VOLATILITY OF POWER AND ITS AGENTS, IN A COLONIAL SOCIETY WHERE EVERYTHING COULD BE PRONE TO REINVENTION.

nm_producao: HISTÓRIA DO SUJEITO - ANO DA EJA NO MUNICÍPIO DE CRISTALINA -GO
ds_abstract: IN THIS STUDY, A RESEARCH ABOUT THE EXPERIENCE AND SCHOOL ROUTINE OF STUDENTS OF YOUTH AND ADULT EDUCATION (EJA) WILL BE PRESENTED. THIS RESEARCH HAS AS OBJECT OF STUDY THE STUDENTS OF THE EJA OF ELEMENTARY EDUCATION II, OF THE MUNICIPAL SCHOOL EDUARDO DE PAIVA REZENDE, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CRISTALINA-GOIÁS IN THE ACADEMIC PERIOD BETWEEN 2015-2018. THIS QUALITATIVE / QUANTITATIVE CASE STUDY WAS CARRIED OUT IN TWO STAGES: BIBLIOGRAPHIC RESEARCH AND FIELD RESEARCH, IN WHICH THE LIFE STORIES OF THESE STUDENTS ARE PRESENTED AND ANALYZED IN ORDER TO, THROUGH THEM, IDENTIFY AND UNDERSTAND HOW THE FACTORS EXTERNAL FACTORS CONTRIBUTE TO THE PERMANENCE OR NOT OF THIS STUDENT IN THE CLASSROOM. SEEKING TO ASCERTAIN, PRIMARILY, HOW THE PROFESSION, ESPECIALLY OF RURAL WORKERS, INTERFERES IN THE ACCESS, PERMANENCE AND CONCLUSION OF THE STUDIES OF THESE STUDENTS. FOR THIS, SOME ASPECTS WERE CONSIDERED FUNDAMENTAL, SUCH AS CLASS, GENDER AND WORK RELATIONS ISSUES, BEING GUIDED BY SCHOLARS, ARROYO (2012); FREIRE (2002); FRIGOTTO (2001), THE LABOR RELATIONS IN ENGELS (2001), MARX (2004); ANTUNES (1999); THE GENDER DIVISION IN SAFFIOTI (2013); SCOTT (1990) AND RURAL WORK IN BARROS (2015); OLIVEIRA (2014) AND SILVA (2015).

nm_producao: LITERATURA E ENSINO DE HISTÓRIA: RACISMO E CIDADANIA NO CONTEXTO DE SALA DE AULA
ds_abstract: TEACHING HISTORY IN BRAZIL IS A FIELD OF RESEARCH WITH A WIDE HORIZON OF REFLECTION, LEADING RESEARCHERS TO (RE) THINK, AMONG OTHERS, THE SPACE OF LANGUAGES IN THE CLASSROOM, ESPECIALLY TRADITIONAL ONES, SUCH AS LITERATURE. THUS, THE PRESENT WORK INTENDS TO EXPLORE THE POSSIBILITIES OF USES OF RACISM AND CITIZENSHIP IN HISTORY TEACHING, BASED ON WORKS BY THE WRITER ALUÍSIO TANCREDO GONÇALVES DE AZEVEDO. TO THIS END, WE CHOSE AS PRIMARY SOURCES THE NOVELS THE MULATTO AND THE TENEMENT, WORKS BY THE AUTHOR. FROM THIS CHOICE, WE BUILT A METHODOLOGY THAT TAKES BOTH WORKS AS A MOTIVE THAT GENERATES DISCUSSIONS AROUND THE PROBLEMATIZATION OF THE CONCEPTS OF RACISM AND CITIZENSHIP IN THE HISTORY DISCIPLINE. SEEKING TO EXPAND THE POSSIBILITIES FOR THE CLASSROOM, WE RESORT TO OTHER LITERARY WORKS, PERIOD AND CONTEMPORARY, SUCH AS THE NOVELS GERMINAL, A MULATA, ÚRSULA, IN THE FIRST GROUP, AND, A COLOR DEFECT, RACISM EXPLAINED TO MY CHILDREN, IN THE SECOND. THE WORK METHODOLOGY WAS ALSO BASED ON THE APPROXIMATION BETWEEN THEORETICAL ASPECTS LOCATED IN THE FIELD OF HISTORIOGRAPHY, HISTORY TEACHING AND EDUCATION. LITERATURE IS SIGNIFICANT FOR THE TEACHING OF HISTORY WHEN IT SAYS ABOUT POSSIBILITIES THAT DID NOT HAPPEN (GUIMARÃES, 2003), ABOUT HABITS AND CUSTOMS OF A GIVEN TIME (PAGÈS, 2003), OR FOR ITS ABILITY TO REPRESENT THE PAST (PESAVENTO, 2014), SOMETHING THAT ILLUMINATES THE DIVERSITY OF REFLECTIONS AROUND COMPLEX ISSUES THAT TALK ABOUT OUR PAST, AND INFORM ABOUT THE PRESENT. THE RESULTS ACHIEVED ALLOW TO INDICATE LITERARY ART, BY ALUÍSIO AZEVEDO, A FRUITFUL PATH FOR DIDACTIC-PEDAGOGICAL PROPOSALS INTERESTED IN ADDRESSING THE CONCEPTS OF RACISM AND CITIZENSHIP IN THE HISTORY DISCIPLINE AND IN RELATION TO THE SOCIAL AND POLITICAL FORMATION OF BRAZIL IN THE CONTEXT OF THE ANALYZED SOURCES, THE CENTURY XIX. FOR THEIR HISTORICAL VALUE, O MULATTO E O TENEMENT MEANS, FOR THE TEACHING OF HISTORY, THE CONTEXTUALIZATION AND PROBLEMATIZATION OF RACISM AND CITIZENSHIP IN THE HISTORICAL FORMATION OF BRAZILIAN SOCIETY. THE MULATTO, ABOVE ALL, DISCUSSES THE PLACE OF THE BLACK IN THE SLAVE SOCIETY AND HOW THIS IS RELATED TO THE FORMATION OF RACIAL PREJUDICE. LIKEWISE, THE TENEMENT ALLOWS CRITICAL ANALYZES ABOUT THE CONSTRUCTION OF CITIZENSHIP IN BRAZIL IN THE CLASSROOM. BOTH NOVELS CORROBORATE FOR ANALYZES INTERESTED IN IDENTIFYING THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN RACISM, CITIZENSHIP AND THE DIDACTIC CONTENT FOR THE HISTORY DISCIPLINE. THUS, THE NOVELS TAKEN AS PRIMARY SOURCES FOR THE TEACHING OF HISTORY ILLUMINATE AND EXPAND INTERPRETATIONS AROUND AND FROM THE HISTORICAL FORMATION OF BRAZILIAN SOCIETY.

nm_producao: MILLÔR FERNANDES E O HUMOR GRÁFICO: REPRESENTAÇÕES E CONTRIBUIÇÕES PARA O ENSINO DE HISTÓRIA
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION PRESENTS THE IMPORTANCE OF WORKING WITH CARTOONS AND CARTOONS IN THE CLASSROOM, AS WELL AS SHOWING THE LIFE AND WORK OF THE AUTHOR MILLÔR FERNANDES, WHO CONTRIBUTED A LOT TO THIS TYPE OF TEXT. THE RESEARCH FORMULATED A DIDACTIC PROPOSAL IN A CLASSROOM-WORKSHOP MODEL FOR TEACHING HISTORY, USING CARTOONS AND CARTOONS REFERRING TO THE PERIOD OF THE MILITARY CIVIL DICTATORSHIP IN BRAZIL. THE PERSPECTIVE WAS TO MAKE CLASSES MORE DYNAMIC AND INTERACTIVE, AND WITH THAT EVOLVE THE CRITICAL SENSE AND REFLECTIVE LOOK OF THE SUBJECT IN LEARNING.

nm_producao: RELATO DE EXPERIÊNCIA: REFLEXÕES SOBRE O ENSINO DE HISTÓRIA MEDIADO PELA EDUCAÇÃO HISTÓRICA
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION AIMS TO REPORT THE ACTION RESEARCH CARRIED OUT DURING THE PROFESSIONAL MASTER'S COURSE OF THE POSTGRADUATE PROGRAM IN HISTORY, CATALAN REGIONAL. THE INVESTIGATION EMERGED FROM THE CONCERNS ARISING FROM THE EXPERIENCE AS A TEACHER. THE DIFFICULTIES FACED IN THE CLASSROOM AWOKE ME TO THE NEED TO PROBLEMATIZE QUESTIONS ABOUT THE TEACHING AND LEARNING OF STUDENTS IN THE DISCIPLINE OF HISTORY. FOR THAT, I USED CULTURAL HISTORY AS A THEORETICAL SUPPORT TO THINK ABOUT HISTORY, HISTORICAL EDUCATION AS A METHODOLOGICAL SUPPORT TO PROBLEMATIZE THE DEVELOPMENT OF ACTIVITIES THAT INVOLVED AN ACTION RESEARCH PERSPECTIVE AND THE EXPERIENCE REPORT AS A WAY OF PRESENTING THE WORK. THE INVESTIGATION CONCLUDED THAT, PLAYING THE ROLE OF MEDIATION, THE TEACHER OFFERS STUDENTS MORE AUTONOMY. WORKING WITH METHODOLOGIES SUCH AS THE CLASSROOM, FOR EXAMPLE, USING LOCAL HISTORY FOR THIS, PROVIDES STUDENTS WITH THE PROCESS OF REFLECTING ON THEIR EXPERIENCES AND BRINGS THEM CLOSER TO HISTORICAL LEARNING, AND, FINALLY, PROMOTES THE RECOGNITION OF STUDENTS AS HISTORICAL SUBJECTS.

nm_producao: “TODO DIA É SEGUNDA- FEIRA”: UM ESTUDO SOBRE AS PRÁTICAS E SABERES DAS MULHERES RURAIS DA COMUNIDADE DE CORUMBAJUBA MUNICÍPIO DE ORIZONA/GO
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH HAD AS OBJECT OF STUDY THE WOMEN RESIDING IN THE RURAL COMMUNITY OF CORUMBAJUBA, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ORIZONA, GOIÁS. THEIR SOCIAL PRACTICES AND THEIR KNOWLEDGE THAT ARE PRESENT IN THE WORK RELATIONS BETWEEN MEN AND WOMEN IN FAMILY FARMING WERE ELUCIDATED AND THAT THEY OUTLINE THE CONFRONTATIONS OF CONTEMPORARY SOCIAL INSERTION OF RURAL WOMEN IN THE MANIFESTATION OF THE SOCIAL SPACES OCCUPIED BY THEM, IN ORDER TO LEARN ABOUT THE PRESENCE AND STRENGTH OF PATRIARCHY IN THEIR DAILY LIVES. FOR THIS, THE RESEARCH WAS DEVELOPED THROUGH MEETINGS WITH A FOCUS GROUP OF RURAL WORKING WOMEN IN THIS COMMUNITY. METHODOLOGICALLY, IN PARTNERSHIP WITH SERVIÇO NACIONAL DE APRENDIZAGEM RURAL (SENAR), IN THE UNFOLDING OF THE TRAINING GIVEN TO THE GROUP OF RURAL WOMEN IN CORUMBAJUBA, SEMI-STRUCTURED QUESTIONNAIRES WERE APPLIED WITH A SCRIPT OF QUESTIONS TO PROMOTE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE RESEARCH, OPEN TO INHERENT QUESTIONS THE MOMENTARY CIRCUMSTANCES THE INTERVIEW, AIMING TO HEAR THEM AND, THUS, UNDERSTAND SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS IN A DIALOGUE WITH AUTHORS SUCH AS CARLA BASSANEZI PINSKY (2012), MARY DEL PRIORE (2017), DENIZE BERNUZZI DE SANT'ANNA (2014), FLÁVIA BIROLI (2018), JOSÉ MARIA TARDIN (2012), LAURA BARCELLA AND FERNANDA LOPES (2014). MICHELLE PERROT (2007), FOR EXAMPLE, RESORTED TO THE HISTORICAL PROCESS TO ANALYZE THE HISTORY OF WOMEN, HIGHLIGHTING WHAT IS SOMETIMES TAKEN AS NATURAL, ASSUMING CONTROL FIELDS FOR WOMEN'S PARTICIPATION IN POLITICAL, SOCIAL AND FAMILY LIFE. DURING THIS JOURNEY, OUR INTENTION WAS ALSO TO GIVE VISIBILITY TO RURAL WOMEN AND TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE ELABORATION OF THE HISTORY OF WOMEN IN BRAZIL IN THE REACH OF DIFFERENT SOCIAL GROUPS.

nm_producao: TRUNFO: UMA CARTADA PARA A IDENTIFICAÇÃO E COMBATE AO RACISMO NA 1ª FASE DO ENSINO FUNDAMENTAL.
ds_abstract: IN THIS MASTER'S THESIS I TRIED TO PROVOKE A DEBATE THAT BROADENS THE DISCUSSION OF HOW RACISM IS CONFIGURED IN THE CHILDREN'S EXPERIENCE. MAKING CONSIDERATIONS ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF TEACHERS AND SCHOOLS TO ALLY AND, ALIGN WITH A PEDAGOGICAL PRACTICE ENGAGED WITH LAW 10.639 / 2003 WHICH DEALS WITH THE MANDATORY TEACHING OF AFRICAN HISTORY AND AFRO-BRAZILIAN CULTURE. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THE INVESTIGATION, WE ASKED THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS: HOW OUR CHILDREN ARE DEVELOPING UNDER THE NATURALIZATION OF RACISM, WHICH MAY BE PRESENT IN SCHOOL DYNAMICS? AND SO: ON WHAT PARAMETERS DO BLACK AND NON-BLACK CHILDREN RELY ON BUILDING AND UNDERSTANDING BLACK IDENTITY? THE RESEARCH PROVOKES A DEBATE THAT EXPANDS THE POSSIBILITIES OF APPROACHING THE THEME OF RACISM WITH CHILDREN FROM THE 1ST PHASE OF ELEMENTARY EDUCATION IN A PUBLIC SCHOOL IN CATALÃO, IN THE STATE OF GOIÁS. I USED THE ACTION RESEARCH METHODOLOGY AND, THROUGH THE TRUNFO CARD GAME, WE APPROACHED THE THEME LIGHTLY IN A CLASS OF 4TH GRADE CHILDREN. I PRESENT THE SEARCH DIVIDED, BASICALLY IN THREE PARTS: THE FIRST IS THEORETICAL AND DISCUSSES THE CATEGORY OF RACISM, BRAZIL AND EDUCATION. THE SECOND INVESTIGATES HOW RACISM IS CONFIGURED IN THE CHILDREN'S IMAGINATION, USING THE TRUNFO CARD GAME AND ITS DYNAMICS. FINALLY, THE RESULTS OBTAINED AT SCHOOL POINTED OUT THAT RACISM AND THE ARTFUL IDEA OF RACE, BUILT IN THE 19TH CENTURY, ECHO IN THE MODES OF SUBJECTIFICATION OF CHILDREN, WHO ALREADY BELIEVE THAT NON-BLACKS DETERMINE INTELLECTUAL AND AESTHETIC CHARACTERISTICS OF INDIVIDUALS, WHICH IT AFFECTS THE FORMATION OF BLACK CHILDREN IN THE STRUGGLE FOR SELF-AFFIRMATION AND SELF-ACCEPTANCE.

nm_producao: UM OLHAR SOBRE O RACISMO NO BRASIL: SUA CONSTRUÇÃO PELO ESTADO E A LUTA DOS NEGROS PELA SUA SUPERAÇÃO.
ds_abstract: THE OBJECTIVE OF THE PRESENT WORK WASTO SYSTEMATICALLY REFLECT ON THE HISTORICAL FORMATION OF BLACKS IN BRAZILIAN SOCIETY, EXAMINING THE SOCIAL CONSTRUCTION IN ORDER TO REALIZE THAT DIFFERENCES BASED ON SKIN COLOR ARE ASSOCIATED WITH AN IMPOSING SYSTEM OF SOCIAL INEQUALITIES BECAUSE WE UNDERSTAND THAT SLAVERY WAS A HEAVY OBSTACLE TO THE FORMATION OF A TRUE NATION, FOR MAINTAINING A PORTION OF THE POPULATION SUBJUGATED IN A NATURALIZED WAY AND ANOTHER WITH “NATURAL” PRIVILEGES AS ENEMIES TO EACH OTHER, PREVENTING THE COUNTRY'S SOCIAL AND POLITICAL INTEGRATION. OUR TRAJECTORY BEGINS IN THE 19TH CENTURY, WHERE WE DISCUSSED EXTERNAL PRESSURES TO END TRAFFICKING, THE EMERGENCE OF ABOLITIONIST MOVEMENTS, ACTIONS OF REBELLIONS ON THE PART OF ENSLAVED PEOPLE AND THE WORK DEVELOPED BY PARLIAMENTARIANS AND JURISTS IN THE PROCESS OF LAWS THAT WOULD GRADUALLY PREPARE THE WAY FOR THE GOLDEN LAW SIGNED BY PRINCESS ISABEL ON MAY 13, 1888, WHICH FREED AND INCORPORATED THE FORMER SLAVES TO CIVIL RIGHTS, HOWEVER THIS INCORPORATION TOOK PLACE MORE FORMAL THAN REAL, WHERE IN PRACTICE IT BROUGHT FEW SOCIAL CHANGES TO THE NEWLY FREED . WITH THE PROCLAMATION OF THE REPUBLIC IN 1889 AND THE RATIFICATION OF THE FIRST REPUBLICAN CONSTITUENT IN 1881, THERE WAS NO AFFIRMATIVE LAW THAT PROMOTED THE INTEGRATION OF THE FREEDMEN NOW INTO CLASS SOCIETY. WE ARGUE THAT EVEN IN THE FACE OF APATHY ON THE PART OF THE COMPETENT AUTHORITIES, THE POPULATION, MOSTLY COMPOSED OF FREEDMEN, DID NOT STAND IDLY BY AND WENT TO FIGHT, ORGANIZED THEMSELVES IN CLUBS, CREATED NEWSPAPERS AND FOUNDED THE BLACK MOVEMENT, AN ORGANIZED MOVEMENT THAT STARTED TO CLAIM AND FIGHT FOR A BETTER PLACEMENT OF BLACKS IN SOCIETY.

nm_producao: O PROJETO DE LEI DA ESCOLA SEM PARTIDO: O PERIGOSO DISCURSO CONSERVADOR NO ATUAL CENÁRIO DA EDUCAÇÃO BRASILEIRA
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT DISSERTATION ENTITLED “THE SCHOOL WITHOUT A PARTY AND THE CONSERVATIVE DISCOURSE IN THE BRAZILIAN EDUCATION SCENARIO”, ANALYZES THE MOVEMENT / PROGRAM SCHOOL WITHOUT A PARTY, AS WELL AS ITS MAIN BILLS AND THEIR IMPACTS ON EDUCATION. WE DESCRIBE THE AFOREMENTIONED MOVEMENT / PROGRAM AS PART OF A CONSERVATIVE IDEOLOGY THAT PLAGUES BRAZILIAN SOCIETY, CONSIDERING THAT ITS PROJECTS FUNCTION AS AUTHORITARIAN MECHANISMS AND IMPOSE THE CHARACTERISTIC ADVANCES OF A SECULAR AND DEMOCRATIC STATE. THE MAIN POINTS OF INVESTIGATION WILL PERMEATE SINCE A HISTORICAL CONTEXT STARTING FROM THE 2000S, THE 2016 COUP AGAINST PRESIDENT DILMA VANA ROUSSEFF, PASSING BRIEFLY THROUGH THE BOLSONARO GOVERNMENT, TO BETTER UNDERSTAND THE MOVEMENT / PROGRAM ESCOLA SEM PARTIDO ALONG WITH THE ANALYSIS OF ITS MAIN PLS. FINALLY, WE WILL TALK A LITTLE ABOUT THE IDEA OF THE DEFENSE LETTER OF ESCOLA SEM PARTIDO, SHOWING WHAT IS AT STAKE, THE ATTACK ON PAULO FREIRE'S LEGACY AND THE THREATS TO TEACHERS' AUTONOMY

nm_producao: APRENDIZAGENS SOBRE O CORPO: UMA ANÁLISE DO DOCUMENTÁRIO CITY OF JOY (2016) SOBRE A VIOLÊNCIA CONTRA AS MULHERES CONGOLESAS
ds_abstract: CITY OF JOY, A DOCUMENTARY RELEASED BY NETFLIX IN 2018, PRESENTS THE AUDIENCE TO A RECOVERY CENTER IN THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO THAT HELPS WOMEN WHO WERE SEXUALLY ASSAULTED BY MEMBERS OF THE MILITIAS. THIS RESEARCH ANALYSES HOW THE DOCUMENTARY DEPICTS THE ARMED CONFLICTS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY AND HOW THE CURRENT EVENTS IN THE COUNTRY AFFECT CONGOLESE WOMEN. THE USE OF RAPE AS A WEAPON OF WAR IS RECURRENT AND IT BECAME A TURF DOMINATION MECHANISM USED BY THE MILITIAS SPONSORED BY WEALTHY COUNTRIES WITH CAPITALIST AMBITIONS. CONSIDERING THE AFOREMENTIONED TOPICS, THIS WORK PROMOTES A DEBATE ON NEOCOLONIALISM, IMPERIALISM, AND PATRIARCHY, WITH THE INTENTION OF COMPREHENDING THE PATH CITY OF JOY SETS IN ITS NARRATIVE, AND OF DISCUSSING THAT IT IS NOTICEABLE IN THE DOCUMENTARY THAT CONGOLESE WOMEN ENDURE A LEARNING PROCESS ABOUT THEIR BODIES AND THEMSELVES THROUGH CLASSES AND ACTIVITIES IN THE CITY OF JOY CENTER, WHERE THEY ALSO RECEIVE PROPER MEDICAL CARE.

nm_producao: “A POLÍTICA DO TOMA LÁ, DÁ CÁ”: UM ESTUDO DA CULTURA POLÍTICA A PARTIR DAS DISPUTAS ENTRE TIMBÓS E FARISEUS EM JANAÚBA/MG (1960-1980)
ds_abstract: THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS RESEARCH IS TO ANALYZE THE POLITICAL DISPUTES IN JANAÚBA/MG, DURING THE PERIOD OF THE MILITARY DICTATORSHIP, AT THE TIME WHEN BIPARTISANSHIP AND THE REMNANTS OF A TRADITIONAL POLICY WERE IN FORCE, SUCH AS LOCAL MANDONISM, SOCIAL NETWORKS, CLIENTELISM AND ASSISTANCE IN THE DISPUTES BETWEEN TIMBO AND PHARISEES. THE 1960S AND 1980S WERE ESTABLISHED AS A TIME FRAME, AS THIS WAS THE PERIOD IN WHICH DISPUTES BETWEEN THESE GROUPS BECAME MORE PREVALENT AND MORE INTENSE. IN ORDER TO DISCUSS THE POWER RELATIONS BETWEEN THESE GROUPS, THIS HISTORICAL STUDY WAS GUIDED, ABOVE ALL, BY THE AUTHORS OF THE NEW POLITICAL HISTORY. BASED ON THE ORAL HISTORY METHODOLOGY, WE CONDUCTED THE STUDY AND DISCUSSION ABOUT THE INFORMATION OBTAINED THROUGH SEMI-STRUCTURED INTERVIEWS WITH CITY DWELLERS WHO WERE IN CONTACT WITH POLITICS IN THE CUT-OUT PERIOD. WE ALSO HAVE, WITH OTHER COMPLEMENTARY SOURCES, SUCH AS THE NEWSPAPER “O GORUTUBA”, ARCHIVES OF THE CITY COUNCIL AND WORKS BY MEMORIALISTS FROM THE REGION. WE HYPOTHESIZE THAT THESE GROUPS, DESPITE BEING RIVALS, HAD THE SAME INTERESTS THAT CONSISTED OF PRESERVING THEIR HOLD ON POWER. AND, FOR THAT, IT SEEMS TO US THAT THESE POLITICAL AGENTS ADOPT MANDONIST AND CLIENTELISTIC PRACTICES, IN ORDER TO ALLOW US TO THINK ABOUT THEIR RUPTURES OR PERMANENCES IN THE CUT-OFF PERIOD.

nm_producao: “UNA PATRIA, UN ESTADO, UN CAUDILLO”: A CONSTRUÇÃO DA NARRATIVA HISTÓRICA FRANQUISTA DURANTE A GUERRA CIVIL ESPANHOLA (1936-1939)
ds_abstract: LA VIOLENCIA PERPETUADA EN LA ESPAÑA DURANTE LA GUERRA CIVIL ESPAÑOLA (1936- 1939), Y LA TRAGEDIA QUE EL CONFLICTO SIGNIFICÓ PARA LA HISTORIA DEL PAÍS PUEDE SER EJEMPLIFICADA CON EL SIGUIENTE DATO CUANTITATIVO: LA ESPAÑA ESTÁ EN SEGUNDO LUGAR EN EL RANKING MUNDIAL DE PERSONAS DESAPARECIDAS, ENTERRADAS EN FOSAS COMUNES CON HUESOS NO IDENTIFICADOS. BUSCANDO COMPRENDER COMO TANTA VIOLENCIA FUE JUSTIFICADA POR PARTE DEL BANDO NACIONAL, INFLUYENDO POSTERIORMENTE EN LA LEGISLACIÓN NACIONAL, EL PRESENTE TRABAJO TIENE COMO OBJETIVO, UTILIZANDO COMO FUENTE EL PERIÓDICO DE DERECHA LA FALANGE, ANALIZAR LA CONSTRUCCIÓN DE UNA NARRATIVA HISTÓRICA LEGITIMADORA DE LA GUERRA Y DEL RÉGIMEN QUE ANHELABAN CONSTRUIR, QUE POSTERIORMENTE SERÍA BASE DE LA LEGISLACIÓN EDUCACIONAL. PARA ESO, UTILIZAMOS LOS CONCEPTOS DE FASCISMO (SILVA, 2000), CULTURA HISTÓRICA (RÜSEN, 2009), NARRATIVA HISTÓRICA (RÜSEN, 2011) Y CULTURA NACIONAL (HALL, 2006), EXAMINANDO COMO LA HISTORIA ESPAÑOLA FUE COOPTADA Y LOS SENTIDOS ATRIBUIDOS A ELLA, EN LA BUSCA DE LA DERECHA POR CREAR UN DISCURSO NACIONALISTA QUE LOGRASE LEALTAD Y IDENTIFICACIÓN, POR PARTE DE LA SOCIEDAD, A SU CAUSA. LA NARRATIVA HISTÓRICA DE LA DERECHA BUSCABA UNIR UNA NACIÓN FRACCIONADA, SIENDO EL CIMIENTO QUE DARÍA PARA ESPAÑA UNA IDENTIDAD ESTABILIZADORA, EN MEDIO A UN PROCESO DE MODERNIZACIÓN, PROFUNDIZADO EN EL PERÍODO DEMOCRÁTICO, QUE TRANSFORMABA LA SOCIEDAD TRADICIONAL Y AMENAZABA SUS PRIVILEGIOS. POR FIN, OBJETIVAMOS, POR MEDIO DE LA PRIMERA LEY DE CONTENIDO EDUCACIONAL DEL FRANQUISMO Y BASE PARA LA LEGISLACIÓN POSTERIOR, LA LEY DE REFORMA DE LA ENSEÑANZA MEDIA DE 1938, ANALIZAR COMO LA DERECHA INTENCIONABA UTILIZAR LA EDUCACIÓN EN LA ESTRUCTURACIÓN DE UNA SOCIEDAD ADEPTA A SU IDEOLOGÍA, USANDO SU CULTURA NACIONAL COMO ORIENTACIÓN DE LA ENSEÑANZA BAJO EL RÉGIMEN.

nm_producao: ASSISTENCIALISMO, POBREZA E CONFRONTOS: A SOCIEDADE SÃO VICENTE DE PAULO EM CATALÃO -GO (1914-1960).
ds_abstract: THE CURRENT RESEARCH ANALYZED THE ASSISTANCE POVERTY PROJECT IMPLEMENTED IN THE CITY OF CATALÃO-GO., BY THE SÃO VICENTE DE PAULO SOCIETY. WE ANALYZED THE CONTRADICTIONS AND CONFRONTATIONS GENERATED IN THIS PROCESS, CONSIDERING THAT THE POOR AND POVERTY DEFY THE URBAN ORDER THAT THE ELITE WANTED TO IMPLEMENT. IN THE SOURCES WE WERE ATTENTIVE TO HOW THE EXPERIENCES AND WAYS OF LIFE OF THE POOR CHALLENGE THE (DIS)ORGANIZATION OF THE CITY. SOME QUESTIONS GUIDED US TO COMPOSE THE WORK AND BECAME COMPLEMENTARY OBJECTIVES OF INVESTIGATION: UNDER WHAT CIRCUMSTANCES THIS ASSISTANCE TO POVERTY TOOK PLACE; WHAT INTERESTS WERE AT STAKE; WHERE THE RESOURCES THAT FINANCED THE WORKS OF CHARITY CAME FROM; WHO THE MEMBERS OF THE SÃO VICENTE DE PAULO SOCIETY REALLY WERE, AND WHICH HISTORICAL SUBJECTS WERE INVOLVED IN THE CONFRONTATIONS WITH THE VINCENTIANS. AS FOR THE TIME FRAME, IT GOES FROM 1914, THE DATE OF THE FOUNDATION OF THE SÃO VICENTE DE PAULO SOCIETY, UNTIL 1960, A PERIOD IN WHICH THERE IS A CHANGE IN THE WORK WITH THE POOR: THERE IS NO MENTION OF THE HOSPITAL, NOW WORKING AS AN ASYLUM OR PRISON TO THOSE ASSISTED. THE METHODOLOGY PRESENTED HERE AIMS TO EXPLORE NEW PERSPECTIVES OF ANALYSIS AND PROBLEMATIZATION OF THE PAST, PROVIDED BY LITTLE EXPLORED SOURCES, SUCH AS, IN OUR CASE, THE MINUTES BOOK OF THE CONFERENCES OF THE SOCIETY SÃO VICENTE DE PAULO. THESE RECORDS, LEFT BY MEMBERS OF AN ASSOCIATION FORMED BY THE ELITE, MAKE IT POSSIBLE TO READ THE DAILY LIFE OF COMMON PEOPLE AND THE SOCIO-POLITICAL CONTEXT IN WHICH THEY WERE INSERTED. WE ALSO ANALYZED ACADEMIC PUBLICATIONS REFERRING TO VINCENTIANS AND THEIR CHARITABLE ACTIONS; ARCHIVAL SOURCES FOUND AT THE MUNICIPAL HISTORY MUSEUM CORNÉLIO RAMOS, LOCATED IN THE OLD CATALÃO RAILWAY STATION; MEMORIALIST BOOKS; PRIVATE ARCHIVES OF MEMBERS OF THE LOCAL ELITE OF VINCENTIANS, AMONG OTHERS. THROUGHOUT THE DELIMITED TIME (1914-1960), THERE WERE SEVERAL REPORTS DEMONSTRATING A TYPE OF BEHAVIOR ADOPTED BY VINCENTIANS IN ASSISTANCE WORK WITH THE NEEDIEST. THE WRITINGS DEMONSTRATED NOT ONLY THE CHARITABLE ATTITUDE, BUT ALSO A PROJECT FOR THE POOR, DEVELOPED OVER THE YEARS WITH THE AIM TO MONITOR, CONTROL AND SUPPRESS THE PRESENCE OF THE POOR ON THE STREETS OF THE CITY. THE COMPLEX AND INTRICATE SOCIAL RELATIONS, THE GAMES OF POWER, THE STRUGGLES AND SILENCES DEMAND DEEPENING AND AVAILABILITY OF TIME TO REACH THE SOURCES; INTERPRETING AND QUESTIONING THE READINGS OF THE NARRATIVES ALREADY PRODUCED ABOUT HISTORICAL SUBJECTS, ONCE QUESTIONS ARE ALWAYS RAISED AND RERAISED, SO THAT NEW READINGS OF REALITY CAN BE MADE. WE REFER TO AUTHORS LIKE THOMPSON AND FOUCAULT, IDENTIFYING THE POSSIBILITIES OF EXPLORING THE EXPERIENCES OF THE POOR AND THE FIELD OF MORAL DISPUTES IN THE CITY.

nm_producao: AS REPRESENTAÇÕES DA DANÇA DO VENTRE NA CULTURA DA MÍDIA BRASILEIRA (1990 – 2002)
ds_abstract: CANONICAL AND STEREOTYPED IMAGES ABOUT THE ENTIRE EAST AND, ESPECIALLY, ABOUT BELLY DANCE, STILL TODAY REMAIN STRENGTHENED IN THE COLLECTIVE IMAGINATION OF OUR SOCIETY. THIS IS MAINLY DUE TO THE PERFORMANCE OF THE MAINSTREAM MEDIA, WHICH HAS FREQUENTLY RESORTED TO A LIMITED SET OF REDUCTIONIST ICONS, WHICH DEAL WITH THE ORIENTAL WORLD AND WHICH HAVE THEIR ORIGINS IN THE ORIENTALIST DISCOURSES THAT WERE SYSTEMATIZED AT THE END OF THE 18TH CENTURY, IN THE DURING THE 19TH CENTURY AND THE BEGINNING OF THE 20TH CENTURY. THUS, THE OBJECT OF INVESTIGATION OF THIS WORK IS THE REPRESENTATIONS OF BELLY DANCE THAT WERE PRODUCED AND BROADCAST BY THE GREAT BRAZILIAN MEDIA IN THE CONTEXT OF THE YEARS 1990 TO 2002. STARTING FROM THE FIELD OF THE HISTORY OF THE PRESENT TIME, WE CONSIDER THE FACT THAT EVERY DAY WE ARE SURROUNDED BY ICONS AND SOUNDS THAT INFLUENCE OUR CONDUCT, FORMATION OF SOCIAL IDENTITY AND WORLDVIEWS. THEREFORE, THE ANALYSIS OF OUR MEDIA SOURCES AIMS TO UNVEIL A FACE OF THE PROCESS OF RECREATING THESE REPRESENTATIONS IN OUR SOCIAL ENVIRONMENT IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND TO WHAT EXTENT THE COLONIZING GAZE HAS BEEN UPDATED WITHIN OUR HISTORICAL PROCESS AND, FROM THIS, TO EVALUATE HOW IT HAS REINVIGORATED THE CURRENT RELATIONS OF FORCE AND POWER THAT RESULT IN THE PERMANENCE OF OLD PREJUDICES THAT STRONGLY HURT THE HISTORICAL AGENTS INVOLVED IN THIS ISSUE.

nm_producao: “NÃO DEIXE QUE OS BASTARDOS TE REDUZAM ÀS CINZAS”: REPRESENTAÇÕES DE GÊNERO E RESISTÊNCIAS FEMININAS EM THE HANDMAID’S TALE
ds_abstract: IN THIS RESEARCH, WE AIM TO ANALYZE THE FIRST AND SECOND SEASONS OF THE HANDMAID'S TALE SERIES (O CONTO DA AIA, IN PORTUGUESE) – BASED ON THE HOMONYMOUS BOOK BY CANADIAN MARGARET ATWOOD –, SHOWN BY THE STREAMING NETWORK HULU. WHILE DYSTOPIA, THE WORK BUILDS WARNINGS FOR THE DANGER OF A CHAOTIC FUTURE, ESPECIALLY WITH REGARD TO SETBACKS IN THE ACHIEVEMENTS OF WOMEN. BASED ON THIS ASSUMPTION, WE ANALYZED THE GENDER REPRESENTATIONS ATTRIBUTED TO WOMEN, THROUGH SYMBOLS AND DISCOURSES USED IN THE SERIE, WHICH WAS ALSO OBSERVED IN FAR-RIGHT GOVERNMENTS THROUGHOUT HISTORY, ESPECIALLY IN THE 20TH CENTURY. FROM THE EMERGENCE OF NEOLIBERALISM, SUCH REPRESENTATIONS WERE ENDORSED AGAIN, A CONTEXT IN WHICH THE AUTHOR WROTE THE BOOK AND WHICH EXERTED INFLUENCE ON HER WORK, ALSO REFLECTED IN THE SERIES. WE ALSO IDENTIFIED THE RESISTANCE TACTICS AGAINST THE GILEAD REGIME – THE AUTHORITARIAN AND PATRIARCHAL GOVERNMENT THAT TOOK POWER IN THE UNITED STATES IN THE HANDMAID'S TALE –, TACTICS THAT, WHEN APPROACHED BY THE SERIE, INFLUENCED SEVERAL FEMINIST AND RESISTANCE MOVEMENTS AROUND THE WORLD IN RECENT YEARS. AS A METHODOLOGY, WE ADOPTED THE SEMIOTIC ANALYSIS AND THE PRODUCTION OF MEANING, AS WELL AS A BIBLIOGRAPHICAL REVIEW ON FEMINIST EPISTEMOLOGIES, NAZI-FASCISM, NEOLIBERALISM AND RESISTANCE TACTICS, ALLOWING US TO DELVE DEEPER INTO THE MOTION-PICTURE AND DISCURSIVE ELEMENTS OF THE SERIES.

nm_producao: A EDUCAÇÃO FÍSICA E A FORMAÇÃO DE PROFESSORES: PLURALIDADES, PROJETOS PEDAGÓGICOS, SOCIEDADE BRASILEIRA E INTERVENÇÃO FORMATIVA DEMOCRÁTICA
ds_abstract: IN VIEW OF THE BRAZILIAN POPULATION DIVERSITY, IT IS BECOMING INCREASINGLY URGENT TO CARRY OUT STUDIES AND PEDAGOGICAL PRACTICES RELATED TO SOCIAL PLURALITY AND, CONSEQUENTLY, THE UNDERSTANDING OF BRAZILIAN SOCIETY. PHYSICAL EDUCATION AND THE PROBLEM OF THE DIFFICULTIES OF TEACHER TRAINING PROCESSES, GIVEN THE BRAZILIAN MULTIPLICITY, COME UP AGAINST THE ATTEMPT TO PROPOSE SCHOOL CLASSES / INTERVENTIONS THAT RESPECT AND OBSERVE SCHOOL AUDIENCES. IN THIS COMBINATION OF ELEMENTS, WE SEEK TO DEBATE THE POSSIBILITIES AND DIFFICULTIES IN TEACHER TRAINING ON AFRO-BRAZILIAN AND INDIGENOUS HISTORY IN THE FACE OF THE DEMANDS OF LAW 10.639 / 03 AS WELL AS 11.645 / 08 THAT REGULATE THE MANDATORY THEME “AFRO-BRAZILIAN HISTORY AND CULTURE BRAZILIAN AND INDIGENOUS ”IN BASIC EDUCATION AND TO UNDERSTAND ELEMENTS OF THIS COMPLEX RELATIONAL DYNAMIC. WE PRESENT A STUDY THAT INVESTIGATED SEVERAL PEDAGOGICAL PROJECTS OF PHYSICAL EDUCATION COURSES IN THEIR TEXTUAL / FORMAL DISCOURSE, WITH PHYSICAL EDUCATION COURSES FROM THE FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF GOIÁS- REGIONAL CATALÃO (RC / UFG) THE STARTING POINT. IN ADDITION TO OBSERVING THE ADEQUACY TO THE LEGISLATION, WE TRIED TO PROBLEMATIZE THE PROCESS OF TRAINING PHYSICAL EDUCATION TEACHERS AT NATIONAL LEVEL, LOOKING FOR THE WAY IN WHICH CULTURAL DIVERSITY, THE PRESENCE OF DIFFERENT GROUPS OF BRAZILIANS WERE THOUGHT / NOT IN THE TRAINING PROCESS OF THE PHYSICAL EDUCATION TEACHER. AND FINALLY, WE REPORT A PEDAGOGICAL EXPERIENCE WITH MACULELÊ THAT SHOWS US IN THE PRACTICAL FIELD HOW THE ARTICULATION OF ETHNIC-RACIAL ISSUES, TRAINING IN THE AREA AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION CLASSES AT SCHOOL WORKS.

nm_producao: EDUCAÇÃO DAS RELAÇÕES ÉTNICO-RACIAIS: FUNDAMENTOS E PRÁTICAS
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT RESEARCH WORK IS ABOUT A STUDY AND PRODUCTION OF AN EDUCATIONAL PRODUCT LINKED TO RESEARCH LINE 2 - HISTORY, SOCIETY AND EDUCATIONAL PRACTICES OF THE FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF GOIÁS/UFCAT (IN TRANSITION) TO ASSIST AND GUIDE THE TEACHERS OF THE INITIAL GRADES OF ELEMENTARY SCHOOL IN ACTIVITIES WITH THE CONTENTS OF ETHNIC-RACIAL RELATIONS. THE OBJECTIVE IS TO PROVIDE AN INCORPORATION OF DIFFERENT KNOWLEDGE IN THE CLASSROOM, VALUING THE MULTIPLE, OR PLURAL, CONTRIBUTING TO THE DENATURALIZATION OF RACIST PRACTICES IN THE SCHOOL ENVIRONMENT. ACCORDING TO STUDIES ON THE SUBJECT, IT IS CLEAR THAT NINETEENTH CENTURY RACIST AND EUGENIC THEORIES MADE THE DEBATE AND PROBLEMATIZATION OF THIS SUBJECT UNFEASIBLE AND ADVOCATED THE DISCOURSE OF RACIAL DEMOCRACY, WHICH HAD ALREADY CIRCULATED ON BRAZILIAN SOIL, SINCE THE FIRST YEARS OF ENSLAVEMENT IN BRAZIL. THE THEORETICAL-METHODOLOGICAL FRAMEWORK MOBILIZED FOR THE PRODUCTION OF THE EDUCATIONAL PRODUCT FOCUSES ON THE CONTRIBUTIONS OF DECOLONIAL THINKING IN THE DEBATE ON RACE, COLONIALITY OF POWER, BEING, GENDER AND SABER, IN ADDITION TO THE MODERNITY CATEGORY. THE CONTRIBUTION OF DECOLONIAL THINKING IS FUNDAMENTAL FOR THE RUPTURE OF HEGEMONIC, BINARY AND LINEAR THOUGHTS. THE MATERIAL IS ORGANIZED INTO SEVEN LEARNING MODULES THAT, DESPITE BEING ARTICULATED AMONG THEMSELVES, CAN BE WORKED INDEPENDENTLY, ACCORDING TO THE GRADE AND AS A NEED IN THE CLASSROOM. THE MODULES ARE ORGANIZED INTO 36 CLASS-WORKSHOPS, WITH STEP-BY-STEP DESCRIPTIONS WITH AN INITIAL CONVERSATION DIRECTED TO THE TEACHERS ABOUT THE IMPORTANT CONCEPTS TO BE DISCUSSED, IN ADDITION TO GUIDELINES, TIPS AND SUGGESTIONS FOR ACTIVITIES. THESE WORKSHOPS LIMIT CONTENT, CLASS DURATION, THEMATIC UNIT, KNOWLEDGE OBJECTIVE, SKILLS (SURVEY CARRIED OUT ACCORDING TO THE COMMON NATIONAL CURRICULUM BASE - BNCC), ANALYSIS CATEGORY, METHODOLOGY, PRODUCT, RESOURCES, EVALUATION, AND IN SOME INCREASED WORKSHOPS ADDED HIGHLIGHTS , TRIVIA, LEGAL INFORMATION AND SUGGESTIONS FOR READINGS, LITERATURE, MUSIC AND MOVIES. THE EDUCATIONAL PRODUCT PASSED THROUGH THE SCRUTINY OF THE EVALUATION OF TRIPLE TEACHERS FROM THE INITIAL GRADES FOR QUALITY AND APPLICABILITY ANALYSIS. AND GIVEN THE CONCERN OF THE EVALUATORS, THE INITIAL TARGET AUDIENCE ESTABLISHED WAS CHANGED. OVERALL, THE WAS POSITIVE, REINFORCING THE NEED FOR EDUCATIONAL MATERIAL FOCUSED ON THE THEME.

nm_producao: ENSINO DE HISTÓRIA E DIREITO À INCLUSÃO: UMA PROPOSTA ANALÍTICA A PARTIR DA LITERATURA DE CORDEL
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH, WITH A TRANSDISCIPLINARY APPROACH, AIMS TO DISCUSS THE NEED TO THINK ABOUT MATERIALS AND METHODS FOR THE INCLUSION PUBLIC, ESPECIALLY FOR THE DISABLED. IT WAS WITH THIS IN MIND, THAT THIS WORK WAS DIVIDED INTO THREE DISTINCT CHAPTERS, EACH ONE DEVELOPS DISCUSSIONS IN DIFFERENT AREAS, BUT WHICH WERE NECESSARY TO REACH OUR PURPOSE. THE FIRST, BASED ON AUTHORS SUCH AS PANTANO (2009), BROGNA (2009), BAMPI, GUILHEM AND ALVES (2010), AMONG OTHERS, SPOKE ABOUT THE EMERGENCE OF THE SOCIAL PERSPECTIVE OF THE DISABLED, CARRIED OUT THROUGH THE HISTORICAL AND SOCIAL ANALYSIS OF MEDICAL MODELS AND THAT DETERMINED THE PERCEPTIONS AND LEGITIMACY OF DISABILITY PARADIGMS AND MODELS. THE SECOND CHAPTER ANALYZES THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS, UNDERSTOOD AS A RESULT OF DISCUSSIONS ABOUT THE PARADIGMS, THAT WE CAN UNDERSTAND HOW THE STATE AND SOCIETY TREAT, BUILD AND APPLY, TODAY, THE RIGHTS OF THE DISABLED AS A GROUP BELONGING TO THE INCLUSION CATEGORY. IT IS ALSO IN THIS CHAPTER THAT WE DEAL, AS AN EXAMPLE, WITH CULTURAL HISTORY AS A FRUITFUL THEORY THAT MAKES IT POSSIBLE TO THINK OF CONTEXTUAL DIDACTIC MATERIAL ABOUT COMPONENTS AND CURRICULAR CONTENTS OF HISTORY TEACHING FOR THE NUMEROUS GROUPS, BASED ON TEXTS BY TORRES (2014) .FINALLY, IN THE LAST CHAPTER, ALSO AS AN ILLUSTRATION OF OUR OBJECTIVE, WE MAKE USE OF CORDEL AS A RICH HISTORICAL MATERIAL, WHICH ALLOWS THE DEVELOPMENT OF A CRITICAL SOCIAL SENSE FOR CITIZENSHIP OF ANY DIVERSITY GROUP, ESPECIALLY THAT OF THE DISABLED, WITH THE SUPPORT OF DISCUSSIONS OF LUYTEN (1992), SOUZA (2006), AMONG OTHERS. ALL OF THESE RESULTS WERE OBTAINED THROUGH A QUALITATIVE BIBLIOGRAPHIC SEARCH, WHICH WAS BASED ON TEXTS – ARTICLES, MONOGRAPHS, THESES, BOOKS, AMONG OTHERS – TO ANSWER OUR HYPOTHESES AND REACH OUR GOAL, THROUGH THE ASSOCIATION OF THE THREE FIELDS – BROKEN DOWN INTO THREE CHAPTERS – BUT ALL WITH THE PURPOSE OF DEMONSTRATING THE POTENTIAL OF RESEARCH METHODOLOGIES AND PRACTICES THAT DEAL WITH THE RIGHTS OF INCLUSION AND MAKE US THINK OF THE CONTINUOUS NEED TO DISCUSS MATERIALS AND METHODS AIMED AT GUARANTEEING THE PARTICIPATORY INSERTION OF ANY DIVERSITY IN SOCIETY IN GENERAL

nm_producao: DO CURRAL AO LATICÍNIO: A MEMÓRIA DOS LEITEIROS EM GOIANDIRA 1954 - 1990
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT DISSERTATION, AIMS, THINKS ABOUT SEVERAL MEANINGS OF MEMORIES SOCIALLY CONSTRUCT BY WORKERS WHO TRANSPORT MILK IN NATURA (MILKMEN) IN GOIANDIRA –GO. THESE ARE UNDERSTANDING LIKE SUBJECTS (OWNERS OF TRUCKS OR CARTS, OR THEIR EMPLOYEES), THAT WENT THROUGH FARMS DELIVERING MILK TO THE DAIRIES. THIS WORK CONSISTS OF RECOVER THE EXPERIENCE, OF A GROUP OF WORKERS, WHO TRANSPORT MILK (MILKMEN), FROM THEIR TESTIMONY, RECOVERING THE MEMORY SOCIALLY CONSTRUCTED BY THESE SUBJECTS, ANALYZING THE SOCIAL AND HISTORICAL DIVERSITY, PROBLEMATIZING THE POLITICAL AND SOCIAL MEANING ASSIGNED TO THESE RECORDS, THINKING ABOUT SEVERAL PERSONAL POSITIONS SHOWN IN THE VERSIONS OF THESE SUBJECTS. THE METHODOLOGY USED CONSISTED, INITIALLY, IN COORDINATE THE COLLECTION AND THE ORGANIZATION OF HISTORICAL SOURCES WRITTEN OR ORAL. IN THE CASE OF WRITTEN SOURCES, FIRST WE TRIED TO IDENTIFY AND CATALOG EACH DOCUMENT, AND THEN ANALYZE IT. ABOUT ORAL SOURCES, THEY WERE PRODUCED FROM SEMI-STRUCTURE INTERVIEWS, ELABORATED FROM AN APPLICATION OF A COMPREHENSIVE QUESTIONNAIRE, LATER THEY WERE TRANSCRIBED. AT THE END, WE DEVELOPED AS A RESULT OF THE WORK, THE DISSERTATION, THAT WILL CAN BE USED LIKE AN INSTRUMENT FOR TEACHING AND SEARCHING IN HISTORY, RESCUING WHAT HAS LIVED, GIVING MEANING TO HISTORICAL EXPERIENCES LOST IN TIME.
nm_discente: ERICK MARCUS DOS REIS E CRUZ

nm_producao: AJUDA MÚTUA FAMILIAR? A ATUAÇÃO DO PODER JUDICIÁRIO FRENTE ÀS RECLAMAÇÕES TRABALHISTAS DAS TRABALHADORAS RURAIS DO OESTE GOIANO.
ds_abstract: THE RESEARCH PRESENTED HERE AIMS TO ANALYZE THE SPACE OCCUPIED BY WOMEN IN CAPITALIST SOCIETY BASED ON LABOR RELATIONS IN THE COUNTRYSIDE. FOR THIS, WE INVESTIGATE THE LABOR PRACTICES OF WOMEN WHO LIVE WITH THEIR FAMILIES ON THE CONTRACTOR'S PROPERTY, WHERE ONLY THE EMPLOYMENT RELATIONSHIP OF THEIR SPOUSE OR PARTNER, CALLED "CARETAKERS," IS REGULARIZED. THE IMPORTANCE OF THIS RESEARCH STEMS FROM THE INFORMALITY AND THE DEVALUATION OF THE WORK OF PEASANT WOMEN. IN THIS WAY, WE ANALYZED THE ACTIONS OF THE JUDICIARY REGARDING THE LAWSUITS FILED BY RURAL WOMEN WORKERS IN THE WEST OF GOIÁS, FROM 2014 TO 2018, WHERE WE SELECTED TWO LABOR COMPLAINTS, WHICH WERE ANALYZED IN THEIR ENTIRETY TO DEMONSTRATE THE POSITION OF THE STATE JUDGE AND THE GOIÁS COURT ON THIS ISSUE. THE MAIN IMPACTS OF THE LEGISLATIVE CHANGES IN THE SPHERE OF LABOR AND SOCIAL SECURITY WERE ANALYZED, THUS, WE SEE THAT NOT RECOGNIZING THE EMPLOYMENT RELATIONSHIP OF RURAL WOMEN WHEN THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE LAW ARE MET, LEADS TO SERIOUS LABOR AND SOCIAL SECURITY LOSSES, WHICH CONTRIBUTES TO THE PRECARIOUSNESS OF WOMEN'S AND FAMILIES' WORK THROUGH CAPITALIST ACCUMULATION IN THE COUNTRYSIDE. THE DEDUCTIVE METHOD WAS USED, THROUGH DENSE RESEARCH ON THE THEME, SUPPORTED BY BIBLIOGRAPHIES, JUDICIAL PROCESSES, AS WELL AS THE LEGISLATION IN FORCE.

nm_producao: “LATAS D’ÁGUA NA CABEÇA, LÁ VAI MARIA”: A IMPLANTAÇÃO DO SISTEMA DE ABASTECIMENTO DE ÁGUA EM SÃO FRANCISCO-MG (1960-1990)
ds_abstract: THIS DISSERTATION IS A HISTORIOGRAPHICAL WORK THAT SOUGHT TO INVESTIGATE THE IMPLEMENTATION OF WATER SUPPLY IN SÃO FRANCISCO - MG, AND HOW THE CITY NEAR OF THE SÃO FRANCISCO RIVER EXPERIENCED THE DRAMA OF LACK OF WATER IN THE PERIOD FROM THE 1960S TO THE 1990S. IN THIS CONTEXT, THE MULTIPLICITIES OF THE DAILY EXPERIENCES OF THE RESIDENTS OF THAT CITY WERE EMPHASIZED HERE, CAUSED BY THE INNOVATION REPRESENTED BY THE STRUCTURING OF THE PIPED WATER SUPPLY SYSTEM. OUR MAIN OBJECTIVE WAS TO UNDERSTAND THE MEMORY BUILT AROUND THE PROCESS OF INSTALLING PIPED WATER IN SAN FRANCISCO. FROM THIS, WE UNFOLD THIS OBJECTIVE IN: UNDERSTANDING SAN FRANCISCO IN THE HISTORIOGRAPHICAL DEBATE ABOUT THE CITY; IDENTIFY THE CONSTRUCTION OF A MEMORY OF DEVELOPMENT AND PROGRESS THROUGH THE LOCAL PRESS; ANALYZE THE EXPERIENCES OF THE LACK OF WATER (1960-1990), LIVED BY THE RIVERSIDE POPULATION; REFLECT ON THE RECORDS MADE BY ORALITY, BY THE PRESS, THROUGH THE SF, O JORNAL DE SÃO FRANCISCO, INSTITUTIONAL DOCUMENTS, PHOTOGRAPHS OF THE PAGE “MEMÓRIAS DE SÃO FRANCISCO” AND MEMORIALISTS TO QUESTION THE CONCEPT OF CITY AND DEVELOPMENT THAT PERMEATES THESE SOURCES. FOR THIS PURPOSE, WE ALSO SOUGHT TO UNDERSTAND THE POPULATION'S RESPONSE TO THESE PROCESSES, AND HOW THE INSTALLATION OF WATER SUPPLY WAS RELATED TO THE TERM “PROGRESS” ON THE PAGES OF NEWSPAPERS. WE BELIEVE THAT THE MAIN RELEVANCE OF THIS WORK WAS TO UNDERSTAND THE CHANGES IN THE DAILY LIFE OF THE CITY OF SÃO FRANCISCO, DUE TO THE STRUCTURING OF THE WATER SUPPLY SYSTEM, BASED ON THE EXPERIENCES OF RIVERSIDE DWELLERS WHO LIVED THROUGH THIS PERIOD. THIS MOVEMENT ALLOWS THE REGIONAL HISTORY TO BE PRESERVED, THROUGH THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE THERE, AND ALLOWS THE READER TO KNOW, EXPERIENCE AND WALK THROUGH THE EXPERIENCES OF COMMON SUBJECTS WHO ARE THE MAIN AGENTS AND PROTAGONISTS OF THIS HISTORY.

nm_producao: QUANDO OS MEMES ABALARAM O BRASIL: UMA LEITURA CULTURAL DOS MEMES DE OPOSIÇÃO A DILMA ROUSSEFF (2013-2016)
ds_abstract: AS OF 2013, MEMES STOOD OUT AS DECISIVE CARRIERS IN THE DEMONSTRATIONS AGAINST THE DILMA ROUSSEFF GOVERNMENT AND THEN, THEY BECAME FUNDAMENTAL IN THE DELEGITIMATION OF THE DEMOCRATICALLY ELECTED PRESIDENT BY THE BRAZILIAN POPULATION. IN THIS SENSE, MEMES ARE BECOMING, INCREASINGLY, GREAT TOOLS FOR STUDIES IN THE FIELD OF HISTORIOGRAPHY. THEREFORE, THIS RESEARCH AIMED TO CARRY OUT A HISTORICAL REFLECTION AROUND THE IMAGINARY CONSTRUCTION OF DILMA VANA ROUSSEFF'S OPPOSITION THROUGH MEMES, GOING THROUGH THE YEARS 2013 TO 2016. WE DO NOT MEAN THAT ANTI-DILMA MEMES DID NOT EXIST BEFORE, BUT IT WAS ONLY THE SINCE 2013 THEY HAVE GAINED GREAT REPERCUSSIONS IN THE MEDIA AND HAVE BECOME DECISIVE AGENTS IN THE IMPEACHMENT OF THE EX-PRESIDENT. TO THIS END, IN THIS STUDY, WE SOUGHT TO UNDERSTAND HOW MEMES FUNCTIONED AS AN INTERNET LANGUAGE, AS WELL AS THEIR USE IN CONTEMPORARY POLITICS, AIMING TO PAY ATTENTION TO THEIR USE AS A MOBILIZATION TOOL DURING THE POLARIZATION PROCESS OF BRAZILIAN SOCIETY AMONG THE DEMONSTRATIONS THEY OCCUPIED ON THE STREETS IN 2013, GOING THROUGH THE 2014 ELECTORAL CAMPAIGN AND CULMINATING WITH THE IMPEACHMENT OF PRESIDENT DILMA IN 2016. AS A METHODOLOGY, WE CARRIED OUT A BIBLIOGRAPHIC REVIEW ON THE THEME WITH AUTHORS SUCH AS JESSÉ DE SOUZA (2016), RICHARD DAWKINS (2017) AND MANUEL CASTELLS (1999) AMONG OTHERS WHO WERE INSTRUMENTAL IN DIALOGUE AND RESEARCH. IT IS WORTH REMEMBERING THAT FOR THE ANALYSIS OF MEMES, THE THEORY PROPOSED BY ERWIN PANOFSKY (1991) WAS USED, WHICH ALLOWED US TO DECIPHER THE MEME THROUGH THREE ASPECTS: THE DESCRIPTION OF THE ELEMENTS CONTAINED IN THE MEMES, DISCUSS AND INTERPRET. FURTHERMORE, IT IS BELIEVED THAT WITH THE MEMES ADDRESSED AND DECIPHERED HERE, IT WAS POSSIBLE TO ACHIEVE OUR MAIN OBJECTIVE IN SHOWING HOW THE GROUPS OF THE NEW RIGHT, ESPECIALLY THE MOVIMENTO BRASIL LIVRE (MBL), MADE USE OF MEMES AS THE MAIN VEHICLE OF FALSE DISSEMINATION. AGAINST THE GOVERNMENT AND BUILDING, IN TURN, A NEGATIVE VIEW OF DILMA ROUSSEFF.

nm_producao: “CRIMES PASSIONAIS” OU FEMINICÍDIOS? A ESPETACULARIZAÇÃO ROMANTIZADA DA VIOLÊNCIA DE GÊNERO NOS ASSASSINATOS DE ELOÁ CRISTINA E MÉRCIA NAKASHIMA NA MÍDIA TELEVISIVA
ds_abstract: THIS WORK ANALYZES HOW THE BRAZILIAN TELEVISION PROGRAMMING INSTRUMENTALIZES THE MEDIATIZATION OF GENDER VIOLENCE THROUGH THE CASES OF ELOÁ PIMENTEL AND MÉRCIA NAKASHIMA, TRANSMITTED BY THE PROGRAMS A TARDE É SUA, BRASIL URGENTE, HOJE EM DIA AND JORNAL NACIONAL. THE ANALYSIS AIMS TO UNDERSTAND HOW THE PROCESS OF EXPLORING GENDER REPRESENTATIONS AND STEREOTYPES TRANSFORMS PASSIONAL PHENOMENON INTO A MEDIA AND ROMANTICIZED SPECTACLE THAT REPRODUCES HISTORICALLY CONSTRUCTED GENDER INEQUALITIES IN SOCIAL IMAGINARY. THUS, AS A CULTURAL PRODUCT CAPABLE OF DEVELOPING MEANINGS AND GIVING SIGNIFICANCE TO SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS, THE RESEARCH PROBLEM ENCOMPASSES THE REACH OF TV IN THE DISSEMINATION AND RATIFICATION OF CERTAIN GENDER REPRESENTATIONS THROUGH THE LEGAL NOTION OF PASSIONATE CRIME IN CASES OF MURDERS OF WOMEN. WITH THIS, THE STUDY PROBLEMATIZES THE MEDIA DISCOURSE, HIGHLIGHTING THE DISQUALIFICATION OF THE “PASSIONATE CRIME” AND ATTRIBUTES THE CRIME OF FEMINICIDE TO THE CASES ANALYZED. THE ANALYZED DOCUMENTATION BRINGS AS THEORETICAL AND METHODOLOGICAL PERSPECTIVE THE BASES OF THE NEW CULTURAL HISTORY AND THE HISTORY OF THE PRESENT TIME, FOCUSING ON THE RELATIONSHIP OF HISTORY WITH OTHER AREAS OF KNOWLEDGE THROUGH THE THEORY OF SOCIAL REPRESENTATIONS AND ASPECTS OF SOCIAL COMMUNICATION AND LAW. IN THIS SENSE, IT RESULTS IN AN ANALYSIS OF HOW THE MEDIATIZATION OF GENDER VIOLENCE REACHES SYMBOLIC ASPECTS OF THE FIGHT AGAINST CRIME, BY DEMONSTRATING HOW THE REPORTS MADE FOR THE CASES OF ELOÁ PIMENTEL AND MÉRCIA NAKASHIMA EMPHASIZE THE TRADITIONAL ASPECTS OF PASSION IN THE SOCIAL IMAGINARY.

nm_producao: A LIGA DOS CAMPONESES POBRES E A LUTA PELA TERRA NO NORTE DE MINAS: 1995-2017
ds_abstract: THIS RESEARCH ANALYZES THE POLITICAL TRAJECTORY OF THE LEAGUE IN THE NORTH OF MINAS (LCP) BETWEEN 1995 AND 2017. DURING THIS PERIOD, THE LEAGUE WAS PRESENT IN DOZENS OF MUNICIPALITIES IN THE REGION, PROMOTING OCCUPATIONS THAT RESULTED IN THE POSSESSION AND SETTLEMENT OF COUNTLESS FAMILIES PEASANT WOMEN IN THE REGION. THE MOVEMENT HAS A RICH HISTORY, MARKED BY CONFRONTATIONS, DEFEATS, VICTORIES AND CONQUESTS. WE SEEK WITH THIS WORK, MAINLY THROUGH SOURCES PRODUCED BY THE MOVEMENT ITSELF, TO TELL A PART OF THIS STORY, WHICH IS STILL ONGOING. OUR INTEREST IS, MAINLY, TO UNVEIL POLITICAL AND IDEOLOGICAL ASPECTS ABOUT THE LCP THAT REVEAL AN AUTHENTIC PEASANT MOVEMENT, DEEPLY LINKED TO THE RURAL POOR AND WHOSE PRACTICES, NARRATIVES AND REPRESENTATIONS PRESENT IN THIS WORK DENOTE THE EXISTENCE OF A CRITICAL AND CONSISTENT THEORETICAL-POLITICAL PERSPECTIVE ABOUT THE AGRARIAN AND SOCIAL REALITY OF THE COUNTRY WHICH, ABOVE ALL, POINTS TO AN OPTIMISTIC VISION FOR THE FUTURE.

nm_producao: “FANTASMAGORIAS DO MERCADO”: UM OLHAR BENJAMINIANO SOBRE AS VIVÊNCIAS DE CONSUMO E OS ESPAÇOS MERCADOLÓGICOS DA PARIS DO SÉCULO XIX
ds_abstract: THE PURPOSE OF THIS DISSERTATION IS TO INVESTIGATE THE HISTORY OF SOME CONSUMPTION SPACES IN THE 19TH CENTURY OF PARIS, AS WELL AS THE FORMS OF EXPERIENCE, IMAGINATION AND SENSITIVITY THAT ARE CONNECTED TO THESE PLACES. IN ORDER TO ACHIEVE THIS GOAL, WE CHOSE WALTER BENJAMIN’S PASSAGES PROJECT (DAS PASSAGEN-WERK) AS THE MAIN SOURCE OF OUR RESEARCH AND HIS CONCEPT OF PHANTASMAGORIA AS A CENTRAL CATEGORY OF OUR ANALYSIS. THE DISSERTATION ANALYZES MORE SPECIFICALLY THREE CONSUMPTION SPACES OF THE PARIS OF THE 19TH CENTURY: THE BOULEVARDS, THE PASSAGES AND THE DEPARTMENT STORES. THEREFORE, WE LOOK FOR, ON THE ONE HAND, UNDERSTAND THE SPECIFIC CONFIGURATION OF SUCH SPACES, ALL THE APPARATUS OF DEVICES, TECHNOLOGIES AND AESTHETIC FORMS OPERATING IN IT, AND, ON THE OTHER HAND, IN THE RECEPTION’S VIEW PERSPECTIVE, WE TRY TO INVESTIGATE THE WAY IN WHICH PARISIAN LANDSCAPES CONSUMPTION AFFECT THE SENSITIVE EXPERIENCE OF CONSUMERS.REGARD THAT RECEPTION CANNOT BE CONSIDERED A HOMOGENEOUS PROCESS, WE HAVE CHOSEN A PARTICULAR SOCIAL TYPE AS THE OBJECT OF STUDY, THE FLÂNEUR, A PARISIAN FIGURE WHO IS STUDIED BY BENJAMIN IN HIS WORK. IN A LAST MOMENT OF OUR RESEARCH, WE TRY TO UNDERSTAND THE PHENOMENON OF THE PHANTASMAGORIA OF THE MARKET INSIDE THE FORMS OF URBAN LIVING, RECOVERINGAT THE SAME TIME SOME ELEMENTS OF THE LIFE AND WORKS OF CHARLES BAUDELAIRE AND SOME CONCEPTS OF PSYCHOANALYSIS. AT THE THEORETICAL-METHODOLOGICAL LEVEL, WE PROPOSE AN APPROACH THAT COMBINES THE HISTORY OF HISTORIOGRAPHY WITH SOME FAMILIAR PROCEDURES TO THE CURRENT OF NEW CULTURAL HISTORY. OUR STUDY IS SUPPORTED BY A QUALITATIVE POLYPHONIC RESEARCH, BASED ON THE ARTICULATION AND INTERPRETATION OF EVIDENCE FROM DIFFERENT SOURCES. BEYOND THE NUMBER OF DOCUMENTS COLLECTED BY BENJAMIN HIMSELF IN HIS PROJECT, WE ALSO USED, AS A COMPLEMENTARY SUPPORT, OTHER PRIMARY SOURCES NOT MENTIONED BY THE AUTHOR. SOME CONTEMPORARY STUDIES WERE ALSO USED AS A BASIS FOR THE ANALYSIS. THE PRESENT DISSERTATION WAS GUIDED, IN THIS WAY, BY AN ATTEMPT TO UNDERSTAND THE FORMS OF LIVING MOBILIZED BY MODERN CAPITALIST CULTURE, AT THE SAME TIME WE TRY TO STUDY CULTURAL PROCESSES CONNECTED TO THE CONSUMPTION SPACES OF PARIS IN THE 19TH CENTURY AS FOUNDATIONAL AND PARADIGMATIC PHENOMENON, WHICH WILL ALLOW TO UNDERSTAND, THEREFORE, CERTAIN EXPERIENCES, PRACTICES AND REPRESENTATIONS RELATED TO CONSUMPTION TODAY. KEYWORDS:

nm_producao: O PROCESSO DE TURISTIFICAÇÃO DO CARNAVAL DO RIO DE JANEIRO PELAS PÁGINAS DA GAZETA DE NOTÍCIAS (1922- 1932).
ds_abstract: THE PURPOSE OF THIS WORK IS TO DEMONSTRATE HOW CARNIVAL COLLABORATED TO TRANSFORM RIO DE JANEIRO INTO A TOURIST CITY, EVEN BEFORE TOURISM WAS A FORMALLY ORGANIZED ACTIVITY IN THE COUNTRY. WE OBSERVED THIS PROCESS BETWEEN THE YEARS 1922 AND 1932, A PERIOD IN WHICH WE NOTICED THE FIRST MOST EFFECTIVE ACTIONS AIMED AT ATTRACTING FOREIGN VISITORS TO BRAZIL. TO THIS END, WE USED THE GAZETA DE NOTÍCIAS NEWSPAPER AS THE MAIN SOURCE, DUE TO ITS CLOSE RELATIONSHIP WITH CARNIVAL CELEBRATIONS, AS WELL AS OTHER NEWSPAPERS SUCH AS JORNAL DO BRASIL, O PAIZ E CORREIO DA MANHÃ, WHICH WERE USED TO BRING INFORMATION ABOUT THE BOATS THAT ARRIVED WITH FOREIGN VISITORS. THESE VISITORS WERE MOTIVATED TO GET TO KNOW THE PARTY THAT IS PART OF THE CITY'S CULTURAL IDENTITY AND THAT, IN THE 1920S, WAS ALREADY CONSOLIDATED IN THE COUNTRY. IN ADDITION, WE ANALYZED THE PRESS’S INFLUENCE ON SOCIETY AT THE TIME, BY NOTICING THAT THESE NEWSPAPERS WERE SUPPORTERS OF THE MODERNIZATION OF RIO DE JANEIRO AND, CONSEQUENTLY, FAVORING THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A NEW SUITABLE CARNIVAL MODEL.

nm_producao: A CURA DO CÉU. CARIDADE E CURA ESPÍRITA NO RIO DE JANEIRO DA PRIMEIRA REPÚBLICA.
ds_abstract: SPIRITISM BEGAN TO BE STUDIED AND PRACTICED IN RIO DE JANEIRO IN THE 1860S BY A SMALL GROUP OF FRENCH INTELLECTUALS WHO RESIDED AT THE COURT. BY THE END OF THE FIRST REPUBLIC, IT SPREAD TO ALL CITIES IN THE COUNTRY, FORMING GROUPS, ENTITIES, FEDERATIONS AND ASSOCIATIONS. ALONG THE WAY, HE SUFFERED ATTACKS FROM THE CHURCH, WAS CRIMINALIZED IN HIS HEALING PRACTICES AND SAW SEVERAL OF HIS FOLLOWERS PROSECUTED AND IMPRISONED. THIS DID NOT PREVENT THEM FROM APPROACHING A LARGE PART OF THE POPULATION, BOTH EAGER FOR ANSWERS TO THEIR HEALTH PROBLEMS, HUNGER, MADNESS AND MISERIES, AND IN SEARCH OF ANSWERS TO QUESTIONS THAT HAVE BEEN PROPOSED FOR MILLENNIA: WHERE DID WE COME FROM, WHO ARE WE, WHERE WE WILL. THIS RESEARCH SOUGHT TO UNDERSTAND HOW THE PRACTICES OF HEALING AND CHARITY DECISIVELY INFLUENCED THE EXPANSION OF SPIRITISM IN RIO DE JANEIRO UNTIL THE END OF THE FIRST REPUBLIC AND HOW THE USE OF THESE ACTIONS TRANSFORMED A DOCTRINE THAT PRESENTED ITSELF AS SCIENCE IN A RELIGIOUS PRACTICE THAT EXPANDED, IF FRAGMENTED AND OCCUPIED A PRIVILEGED PLACE IN DIFFERENT SPHERES OF SOCIETY.

nm_producao: RELAÇÕES ENTRE ESPORTES, PRÁTICAS CORPORAIS E MULHERES NOS SUPLEMENTOS “O GLOBO ESPORTIVO” E “JORNAL DAS MOÇAS” (1938 A 1952)
ds_abstract: THE GROWING AND PARTICIPATION OF WOMEN IN THE SPORTS AND IN BODILY PRACTICES IN THE BRAZILIAN HISTORICAL SCENARIO, AS PER THE REPRESENTATION OF THE NEWSPAPERS, IT BRINGS TO LIGHT THE TRAJECTORY, BARRIERS AND AMBIGUITIES OF THIS PROCESS. TO COMPLY TO THE ISSUES THAT GUIDE THE PRESENT RESEARCH, THE GENERAL OBJECTIVE IS TO ANALYZE HOW IMPORTANT MEDIA OUTLETS OF THE RIO DE JANEIRO NEWSPAPERS REPRESENTED FEMALE PARTICIPATION IN SPORTS-BODILY PRACTICES FROM 1938 TO 1952. MAIN POINT OF OBJECTIVES: TO FURTHER A HISTORICAL RESCUE OF FEMALE PARTICIPATION IN SPORTS-BODILY PRACTICES, IDENTIFYING PERIODS THROUGH REPORTS OF THE TIME; AND UNDERSTAND A HISTORICAL PROCESS OF FEMALE PARTICIPATION IN BRAZILIAN SPORTS, POINTING OUT THE SOCIAL ISSUES OF THIS PERIOD. IN THIS WAY, THROUGH NEWSPAPERS THAT PERFORMED AN ESSENTIAL ROLE IN THE CURRENT COMMUNICATION OF THE PROPOSED PERIOD, IT IS POSSIBLE TO IDENTIFY THE SOCIOCULTURAL ISSUES THAT IT COVERS THE PARTICIPATION OF WOMEN IN BODILY PRACTICES AND BRAZILIAN SPORT, MAINLY IN THE CITY OF RIO DE JANEIRO. THE TIME FRAME IS JUSTIFIED BY THE PERIOD IN WHICH THE NEWSPAPER O GLOBOESPORTIVO REMAINED IN CIRCULATION THROUGHOUT BRAZIL, AND IN 1938, IT WAS THE FIRST EDITION ON THE NEWSPAPER O GLOBO, AND THE LAST CIRCULATION IN 1952. IN THE SAME PERIOD, JORNAL DAS MOÇAS, A WOMEN'S MAGAZINE FOR MAINLY WOMEN, IT WAS ALSO THE SUBJECT OF ANALYSIS TO VERIFY THE PRESENCE OF REPORTS SHOWING WOMEN INTO SPORTS/BODILY PRACTICES.

nm_producao: THEY HAVE A AUTORITY TO KILL A MINORITY: O GANGSTA RAP DE TUPAC SHAKUR E DO N.W.A. E A SUA UTILIZAÇÃO COMO FORMA DE RESISTÊNCIA ÀS VIOLÊNCIAS POLICIAIS E INSTITUCIONAL PERANTE A POPULAÇÃO AFRO-AMERICANA DE LOS ANGELES (1986-1996)
ds_abstract: THIS PAPER AIMS TO UNDERSTAND THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE AFRICAN AMERICAN COMMUNITY AND THE POLICE AND INSTITUTIONAL VIOLENCE. TO THIS END, THE WORK IS ABOUT ANALYZING A MUSICAL STYLE THAT IS CAPABLE OF DIALOGUING WITH THAT SPECIFIC GROUP AND THAT HAS AN INTERESTING PENETRATION FOR THIS POPULATION. IN THIS SENSE, THIS RESEARCH USES GANGSTA RAP, A VARIATION OF RAP VERY POPULAR IN LOS ANGELES AND NEW YORK BETWEEN THE 1980S AND 1990S. WE PROPOSE THAT GANGSTA RAP OPERATES AS AN EXTREMELY IMPORTANT ELEMENT FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A DISSIDENT DISCOURSE ON THE POLICE AND INSTITUTIONAL VIOLENCE IN A CONSIDERABLE PART OF ITS SONGS. THEREFORE, WE UNDERSTAND THAT THIS MUSICAL STYLE OPERATES AS A DISCOURSE OF RESISTANCE DUE TO THE NATURE OF ITS CONSTRUCTION AND THE PENETRATION OF ITS MESSAGE. FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE RESEARCH, WE USED ALBUMS FROM THE GROUP N.W.A. AND THE ARTIST TUPAC SHAKUR, AND THIS SELECTION IS DUE TO THE FACT THAT BOTH ARE PROMINENT EXPONENTS WITHIN THE SCENARIO, WITH THE SUCCESS OF ALBUM SALES BEING AN IMPORTANT EVALUATION CRITERION FOR CARRYING OUT THIS RESEARCH.

nm_producao: O PRIMADO DA POLÍTICA INTERNA DE GETÚLIO VARGAS E OS REFLEXOS DA FRENTE LESTE NO BRASIL (1941 - 1945).
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT WORK DEMONSTRATES HOW THE BRAZILIAN PARTICIPATION IN THE SECOND WORLD WAR MUNDIAL OBEYED AN INTERNAL DYNAMIC. WHERE VARGAS WAS ABLE TO TRACE A GROWTH STRATEGY USING THE WORLD CONFLICT AS AN OPPORTUNITY. THE WAR THEN IT BECAME A PROJECT OF POPULAR MOBILIZATION IN SUPPORT OF THE ESTADO NOVO. THE PRIMACY OF INTERNAL POLICY DEVELOPED BY GETÚLIO VARGAS WAS ABLE TO BALANCE THE BRAZIL IN THE FACE OF CONTRADICTIONS INVOLVING ALLIES AND AXIS. TO THIS END, ITAMARATY WAS TRANSFORMED INTO AN EFFICIENT OBSERVER OF THE INTERNATIONAL SITUATION, WHERE HE GUIDED THE STEPS OF THE BRAZILIAN GOVERNMENT THROUGHOUT THE SECOND WORLD WAR. THE ANTICOMMUNISM AND THE FEAR WITH THE TRANSFORMATION OF THE SOVIET UNION INTO A POWER DURING THE WAR WAS ANOTHER FACTOR THAT THE VARGAS GOVERNMENT USED WISELY, SINCE THE INNOVATIVE MEASURES FOR THE EDIFICATION OF A STATE OF SOCIAL WELFARE, ALSO AIMED TO REMOVE THE INFLUENCE OF THE COMMUNIST MOVEMENT IN BRAZILIAN SOCIETY. THE PRIMACY OF POLITICS VARGAS WAS ABLE TO NEUTRALIZE THE HARASSMENT OF THE “FIFTH COLUMN”, AS WELL AS, GET GREAT DEALS FROM THE ALLIES. THE TRACES OF INDEPENDENCE AND SOVEREIGNTY WERE FUNDAMENTAL FOR BRAZIL TO BE ABLE TO END THE WAR WITH EXTRAORDINARY GAINS, AT THE SAME TIME THAT IT BECAME A REGIONAL POWER.

nm_producao: FOTOGRAFIA AMADORA, CULTURA VISUAL E MODERNIZAÇÃO CONSERVADORA NO RECIFE OITOCENTISTA: UM OLHAR SOBRE A OBRA DE CLAUDIO BURLE DUBEUX JR.
ds_abstract: THE PRESENT THESIS AIMS TO ANALYZE THE PHOTOGRAPHIC IMAGES PRODUCED BY CLAUDIO BURLE DUBEUX JR (1845/1919) AND THE ROLEPLAYED BY PHOTOGRAPHY, AS AN OBSERVATION TECHNIQUE, IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF A GEOGRAPHICAL IMAGINATION ABOUT THE MODERN AND CIVILIZED CITY, AN IMAGE THAT PERNAMBUCO'S DOMINANT CLASSES TRIED TO REACH RECIFE DURING THE SECOND EMPIRE. WE WILL UNDERSTAND THIS PROCESS OF TRANSFORMATIONS IN BOTH THE MATERIAL AND THE PRODUCTIVE STRUCTURES OF THE CITY AS A CONSERVATIVE MODERNIZATION, WHICH DID NOT IN FACT PROMOTE RUPTURES WITH THE OLD SOCIAL AND POWER STRUCTURES IN THE RECIFE SOCIETY OF THE 1800S.
